T02D2512-2:1b-0: @1b # // de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bur /
T02D2512-2:1b-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po dpal mchog

T02D2512-2:11a-19: 'dod pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2512-2:11a-20: sems dpa' dang rdo rje yid las byung ba la
T02D2512-2:11a-21: sogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin yin pas na 'dod pa
T02D2512-2:11a-22: thams cad de bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-2:11a-23: ni 'dod pa'o zhes bshad pas na 'dod pa'i phyir
T02D2512-2:11a-24: 'dod pa ste / gdul bya rnams mngon par dga' bas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:11a-25: 'dod pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na 'dod pa thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:11a-26: dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas par thams cad ces bya la /
T02D2512-2:11a-27: dngos grub kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02D2512-2:11a-28: dngos grub thams cad de rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub bo //
T02D2512-2:11a-29: de'i cho ga ni sgrub pa'i thabs so //
T02D2512-2:11a-30: de'i rgyas pa ni rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbye
T02D2512-2:11a-31: bas phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgrub pa'i
T02D2512-2:11a-32: rgyun no // rtag pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-2:11a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab bo zhes
T02D2512-2:11a-34: bya ba ni bdag la rjes su gnang ba gsol
T02D2512-2:11a-35: cig ces pa'o // gsang ba'i rtog pa rab bshad pa //
T02D2512-2:11b-0: bcom ldan @11b 'das rnam par snang mdzad la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02D2512-2:11b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' ji skad du bshad pa'i ji
T02D2512-2:11b-2: srid 'khor ba'i gnas su 'jug pa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:11b-3: la 'dir 'khor bas na 'khor ba ste snod kyi
T02D2512-2:11b-4: 'jig rten no // der gnas pa ni bzhugs pa
T02D2512-2:11b-5: ste mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul
T02D2512-2:11b-6: gyis der ji srid gnas shing 'dug pa de srid
T02D2512-2:11b-7: 'jig rten no // kyi bar du'o // de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D2512-2:11b-9: sems can rnams kyis 'dod cing don du gnyer ba
T02D2512-2:11b-10: yin pas na sems can don te sangs rgyas nyid
T02D2512-2:11b-11: dam byang chub sems dpa' nyid do //
T02D2512-2:11b-12: de lta bu'i sems can gyi don mchog / dam
T02D2512-2:11b-13: par gyur pa bdag bgyid par rjes su gnang ba
T02D2512-2:11b-15: bdag 'khor ba ji srid gnas pa'i bar du sems
T02D2512-2:11b-16: can gyi don bgyid par rjes su gnang ba stsol
T02D2512-2:11b-17: cig ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:11b-19: sems can khams ni mtha' yas pas //
T02D2512-2:11b-20: zhes bya ba gsungs pa ste /
T02D2512-2:11b-21: gang gi phyir sems can gyi khams ni mtha' yas
T02D2512-2:11b-22: pa yin pas mtha' yas pa yin la de yang
T02D2512-2:11b-23: dus ring mo zhig nas sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo
T02D2512-2:11b-24: rje 'dzin pa nyid la 'jog par 'dod nus kyi
T02D2512-2:11b-25: thams cad dus gcig gi tshe skal ba dang ldan
T02D2512-2:11b-26: pa nyid du bya ba ni mi srid do //
T02D2512-2:11b-27: gzi can sring pa tshol byed pa //
T02D2512-2:11b-28: zhes bya ba la gzi can ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:11b-29: de rnams kyis srid pa 'dod pa ni 'khor ba
T02D2512-2:11b-30: ji srid par mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das
T02D2512-2:11b-31: pa skye bar bzhes pa ste /
T02D2512-2:11b-32: de rnams kyis srid pa 'dod pa ni srid pa'i nyes pa gzhig par bya ba ste /
T02D2512-2:11b-33: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:11b-35: srid pa'i nyes pa gzhig pa yis //
T02D2512-2:11b-36: bde ba chen po 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:11b-37: byang chub sems dpa' de dag nyid rgyud sna tshogs
T02D2512-2:11b-38: kyis phye zhing tha dad pa'i chos rnams thugs su
T02D2512-2:11b-39: chud pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs su
T02D2512-2:11b-40: chud pa ni de'i don du bdag la rjes su
T02D2512-2:11b-41: gnang ba gsol cig ces pa'o //
T02D2512-2:11b-43: gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog bshad pa //
T02D2512-2:11b-45: gsang ba yang yin la rtog pa yang yin pas na gsang ba'i rtog pa'o //
T02D2512-2:12a-1: yang gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pas na mchog ste /
T02D2512-2:12a-2: bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa bshad par bdag la gnang ba stsol cig pa'o //
T02D2512-2:12a-3: de nas zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba gsol ba gdab pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-2:12a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:12a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2512-2:12a-6: ji skad du bshad pa byas nas dang po'i rdo
T02D2512-2:12a-7: rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rje sems dpa'i ji
T02D2512-2:12a-8: skad bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma bde ba
T02D2512-2:12a-9: chen po rdo rje sems dpa' lag pa gnyis su
T02D2512-2:12a-10: byin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2512-2:12a-11: chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa la dmigs te
T02D2512-2:12a-12: zhes bya ba la thams cad kyang yin la chos
T02D2512-2:12a-13: kyang yin pas na chos thams cad de rdo rje
T02D2512-2:12a-15: de rnams kyi sgrib pa med pa ni de bzhin
T02D2512-2:12a-16: nyid de la dmigs pa ni mngon sum du mdzad
T02D2512-2:12a-17: pa'o // ci zhig mdzad ce na gdul bya thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2512-2:12a-18: 'dis sems can rnams 'dul bas na 'dul ba ste chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2512-2:12a-19: thams cad kyi 'dul ba ni thams cad 'dul ba ste /
T02D2512-2:12a-20: de nyid ni thugs rje chen po yin la /
T02D2512-2:12a-21: de yang dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po ste /
T02D2512-2:12a-22: de las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo rje zhes pa
T02D2512-2:12a-23: sna tshogs rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D2512-2:12a-24: dpa' rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste /
T02D2512-2:12a-25: de la dmigs pa'i ming de skad bya ba'i ting
T02D2512-2:12a-26: nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum
T02D2512-2:12a-28: dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:12a-29: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang po zhes bya
T02D2512-2:12a-30: ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por
T02D2512-2:12a-31: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag na
T02D2512-2:12a-32: gnas pa gang yin pa de rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-2:12a-33: sbrul pa'i dus su dang po'i rdo rje chen po
T02D2512-2:12a-34: de ni dmigs pa med pa thugs rje chen po
T02D2512-2:12a-35: las byung ba'i phyir bde ba chen po zhes bya'o
T02D2512-2:12a-36: // bde ba chen po'i rdo rje de rgyu ci zhig gi phyir stsal zhe na /
T02D2512-2:12a-37: sems can gyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:12a-38: ma lus shing lus pa med pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:12a-39: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
T02D2512-2:12b-0: pa'i bsam @12b ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa
T02D2512-2:12b-1: ni mngon par 'dod pa thams cad bskangs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:12b-2: des kyang sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa ni 'jigs pa thams cad yongs su bzlog pa'o //
T02D2512-2:12b-3: phan ba dang bde ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:12b-4: dngos grub thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:12b-5: phun sum tshogs pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la sogs pa'i 'byor ba'o //
T02D2512-2:12b-6: de rnams kyi las zhes pa ni mchod pa'i las bcu drug gi las so //
T02D2512-2:12b-7: dngos grub kyi mchog ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:12b-8: ji skad du bshad pa'i sems can gyi khams thams
T02D2512-2:12b-9: cad kyi bsam ba yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i
T02D2512-2:12b-11: phan ba dang bde ba dang dngos grub thams cad dang /
T02D2512-2:12b-12: phun sum tshogs pa dang ye shes dang las dang
T02D2512-2:12b-13: dngos grub kyi mchog ni sems can gyi khams ma
T02D2512-2:12b-14: lus shing lus pa med pa'i bsam pa thams cad
T02D2512-2:12b-16: sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa'i phan pa dang bde ba dang /
T02D2512-2:12b-17: dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes
T02D2512-2:12b-18: kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog rnams zhes bya
T02D2512-2:12b-19: ste / de'i don du zhes bya ba ni de bskyed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:12b-20: bar du zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D2512-2:12b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
T02D2512-2:12b-22: nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de
T02D2512-2:12b-23: bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D2512-2:12b-24: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i de kho na nyid ni shes par zad de /
T02D2512-2:12b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2512-2:12b-26: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i de kho na nyid thob
T02D2512-2:12b-27: pa ste de nyid ni dngos grub kyi dam pa
T02D2512-2:12b-28: ste / rgyu de dag gi phyir /
T02D2512-2:12b-29: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje de lag pa gnyis su byin pa'o //
T02D2512-2:12b-30: rgyu ci zhig gi phyir byin zhe na /
T02D2512-2:12b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du zhes pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:12b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-2:12b-33: de bskor ba'i ngang tshul 'di la yod pas na de'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2512-2:12b-34: des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:13a-1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid kyis der ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2512-2:13a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:13a-7: don yod par grub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:13a-8: de rnams kyi sku ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:13a-9: de'i phreng ba ni de rnams kyis nye bar mtshon
T02D2512-2:13a-10: pa'i cod pan rtse bran can gang yin pa ste
T02D2512-2:13a-11: / de'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D2512-2:13a-12: cod pan te de'i mgo la bzhag nas rdo rje de de'i lag pa gnyis su byin pa'o //
T02D2512-2:13a-13: de nas rdo rje de byin pa dang 'jig rten
T02D2512-2:13a-14: gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam
T02D2512-2:13a-15: pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas ming gi
T02D2512-2:13a-16: dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar gyur to //
T02D2512-2:13a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:13a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02D2512-2:13a-20: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams so //
T02D2512-2:13a-21: rdul phra rab kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin
T02D2512-2:13a-22: pas na rdul phra rab thams cad de de rnams
T02D2512-2:13a-23: kyi sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi khams
T02D2512-2:13a-24: nye bar gzung ba'i gzugs kyi rdul te de nyid
T02D2512-2:13a-26: de'i tshogs ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-2:13a-27: de rnams su gtogs pa ni chud pa'o //
T02D2512-2:13a-28: de dag tu gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-2:13a-29: cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D2512-2:13a-30: zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang gi dbang bskur bas
T02D2512-2:13a-31: dbang bskur ro // de la chos kyi dbyings thog
T02D2512-2:13a-32: ma dang tha ma med pa ni rdo rje chen
T02D2512-2:13a-33: dbang bskur ro // po ste / de las byung
T02D2512-2:13a-34: ba'i dang po rdo rje rtse lnga pa la yang
T02D2512-2:13a-35: nye bar btags pas rdo rje chen po zhes bya'o
T02D2512-2:13a-36: dbang bskur ro // po ste / // de bas
T02D2512-2:13a-37: na chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med
T02D2512-2:13a-38: pa'i rdo rje de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i
T02D2512-2:13a-39: ye shes 'di lag pas 'dzin par byed pas na
T02D2512-2:13a-40: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni bcom ldan 'das phyag
T02D2512-2:13a-41: dbang bskur ro // po ste / // na rdo
T02D2512-2:13a-42: rje'o // de ltar na bcom ldan 'das rnam bar
T02D2512-2:13b-0: snang mdzad ces bya ba nas brtsams @13b te ;
T02D2512-2:13b-1: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro
T02D2512-2:13b-2: zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pas bstan pa'i don gzhan
T02D2512-2:13b-4: dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bshad pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:13b-5: da ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:13b-6: la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa
T02D2512-2:13b-7: yin te / de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:13b-8: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:13b-9: ji skad du bshad pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi
T02D2512-2:13b-10: bde ba chen po dam pa 'grub pa ni rdo
T02D2512-2:13b-11: rje 'chang chen po nyid grub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:13b-12: ming thog mar byas te dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:13b-13: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'i ngo
T02D2512-2:13b-14: bo thob par bya pa'i phyir sems dpa'i skyil mo
T02D2512-2:13b-15: krung du 'dug cing bcas te lus drang por bzhag
T02D2512-2:13b-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin ma thag pa'i rdo rje g-yon dkur brten nas /
T02D2512-2:13b-18: rang gi thugs kar 'jog pa'i tshul gyis bsnams shing zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:13b-19: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:13b-20: de'i rdo rje ni de las byung ba'i snying po
T02D2512-2:13b-21: yi ge bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid can gyi rang
T02D2512-2:13b-22: bzhin gang yin pa la ming de skad ces bya
T02D2512-2:13b-23: ste gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyor ro //
T02D2512-2:13b-24: 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
T02D2512-2:13b-25: khyad par ji lta bu zhig yin zhe na zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2512-2:13b-26: rang nyid kyi phyag rgya thams cad ni rang gi
T02D2512-2:13b-27: phyag rgya thams cad de bcom ldan 'das bde ba
T02D2512-2:13b-28: chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang gsung dang
T02D2512-2:13b-30: de rnams las bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po de phyung ba'o //
T02D2512-2:13b-31: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yi ge bcu bdun gyi snying po'o //
T02D2512-2:13b-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:13b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs
T02D2512-2:13b-34: su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni lag pa gnyis
T02D2512-2:13b-35: kyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings pa'o //
T02D2512-2:13b-36: de gang gis bskyed cing 'byin par byed pa'i snying
T02D2512-2:13b-37: po de ni rang gi bdag nyid thams cad kyi
T02D2512-2:13b-38: phyag rgya'o // de gang las byung zhe na /
T02D2512-2:13b-39: rang gi sku dang gsung dang /
T02D2512-2:14a-0: @14a * // thugs rdo rje las zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:14a-1: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:14a-2: slar yang byang chub chen por mngon par 'tshang rgya'o
T02D2512-2:14a-3: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i
T02D2512-2:14a-4: nyams mi snang ba mdzad nas /
T02D2512-2:14a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02D2512-2:14a-6: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyis sgeg pa'i nyams kyi cha lugs su bzhugs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:14a-7: bzhad pa chen po sems dpa' che //
T02D2512-2:14a-8: zhes bya ba ni thams cad du khyab pa'i 'dzum pa ni bzhad pa chen po ste /
T02D2512-2:14a-9: de mdzad pas na bzhad pa chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:14a-10: sems dpa' che ni rdo rje sems dpas 'dul ba'i
T02D2512-2:14a-11: sems can gyi don rdzogs par gzigs nas de bzhin
T02D2512-2:14a-12: gshegs pa rnams thugs dgyes pas 'dzum pa mdzad do
T02D2512-2:14a-13: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:14a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g-yos te zhes bya
T02D2512-2:14a-15: ba ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dang 'dra
T02D2512-2:14a-16: ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa dang bcas
T02D2512-2:14a-17: pa de dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D2512-2:14a-18: do // de rnams snying po 'di'i mthus g-yos pa'o //
T02D2512-2:14a-19: de nyid shin tu g-yos pa ni //
T02D2512-2:14a-20: rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa ste //
T02D2512-2:14a-22: de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:14a-23: der gtogs pa'i sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyangs
T02D2512-2:14a-25: khams gsum pa ma lus pa rgyas par zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa nyid ni /
T02D2512-2:14a-27: de rgyas par ni rab 'byam mo //
T02D2512-2:14a-28: de'i spros pa ni khyab pa ste /
T02D2512-2:14a-29: gang gis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:14a-30: 'khor chen po de de lta bu'i tshad du gyur
T02D2512-2:14a-31: cing byung ba'o // de lta bu'i tshad du gyur
T02D2512-2:14a-32: pa des ji skad du bshad pa'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D2512-2:14a-33: khams gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde ba dang
T02D2512-2:14a-34: yid bde ba thams cad kyi ye shes skyes pa'o

T02D2512-2:53a-38: 'di'i don ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te de
T02D2512-2:53a-39: bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor nas dang
T02D2512-2:53a-40: po'i rdo rje bcings pa bzlog nas dbral ba'i phyogs
T02D2512-2:53a-41: su bzhag nas gyen du bltas la /
T02D2512-2:53b-0: dpal he ru kar bdag @53b nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:53b-1: zhal bzhi pa de la zhal dang po drag po zhal g-yas pa rab tu rmongs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:53b-2: rgyab kyi zhal gdug pa'i pags pa za bar mdzad pa la brtson pa /
T02D2512-2:53b-3: zhal g-yon pa sgeg pa phyag gnyis kyis rlung gi
T02D2512-2:53b-4: gos 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis mi'i pags pa rlon pa
T02D2512-2:53b-5: bsnams pa gnyis kyis dbral ba'i phyogs su he ru
T02D2512-2:53b-6: ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'chang ba /
T02D2512-2:53b-7: g-yas pa'i phyag gsum pas rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba gsor ba la brtson pa /
T02D2512-2:53b-8: bzhi pa khrag chen pos bkar ba'i thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:53b-9: g-yon gyi phyag gsum pas dril bu dang bcas pa'i rdo rje kha tv'am ga bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:53b-10: bzhi pa sha chen pos yongs su gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-2:53b-11: yang na zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa dpung pa
T02D2512-2:53b-12: g-yon par dril bu dang bcas pa'i rdo rje kha
T02D2512-2:53b-13: tv'am ga mchod phyir thogs kyi tshul du bsnams pa
T02D2512-2:53b-14: / phyag g-yas kyis ba dan gsum pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:53b-15: phyag g-yon pas sha chen pos yongs su gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-2:53b-16: 'di dag gnyig yang thod pa'i cod pan gyi phreng
T02D2512-2:53b-17: ba can spyi gtsug nas sangs rgyas kyi gtsug gi
T02D2512-2:53b-18: nor bu can sna tshogs padma la bzhugs pa /
T02D2512-2:53b-19: zhabs g-yon ba sa la bzhag nas zhabs g-yas pa
T02D2512-2:53b-20: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi tshul du bzhugs nas
T02D2512-2:53b-21: de'i zhabs mthil g-yon gyi brla dang sbyar ba'i tshul
T02D2512-2:53b-23: sku'i gzi mdangs sngon po 'tsher ba 'od kyi dkyil
T02D2512-2:53b-24: 'khor 'jig pa chen po'i dus kyi me ltar 'bar
T02D2512-2:53b-25: zhing dmar ba / dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba
T02D2512-2:53b-26: zhal sna tshogs pa rnams 'bar bar 'gyur zhing drag
T02D2512-2:53b-27: po la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa khro gnyer
T02D2512-2:53b-28: rnam par 'gyur zhing bsdus pa blta ba rnam par
T02D2512-2:53b-30: de ltar bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams nas ji skad du bshad pa'i nad pa'i lus la /
T02D2512-2:53b-31: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:53b-32: de nas nad pa'i lus la gnas pa'i phra men
T02D2512-2:53b-33: ma'i phyag rgya thams cad bcom zhing zos par bsam
T02D2512-2:54a-0: par bya'o // de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma 'od zer 'bar ba'i gzugs can @54a * //
T02D2512-2:54a-1: rnams sprul la der gnas pa nyid kyis der mkha'
T02D2512-2:54a-2: 'gro ma de bkug la nad pa'i lus la bcug
T02D2512-2:54a-3: ste de rnams las snying blangs la nad pa'i lus
T02D2512-2:54a-5: de nas de rnams yang dag par btsir zhing nges
T02D2512-2:54a-6: par bzung la nad pa sos shing rnal mar byas
T02D2512-2:54a-7: shing bslang bar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag
T02D2512-2:54a-8: rgya gzhig pa la ni zhes bya ba la log
T02D2512-2:54a-9: 'dren thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni gdug pa thams
T02D2512-2:54a-11: de rnams gzhig pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyud
T02D2512-2:54a-12: la log 'dren gyis bcings pa rnams rnam par gzhig
T02D2512-2:54a-13: pa'o // yang srin po la sogs pa'i gdug pa
T02D2512-2:54a-14: thams cad kyis nye bar gnod pa byed pa'i phyir
T02D2512-2:54a-15: 'ongs nas phyag rgya bcings pa'i phyag rgya de rnam
T02D2512-2:54a-16: par brlag pa'i gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:54a-17: pa'o // gzhig pa'o // des ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:54a-18: rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:54a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ni gsang ba'i rdo
T02D2512-2:54a-21: rje'i phyag rgya gang gis de ltar gyur pa ste
T02D2512-2:54a-22: / rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje des gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:54a-23: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te snga ma
T02D2512-2:54a-24: bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la
T02D2512-2:54a-25: / dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02D2512-2:54a-26: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu drag po
T02D2512-2:54a-27: bsams la dang po'i rdo rjes gdug pa'i phyag rgya'i
T02D2512-2:54a-28: steng du rdo rje 'bar ba dbab pa'i bsam bas
T02D2512-2:54a-29: nam mkha'i phyogs su bsnun par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:54a-30: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:54a-31: rims thams cad ni nyin gsum pa dang /
T02D2512-2:54a-33: yang dang yang zlos par byed pa dang /
T02D2512-2:54a-34: rtag pa dang khyab 'jug gi rims so //
T02D2512-2:54a-35: de rnams zhi ba ni de dag dang bral ba'o //
T02D2512-2:54a-36: de dag gis cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:54a-37: rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje gsang ba ste /
T02D2512-2:54a-38: rdo rje sems dpa'i 'bar ba'i lta ba ni bskyod cing 'dzum pa'i lta bas so //
T02D2512-2:54a-39: de dang bcas pa'i phyag rgyas bcings pas sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:54a-40: des rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:54a-42: de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba
T02D2512-2:54a-43: byas la d'ipta dri shya aam ku shi dza: zhes
T02D2512-2:54a-44: bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la rab tu 'bar
T02D2512-2:54a-45: bas g-yo ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren
T02D2512-2:54b-0: pa ni zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta @54b ba'i
T02D2512-2:54b-1: phyag rgyas rims kyis zin pa rnams la bltas la
T02D2512-2:54b-2: / dang po'i rdo rjes byab par bya zhing bltas
T02D2512-2:54b-3: pa las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu
T02D2512-2:54b-5: lag pa gsum pa rkang pa gsum pa drangs la /
T02D2512-2:54b-6: rgya mtsho chen por dor te /
T02D2512-2:54b-7: bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi bo nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:54b-8: rkang mthil gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-2:54b-9: sems dpas khyab cing rdo rje sems dpar bsam par
T02D2512-2:54b-10: bya'o // de lta bus ni rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:54b-11: grang ba'i rims zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ni bcom ldan 'das sku mdog dmar po bsams la /
T02D2512-2:54b-12: tsha ba'i rims zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ni zla ba'i mdog can du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:54b-13: dug thams cad ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams so //
T02D2512-2:54b-14: de rnams gzhig pa ni rnam par bsal ba ste /
T02D2512-2:54b-15: de rnams nyid rang dbang du byas nas bzla bar bya ba'o //
T02D2512-2:54b-16: de rnams nyid g-yo ba ni 'bab pa'o //
T02D2512-2:54b-17: 'gul mi nus pa'i sems can bde bar bya ba ni 'chi ba slar gso ba'o //
T02D2512-2:54b-18: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:54b-19: gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje'i nor bu'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /

T02D2512-2:54b-24: chung gnyis kyi nor bus dug la reg par byas
T02D2512-2:54b-25: la dug dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nam mkhar
T02D2512-2:54b-27: de lta bus ni dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:54b-28: de bzhin du dug la reg cing rdo rje sems
T02D2512-2:54b-29: dpa' sku mdog dkar po phra rab tu yongs su
T02D2512-2:54b-30: gyur pas dkar por gyur par bsams la de ltar
T02D2512-2:54b-31: bdud rtsir byas nas dug thams cad bza' bar bya'o
T02D2512-2:54b-32: // de bzhin du reg par byas shing dug gis
T02D2512-2:54b-33: zin pa'am dug gam dug gis zin pa'i shugs sam
T02D2512-2:54b-34: dug gi shugs kyi 'og tu yi ge ha la
T02D2512-2:54b-35: // 'am / yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2512-2:54b-36: steng du yi ge ram las me'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2512-2:54b-37: steng du yi ge aom dus mtha'i rlung gis bskyod
T02D2512-2:54b-38: pa'i bskal pa'i me'i phung po lta bu de'i steng
T02D2512-2:54b-39: du dug gis zin pa'am dug gnas pa me des
T02D2512-2:54b-40: bud shing skam po ltar 'bar bar gyur par bsam
T02D2512-2:55a-2: de bzhin du dug gi shugs kyis phog cing shi
T02D2512-2:55a-3: ba la reg par byas la bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-2:55a-4: rje sems dpa'i zla ba'i mdog can gyis de'i spyi
T02D2512-2:55a-6: rkang mthil gyi bar du de'i yan lag kun du
T02D2512-2:55a-7: gang zhing rdo rje sems dpar gyur par bsam par
T02D2512-2:55a-8: bya'o // de lta bus ni shi ba slar sos par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:55a-9: dug thams cad dang sbyar ba'i dug bdud rtsir bya
T02D2512-2:55a-10: ba ni zhes bya ba la dug thams cad ni
T02D2512-2:55a-12: sbyar ba'i dug ni yi dvags kyi 'gro bas bsdus
T02D2512-2:55a-13: pa'i sems can la gnod par byed pa'i sems can
T02D2512-2:55a-14: gyi skra dang / sen mo dang /
T02D2512-2:55a-15: dri ma la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas nas sems can gdug pa rnams kyis btang ba'o //
T02D2512-2:55a-16: de rnam bdud rtsir bya ba ni sems can la
T02D2512-2:55a-17: phan gdags par bya ba'i phyir gzugs bsgyur bar bya'o
T02D2512-2:55a-19: rdo rje gsang ba'i dug med pas so zhes bya
T02D2512-2:55a-20: ba gsungs te dang po'i rdo rje bcings la mdzub
T02D2512-2:55a-21: mo gnyis sbyar te rtse mor byas pa'i mdzub mo
T02D2512-2:55a-22: gnyis kyi rtse mo dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs
T02D2512-2:55a-23: kyi sor mo'i gzugs su yid kyis bskyed la /

T02D2512-2:55a-26: sems dpa'i zhabs kyi sor mo dang reg pas rdo
T02D2512-2:55a-27: rje sems dpa'i bdud rtsi'i phra rab rnams kyis bdud
T02D2512-2:55a-29: de lta bus ni dug thams cad dang sbyar ba'i dug bdud rtsir byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:55a-30: gshed byed thams cad ni sngags kyi stobs kyis dgra
T02D2512-2:55a-31: bo'i srog 'phrog par bya ba'i phyir khro bo'i lha
T02D2512-2:55a-32: bskyed pa gang gis phur bu'i phyag rgya 'am /
T02D2512-2:55a-33: ser ldeng la sogs pa'i phur bus btab la /
T02D2512-2:55a-34: ro la sngags kyi stobs sam sman gyi stobs kyis
T02D2512-2:55a-35: dgra po gsad par bya ba'i phyir shi ba'i ro
T02D2512-2:55a-36: la mkhas pas srin po la sogs pa bcug ste
T02D2512-2:55a-37: byas pa'am yang na gzhan la gnod par bya ba'i
T02D2512-2:55a-38: phyir rang nyid shi ba'i lus la srin po la
T02D2512-2:55a-39: sogs pa zhugs pa gang yin pa'i ro langs de'o
T02D2512-2:55a-40: // byur ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:55a-41: gshed byed la sogs pa 'di dag bshig pa ni
T02D2512-2:55b-0: rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gis @55b 'gyur ba
T02D2512-2:55b-1: ni / de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal
T02D2512-2:55b-2: 'byor byas la mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' spyan
T02D2512-2:55b-3: drangs la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par
T02D2512-2:55b-5: 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrigs pa'i ye shes
T02D2512-2:55b-6: kyi me thab kyi dbus na bzhugs pa'i drag po
T02D2512-2:55b-7: chen pos gshed byed la sogs pa za bar spyod
T02D2512-2:55b-8: pa der bsams la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te
T02D2512-2:55b-9: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar bas gshed byed la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:55b-10: blangs te dgang blugs la sogs pa de ltar de'i
T02D2512-2:55b-12: de ltar na gshed byed la sogs pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:55b-13: rtsod pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:55b-14: la mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam chen po
T02D2512-2:55b-15: kun du spyod pa ni rtsod pa thams cad do
T02D2512-2:55b-16: // zhe sdang gis zil gyis gnon pa rnams phan
T02D2512-2:55b-17: tshun gcig la gcig mi snyan par brjod pa ni

T02D2512-2:55b-19: rtsod pa'i dbang du byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis khyed kyi ni mi rigs so //
T02D2512-2:55b-20: nga'i rigs te nga'i 'di ni chos gsal bar byed
T02D2512-2:55b-21: pa'i tshig yin no zhes 'gal bar smra ba ni
T02D2512-2:55b-22: rtsod pa'o // 'di dag gzhig par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:55b-23: rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal rab tu gdangs pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:55b-24: rdo rje gsang ba ste rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal
T02D2512-2:55b-25: gdangs pa ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal gdangs pa'i
T02D2512-2:55b-26: phyag rgya ste des de rnams 'jig par 'gyur ba'o
T02D2512-2:55b-27: // de yang lnga po bsdus pa bcings la mdzub
T02D2512-2:55b-28: mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas la de nyid
T02D2512-2:55b-29: khar dgrol ba 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal

T02D2512-2:55b-31: rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal gdangs pa bcings te bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:55b-32: yid kyis gcig tu gyur par byas la phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol te /
T02D2512-2:55b-33: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rtsod pa dang
T02D2512-2:55b-34: 'thab mo la sogs pa 'jig par mdzad pa'i bsam
T02D2512-2:55b-35: pas bsgrub par bya ba'i khar bcug nas bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:55b-36: 'das de zhugs pas bsgrub par bya ba kun du
T02D2512-2:55b-37: bzang por gyur nas rtsod pa dang 'thab mo la
T02D2512-2:55b-38: sogs pa dang bral bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:56a-0: yams dang 'tshe ba thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la sems @56a * //
T02D2512-2:56a-1: can rnams kyi lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba dang /
T02D2512-2:56a-2: rims la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'i
T02D2512-2:56a-3: bdud kyi phyogs kyi dpung du gyur pa'i lha rnams
T02D2512-2:56a-4: ni ya mas thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:56a-5: srin po la sogs pa nas yul nye bar gtses pa ni 'tshe ba thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:56a-6: khyab 'jug dang 'tshol ba'i rgyud kyi don nyams su len pa ni sdig pa'o //
T02D2512-2:56a-7: rmi lam ngan pa ni rgyud de dang de las shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:56a-8: 'di rnams gzhig par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /

T02D2512-2:56a-11: dpa' ste de'i zhi ba ni rdo rje gsang ba'i
T02D2512-2:56a-14: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02D2512-2:56a-15: mdun du bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs la mchod pa
T02D2512-2:56a-16: thams cad kyis ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag
T02D2512-2:56a-17: par mchod nas / phyag byas nas ye shes kyi

T02D2512-2:56a-20: yams la sogs pa thams cad bzlog par mdzad pa
T02D2512-2:56a-21: la brtsams pa bdag nyid kyang drag po chen por
T02D2512-2:56a-22: bsams te / lnga po bsdus pa bcings te mdzub
T02D2512-2:56a-23: mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus yams la sogs pa bkug
T02D2512-2:56a-24: bsams te / ste / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
T02D2512-2:56a-25: du dgang blugs dbul ba'i tshul du bstab par bya'o
T02D2512-2:56a-26: bsams te / ste / // de ltar na yams la sogs pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:56a-27: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad rengs par bya ba dang nyid log par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:56a-30: rgyas btab pa dang bsad pa la ni zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:56a-31: de dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:56a-32: bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi gsang
T02D2512-2:56a-33: ba'i gshed byed kyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te
T02D2512-2:56a-34: / bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi gsang ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2512-2:56a-35: de'i gshed byed skyed par byed pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-2:56a-36: des de thams cad nges par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:56a-37: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-2:56a-38: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba snga
T02D2512-2:56a-39: ma bzhin du byas la bshad ma thag pa'i lcags
T02D2512-2:56b-0: kyu gnyis bcings la bdag nyid rdo rje sems @56b
T02D2512-2:56b-1: dpa' drag po chen por bsams la /
T02D2512-2:56b-2: mthe'u chung gnyis rang gi gnas su bcug la lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dral nas /
T02D2512-2:56b-3: rang gi lus las kyang gshed byed drag po'i gzugs
T02D2512-2:56b-4: can rnams phyung la des gzhan gyi dpung mnan par
T02D2512-2:56b-5: bsam par bya'o // de lta bus ni gzhan gyi dmag tshogs rengs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:56b-6: de nyid dbye ba mtha' yas pa'i gzugs can spros la /
T02D2512-2:56b-7: gzhan gyi dmag tshogs kyi sems can re re'i lus
T02D2512-2:56b-8: su bcug ste mig btsums na de lta bus ni
T02D2512-2:56b-9: gzhan gyi dpung gnyid log par byas par 'gyur ro

T02D2512-2:56b-12: kyi lus kyi yan lag thams cad lhod par gyur
T02D2512-2:56b-14: de lta bus de ni rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:56b-15: de bzhin du de bcug la gzhan gyi dpung gi
T02D2512-2:56b-16: tshig phrogs par gyur par bsams na lkugs par byas
T02D2512-2:56b-17: par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du de bcug la

T02D2512-2:56b-20: de bzhin du de spros la gzhan gyi dpung za

T02D2512-2:56b-23: ba thob ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal
T02D2512-2:56b-24: mtshan gyi rtse mos so zhes bya ba ni de

T02D2512-2:56b-27: zhugs pa na lnga po bsdus pa bcings la mdzub
T02D2512-2:56b-28: mo gnyis lcags kyur byas te /

T02D2512-2:56b-30: chung gnyis gshibs pa phye ste steng du bzhag la
T02D2512-2:56b-31: gzung bar bya zhing rang gi lus las kyang dpung
T02D2512-2:56b-32: gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyung la des gzhan gyi

T02D2512-2:56b-38: ba byas la mi la sogs pa'i gtse ba dang
T02D2512-2:56b-39: phrad na rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02D2512-2:57a-1: dang mthe bos legs so legs so zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:57a-2: sbyin pa'i tshul du yang dang yang du byas la
T02D2512-2:57a-3: / rang gi lus las byung ba dang /
T02D2512-2:57a-4: rdo rje legs pa'i sku la legs so zhes bya
T02D2512-2:57a-5: ba'i sgra brjod ba la brtson pas mi la sogs
T02D2512-2:57a-6: pa'i gdug pa bcom par gyur par bsam par bya'o
T02D2512-2:57a-7: // de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:57a-8: bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo
T02D2512-2:57a-9: rje gsang ba'i bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis so zhes
T02D2512-2:57a-10: bya ba ni de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-2:57a-12: bdag nyid bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gzugs su bsams la /
T02D2512-2:57a-13: de'i phyag rgya bcings te bdud rtsi thab sbyor sku mdog nag po zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2512-2:57a-14: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:57a-15: phyag g-yon gcig gis sdigs mdzub byed pa la brtson pa /
T02D2512-2:57a-16: gnyis pas gtun shing bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:57a-17: gsum pas zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:57a-19: drag po chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bsam mo //
T02D2512-2:57a-20: de nas rang gi lus las bdud rtsi thab sbyor
T02D2512-2:57a-21: gyi gzugs dpag tu med pa spros la des bgegs
T02D2512-2:57a-23: de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje bsdams pa
T02D2512-2:57a-24: bcings la mdzub mo gnyis dang mthe bo gnyis cung
T02D2512-2:57a-25: zad phye ste cung zad bkug la /
T02D2512-2:57a-26: mdzub mo gnyis mche ba ltar khar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:57a-27: 'di ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-2:57a-28: dgra bo thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni
T02D2512-2:57a-29: rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'thor bas so zhes

T02D2512-2:57a-34: dgra bo thams cad rnam par gzhom pa'i don du

T02D2512-2:57a-37: rang gi lus la rdo rje gnod sbyin dang srin po dang ro langs rnams phyung ste /
T02D2512-2:57a-38: des de rnams rnam par gzhig par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:57a-39: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te dgra bo
T02D2512-2:57a-40: rnam par gzhig pa'i bsam pas rdo rje bsdams pa
T02D2512-2:57b-0: bcings la @57b bskor te dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:57b-1: bdud kyi stobs thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo
T02D2512-2:57b-2: rje gsang ba'i rab tu 'dul bas so zhes bya

T02D2512-2:57b-4: 'byor byas la / bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod par bsams la /

T02D2512-2:57b-9: la sogs pa khro bo rnams spros pa des bdud
T02D2512-2:57b-10: kyi sde thams cad gzhom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:57b-11: sprin bskyed pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin
T02D2512-2:57b-12: chen pos so zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du
T02D2512-2:57b-13: rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /

T02D2512-2:57b-16: rdo rje klu spros te dang po'i rdo rje sprin
T02D2512-2:57b-17: bskyed pa'i tshul du byas la /

T02D2512-2:57b-19: 'khor bsams pa tsam gyis bteg par 'gyur bar bsam

T02D2512-2:57b-21: char dbab pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin
T02D2512-2:57b-22: gyis so zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du rdo

T02D2512-2:57b-26: la rtse mor des char gyi rgyun 'bab pa'i tshul
T02D2512-2:57b-27: du byas la / des kyang rdo rje klu nam
T02D2512-2:57b-28: mkha'i ngos thams cad bkang la char gyi rgyun 'bebs

T02D2512-2:57b-37: la rtse mo sbyar te rtse mo de la ram

T02D2512-2:58a-41: rdo rje gsang ba'i thar bas so zhes bya ba

T02D2512-2:58b-1: sa ma lus pa g-yos pa ste /
T02D2512-2:58b-3: de nyid ni 'gul ba yin no //

T02D2512-2:58b-6: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la /

T02D2512-2:58b-8: ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis kyis btsir

T02D2512-2:58b-16: sems dpa' ni bde ba chen po klu'i rgyal po'o
T02D2512-2:58b-17: ba la / // de'i phyag rgya ni de ston par byed pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-2:58b-18: des chu'i phung po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:58b-20: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas
T02D2512-2:58b-21: la dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis

T02D2512-2:58b-23: rdo rje klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsams
T02D2512-2:58b-24: nas chu med pa'i sa phyogs su 'og gi cha'i
T02D2512-2:58b-25: klu'i gnas nas re la sogs pa phug ste /

T02D2512-2:58b-28: par gyur par bsam bar bya ste /

T02D2512-2:58b-30: mun pa chen por snang ba bskyed pa la ni
T02D2512-2:58b-31: rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba

T02D2512-2:59a-8: mo gnyis lcags kyur byas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi

T02D2512-2:59a-11: 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'dzin pa'o //

T02D2512-2:59a-13: po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can du bsams la

T02D2512-2:59a-15: nas nam mkha' la gzugs brnyan thams cad bstan par
T02D2512-2:59a-16: / bya'o // nam mkha' las dngos po thams cad
T02D2512-2:59a-17: 'byung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba
T02D2512-2:59a-18: 'byung bas so zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du

T02D2512-2:59a-21: su byas la lcags kyu de nam mkha' la dngos
T02D2512-2:59a-22: po thams cad bskyed pa'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2512-2:59a-23: de nyid ni de'i 'og nas ston pas 'chad de /
T02D2512-2:59a-24: rol pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes
T02D2512-2:59a-25: so zhes ston pas 'chad de rab tu dga' ba'i

T02D2512-2:59a-28: par bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:59a-29: nam mkha' las rang gi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba la ni /
T02D2512-2:59a-30: rdo rje gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis so zhes bya
T02D2512-2:59a-31: ba ni de bzhin du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-2:59a-32: sbyor ba byas la bshad ma thag pa'i lcags kyu

T02D2512-2:67a-6: kyang rang gi rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas rang

T02D2512-2:67a-15: de yang rtog pa gzhan rnams las shin tu lhag

T02D2512-2:68a-0: @68a * // nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par byed pa'o //

T02D2512-2:77b-13: bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to ;

T02D2512-2:77b-21: dngos grub tu 'gyur pa yin pa de bzhin du
T02D2512-2:77b-22: rnam par snang mdzad bsgrubs pas kyang 'bras bu 'byung
T02D2512-2:77b-24: 'di skad ston te badzra aanydza li zhes bya bas rdo rje thal mo bcing par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:77b-25: de nas badzra bandha zhes bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02D2512-2:77b-26: badzra bandha trat ces bya pas rdo rje bsdams pas snying gar lan gsum dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:77b-27: de nas badzra a'a be sha zhes bya bas rdo
T02D2512-2:77b-28: rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2512-2:77b-29: aa zhes pas bdag nyid dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:77b-30: tishtha badzra zhes bya bas dbab pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar bkrol la /
T02D2512-2:77b-31: badzra mushita zhes zlos shing dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings la /
T02D2512-2:77b-32: aom badzra sindha bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:77b-33: de nas yi ge h'um gis dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02D2512-2:77b-34: h'um nyid zlos shing phyag rgya bcings pa thams cad rang dbang du bya'o //
T02D2512-2:77b-35: de nas snga ma bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:77b-36: de nas sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i lcags
T02D2512-2:77b-37: kyu ma bcings la ye shes sems dpa'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-2:77b-38: can gyi rna par snang mdzad lus la bcug la
T02D2512-2:78a-0: / bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings las ma ya @78a * //
T02D2512-2:78a-2: zhes brjod de 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'od zer dmar
T02D2512-2:78a-3: po 'bar ba kun du 'khrug pa bskyed nas sa
T02D2512-2:78a-4: ma ya stvam / aa ham aom dh'i zhes lan gsum bzlas te /
T02D2512-2:78a-5: rang gi lus kyi nang du chud pa'i bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:78a-6: 'das dang bdag nyid chu dang 'o ma ltar gcig
T02D2512-2:78a-7: tu gyur par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78a-8: de nas chos kyi phyag rgya lce la bkod cing /
T02D2512-2:78a-10: phyag rgya chen po yang bcings la /
T02D2512-2:78a-11: de bzhin du yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-2:78a-12: sbyor bas sangs rgyas thams cad lus la bcug la
T02D2512-2:78a-13: / rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78a-14: de nas de rnams chos dang las dang phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:78a-15: chen pos rgyas btab la dang pos rdo rje bcings
T02D2512-2:78a-16: te / snga ma bzhin du badzra satva /
T02D2512-2:78a-19: badzra karma badzra aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2512-2:78a-20: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-2:78a-21: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi
T02D2512-2:78a-22: cho ga rnams rjes su spyang la rdo rje mtshon
T02D2512-2:78a-23: cha ma la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis
T02D2512-2:78a-24: bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2512-2:78a-25: rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' byed rdo rje'i bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:78a-26: 'das la phyag byas nas phyag bzhi yang bya ste
T02D2512-2:78a-27: / de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung ;
T02D2512-2:78a-28: / chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2512-2:78a-29: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya che //
T02D2512-2:78a-30: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02D2512-2:78a-31: zhes bya ba rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje la /
T02D2512-2:78a-32: aom dh'i zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la /
T02D2512-2:78a-33: rdo rje dam tshig gis zlos shing phyag rgya chen po bcings la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78a-34: de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa lan
T02D2512-2:78a-35: cig byas na ji srid zla ba gcig gam zla
T02D2512-2:78a-36: ba drug gam lo gcig gis bdag nyid rnam pa
T02D2512-2:78a-37: snang mdzad du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa
T02D2512-2:78a-38: de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78a-39: de nas zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78a-40: de nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:78a-41: gal te ras la bsgrub par 'dod na sngar bshad
T02D2512-2:78a-42: pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma thob par gyur pa dang
T02D2512-2:78a-43: / ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'drir gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:78b-0: de'i @78b phyogs dang mtshams rnams su de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:78b-1: pa'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2512-2:78b-2: brgyad bris la / de'i mdun du bdag la byin
T02D2512-2:78b-3: gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la ras ris
T02D2512-2:78b-4: la bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs la mchod pa thams
T02D2512-2:78b-5: cad kyis ji ltar de bzhin du yang dag par
T02D2512-2:78b-6: mchod la phyag byas nas mdun du 'dug la snying
T02D2512-2:78b-7: gar gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i dbus
T02D2512-2:78b-8: su aom dh'i zhes bya ba yid kyis bris la
T02D2512-2:78b-9: brgyad bris la / / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
T02D2512-2:78b-10: rgya chen po bcings la bzlas brjod 'bum ji lta
T02D2512-2:78b-12: de nas zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78b-13: mtshan phyed na bdud kyi dpung mthong bar 'gyur la
T02D2512-2:78b-14: de bzhin du bdud thams cad bcom pas gzhom par
T02D2512-2:78b-15: bya'o // de nas de bzhin du phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-2:78b-16: po bcings la bsgom par byas la nang par de
T02D2512-2:78b-18: byang chub sems dpa' chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:78b-19: gal te rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid thob
T02D2512-2:78b-20: par 'dod na de bzhin du mtshan ma thob pas
T02D2512-2:78b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs sngar bshad pa'i mtshan
T02D2512-2:78b-22: nyid can byed du gzhug go //
T02D2512-2:78b-23: de nas de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal
T02D2512-2:78b-24: 'byor byas la sku gzugs la rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-2:78b-25: gsang ba'i lcags kyu mas spyan drangs la /
T02D2512-2:78b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78b-27: de nas aom dh'i zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:78b-28: pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpa'i lnga
T02D2512-2:78b-30: rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-2:78b-31: phyag rgya chen po yang nye bar bstan par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78b-32: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2512-2:78b-33: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa /
T02D2512-2:78b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang
T02D2512-2:78b-35: dag par mchod nas rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i
T02D2512-2:78b-36: rdo rje dang / phyag bzhis phyag bya'o //
T02D2512-2:78b-37: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:78b-38: aom dh'i zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje sems
T02D2512-2:78b-39: dpa' bdag nyid bsgoms na zla ba drug na rdo
T02D2512-2:79a-0: gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la de bzhin gshegs pa @79a * //
T02D2512-2:79a-1: 'gugs na de bzhin du mtshan ma thob pas /
T02D2512-2:79a-2: de'i mdun du 'dug la gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma bcings te /
T02D2512-2:79a-3: aom dh'i zhes bya bas nyin re zhing bdag la
T02D2512-2:79a-4: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas bsgrub
T02D2512-2:79a-5: par bya'o // de nas bzla pa phyed kyis thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro//
T02D2512-2:79a-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen pos
T02D2512-2:79a-7: bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa bsgrub par 'dod na
T02D2512-2:79a-8: de bzhin du mtshan ma thob nas phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-2:79a-9: po bcings la la ba phyed tsam bsgoms nas mthar
T02D2512-2:79a-10: mtshan thog thag bsgoms na de'i 'og tu de bzhin
T02D2512-2:79a-12: de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:79a-13: pa bshad ma thag pa'i bsgrubs pas ma bsgrubs pa'i
T02D2512-2:79a-14: snying po ni ma bsgrubs pa ste /
T02D2512-2:79a-15: ma bsgrubs pa'i snying po lan cig bzlas pas thams
T02D2512-2:79a-16: cad bsrung ba la sogs pa'i las rnams byed par
T02D2512-2:79a-17: 'gyur ro // thams cad bsrung ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:79a-18: rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:79a-19: snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2512-2:79a-20: 'gyur ro // byas la / rdo rje bsdams pa lag mthil phye ba bcings la /
T02D2512-2:79a-21: mthe bo gnyis dpa' bo'i skyil mo krung du byas
T02D2512-2:79a-22: la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te rtse mo byas nas
T02D2512-2:79a-23: / aom dh'i zhes bya ba zlos shing spyi gtsug tu gzhag la bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:79a-24: lhan cig tu gyur par bas la yid kyis bsgrub
T02D2512-2:79a-25: par bya ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
T02D2512-2:79a-26: rtsa gnyis dbu'i gtsug tor dang ldan pa'i /
T02D2512-2:79a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:79a-28: de lta bus ni thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:79a-29: sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni
T02D2512-2:79a-30: rdo rje mdzod spus so zhes bya ba ni de
T02D2512-2:79a-31: bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba byas la
T02D2512-2:79a-32: / bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgyas bzlog nas mdzod spu ru mdzub mo'i rtse mo gnyis bzhag la /
T02D2512-2:79a-33: mdzod spu'i phyogs nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje
T02D2512-2:79a-34: mdzod spu spros la des bsgrub par bya ba zhal
T02D2512-2:79a-35: gyis bzhes te zil gyis mnan te /
T02D2512-2:79a-36: rang gi rkang mthil du babs shing rang dbang du bya bar bsam par byas te /
T02D2512-2:79a-37: de lta bus dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:79a-38: chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje chos kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:79a-39: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2512-2:79b-0: thams cad @79b bsrung ba'i phyag rgya de nyid snying gar bzhag ste /
T02D2512-2:79b-1: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o
T02D2512-2:79b-2: zhes bsgom zhing rdo rje chos kyi skur yang bdag
T02D2512-2:79b-4: de lta bus ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:79b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos
T02D2512-2:79b-6: grub ni rdo rje mchod pas so zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:79b-7: ni snga ma bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal
T02D2512-2:79b-8: 'byor byas la bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya gar
T02D2512-2:79b-9: gyi khu tshur gyis bskor la mkhur ba spyi gtsug
T02D2512-2:79b-11: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa mchod pa
T02D2512-2:79b-12: rnams kyis bdag nyid mchod par bsam par bya ste
T02D2512-2:79b-13: / de lta bus ni mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:79b-14: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bos so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:79b-15: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings pa ste /
T02D2512-2:79b-16: rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid bsams la mdzub
T02D2512-2:79b-17: mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub bya zhing rang gi snying
T02D2512-2:79b-18: gar rdo rje'i rigs rnams spros la nges gdug pa
T02D2512-2:79b-20: byang chub kyi spyod pa ma lus par rdzogs par
T02D2512-2:79b-21: bya ba la ni rdo rje spyod pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:79b-22: so zhes bya ba ni bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:79b-23: pa'i rnal 'byor byas la de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu
T02D2512-2:79b-24: tshur gnyis kyis sbyin pa gtong ba ltar bya zhing
T02D2512-2:79b-25: / thams cad sgrol ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis dbye ba mtha' yas pa dang /
T02D2512-2:79b-26: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis nam mkha'i
T02D2512-2:79b-27: khams thams cad gang ba'i sbyin pa gtong bar byed
T02D2512-2:79b-28: par bdag gnyid bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:79b-29: bdud thams cad gzhom pa la ni bdud thams cad
T02D2512-2:79b-30: 'joms par byed pas so zhes bya ba ni de
T02D2512-2:79b-31: bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2512-2:79b-32: g-yon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur snying gar
T02D2512-2:79b-33: bzhag la g-yas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur
T02D2512-2:79b-34: gyi sor mo thams cad brkyang bas sa la reg
T02D2512-2:79b-35: par bya zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod
T02D2512-2:79b-36: pa'i skur bdag nyid bsams la rang gi lus las
T02D2512-2:79b-37: byung ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pas bdud
T02D2512-2:79b-38: bcom par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:79b-39: de lta bus ni bdud thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:80a-0: 'dir rang gi snying pos kyang rdo rje sems dpar lhag par mos @80a * //
T02D2512-2:80a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du bya ba
T02D2512-2:80a-3: la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis
T02D2512-2:80a-5: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-2:80a-6: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-2:80a-7: ji srid bdag nyid de'i gzugs su gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:80a-8: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-2:80a-9: de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde
T02D2512-2:80a-10: ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba nyid kyi cho
T02D2512-2:80a-12: de ston par byed pa'i rtog pa'i rgyun no //
T02D2512-2:80a-13: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab
T02D2512-2:80a-14: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya
T02D2512-2:80a-15: ba las dum bu gnyis par tsa ba'i rgyud las
T02D2512-2:80a-16: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:80a-18: // / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems
T02D2512-2:80a-19: can rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir de
T02D2512-2:80a-20: bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:80a-21: da mi khro bas khro ba spang ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:80a-22: de nas bcom ldan ldas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:80a-23: pas rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa gsungs pa yin
T02D2512-2:80a-24: no // de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2512-2:80a-25: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-2:80a-26: 'dir dang po sbyor ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i kyil 'khor chen por bshad pa nyid do //
T02D2512-2:80a-27: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2512-2:80a-28: thogs pa med pa ni mi choms pa'o //
T02D2512-2:80a-29: don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'o //
T02D2512-2:80a-31: de nyid kyi bstan pa 'di la mnga' bas na
T02D2512-2:80a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med cing don yod
T02D2512-2:80a-33: pa'i bka'i bstan pa la rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D2512-2:80a-34: gsol ba btab po zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2512-2:80a-35: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /
T02D2512-2:80a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:80a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen
T02D2512-2:80a-38: po ni gnyis su med pa'i thugs rdo rje chen
T02D2512-2:80a-39: po'o // des bskyed pa'i rdo rje'i rigs ni thabs so //
T02D2512-2:80a-40: de nyid ni bde ba chen po'i khro bo thob
T02D2512-2:80a-41: pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir bde ba chen po'i khro
T02D2512-2:80a-42: bo ste / de las skye zhing de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir bde ba chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:80b-0: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang @80b yin
T02D2512-2:80b-1: pa de la ni ming de skad ces bya ste
T02D2512-2:80b-2: / de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:80b-3: rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' ni rang nyid kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2512-2:80b-4: rang gi byang chub kyi thugs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:80b-5: de la gsol ba btab po zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab par 'gyur ro ;
T02D2512-2:80b-6: / bde ba chen po rab grub phyir //
T02D2512-2:80b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:80b-8: gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:80b-9: rang rigs sprul mdzad rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2512-2:80b-10: ces bya ba ni gdug pa yang yin la thams
T02D2512-2:80b-11: cad kyang yin pas na gdug pa thams cad de
T02D2512-2:80b-13: de rnams gzhom pa ni sdig pa las bzlog pa'i phyir btsir zhing tshar gcod pa'o //
T02D2512-2:80b-14: rang gi rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs so //
T02D2512-2:80b-15: sprul par mdzod cig pa ni skyed par mdzod cig pa'o //
T02D2512-2:80b-16: rdo rje 'dzin ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D2512-2:80b-17: de nas zhes bya ba ni gsol ba btab pa'i
T02D2512-2:80b-18: rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D2512-2:80b-19: dpa' khro bo gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro

T02D2512-2:84a-10: de ltar phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:84a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags zlos shing /

T02D2512-2:84a-14: rdo rje 'bar ba rtse bzhi pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:84a-15: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags bsams la /
T02D2512-2:84a-16: de nyid zlos shing rdo rje 'bar ba ni /

T02D2512-2:84b-12: rdo rje skyil krung legs bzhugs nyid //

T02D2512-2:84b-17: legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas lus la de

T02D2512-2:84b-26: nyid du byin gyis brlabs la sangs rgyas lnga dang

T02D2512-2:84b-28: de nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi

T02D2512-2:84b-36: yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:84b-37: de nas chos kyi dril bu dkrol lo //
T02D2512-2:84b-38: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:84b-39: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje

T02D2512-2:84b-46: srid kyi bar du khro bo'i tshig gis bzlas brjod

T02D2512-2:85a-36: de'i mdun du de bzhin du rab tu dga' ba'i
T02D2512-2:85a-37: rdo rje khro bo'i rnal 'byor byas la sku gzugs
T02D2512-2:85a-38: la / bcom ldan 'das sngar bshad pa'i spyan drang
T02D2512-2:85a-39: ba'i chogs spyan drangs la mchod pa thams cad kyis
T02D2512-2:85a-40: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod nas

T02D2512-2:85b-11: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bor 'gyur ro

T02D2512-2:85b-33: khro bo'i sngags bzlas pas las rnams grub par gyur

T02D2512-2:86a-1: kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod byas nas rang

T02D2512-2:86a-3: skus dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad
T02D2512-2:86a-4: rjes su btul bar bsam par bya'o //

T02D2512-2:86a-7: bya ba ni sems can gyi khams thams cad skal

T02D2512-2:86a-9: pa'i bdag nyid can la rab tu gzhag pa ni
T02D2512-2:86a-10: btul ba'o // de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /

T02D2512-2:86a-12: rdo rje khro bo ni rdo rje khro bo ste /
T02D2512-2:86a-13: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i gsang ba
T02D2512-2:86a-14: ni rdo rje khro bo'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste

T02D2512-2:86a-21: 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis rjes su bstan cing
T02D2512-2:86a-22: dul ba la rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:86a-23: 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:86a-24: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten las
T02D2512-2:86a-25: rgyal ba ni 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las

T02D2512-2:86a-27: 'jig rten gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rjes so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:86a-28: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyor ba byas la /

T02D2512-2:86a-30: pas sdigs mdzub byas shing rang gi lus las byung
T02D2512-2:86a-31: ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi zhabs
T02D2512-2:86a-32: g-yon pas bsgrub par bya ba mnan par byas te
T02D2512-2:86a-33: / de lta bus ni 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:86a-34: thams cad dgug pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:86a-35: pa la dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa dgug
T02D2512-2:86a-36: pa ni thams cad dgug pa'o //

T02D2512-2:88a-0: @88a * // yang 'di'i don bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brjod par bya ste /

T02D2512-2:89b-24: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la rang gi sngags kyis mchod yon phul la /

T02D2512-2:89b-26: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos
T02D2512-2:89b-27: rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya gnyis kyis
T02D2512-2:89b-28: dbang bskur la / yang mchod yon phul la mchod
T02D2512-2:89b-29: pa dang rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:89b-30: phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par
T02D2512-2:89b-31: mchod nas rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' pa'i rdo rje
T02D2512-2:89b-32: dang phyag byas la phyi rol tu gtor ma byin
T02D2512-2:89b-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la
T02D2512-2:89b-35: yang dag par mchod nas phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2512-2:89b-36: la ji srid mtshan ma ma thob par gyur pa
T02D2512-2:89b-37: de srid kyi bar du dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o
T02D2512-2:89b-38: // de nas phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:89b-39: srid pa'i bde ba dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:90a-2: 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub che //
T02D2512-2:90a-3: 'gro ba kun la'ang grub pa yin //
T02D2512-2:90a-4: de ltar gnang ba thob nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o /
T02D2512-2:90a-5: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:90a-7: // / de nas bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:90a-8: yongs su gzung ba'i slob ma sdom pa don du
T02D2512-2:90a-9: gnyer ba la sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02D2512-2:90a-10: de nas de'i snying gar rdo rje de bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:90a-11: de nas de rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro
T02D2512-2:90a-12: bo'i byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog la
T02D2512-2:90a-13: sogs pas mchod de yon gyi mchog blangs la phyi
T02D2512-2:90a-14: rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la
T02D2512-2:90a-15: rang gi 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bcug la rna bar
T02D2512-2:90a-17: 'dod chags bral ba zhes bya ba nas ma byed
T02D2512-2:90a-18: cig ces bya ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2512-2:90a-19: dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho ga ltar de'i cho
T02D2512-2:90a-21: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:90a-23: // / cho ga gzhan dag ni gsal bas ma bshad do //
T02D2512-2:90a-24: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab
T02D2512-2:90a-25: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya
T02D2512-2:90a-26: ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las
T02D2512-2:90a-27: / rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:90a-29: // / de ltar khro bas khro ba spang ba'i phyir
T02D2512-2:90a-30: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa
T02D2512-2:90a-31: gsungs nas da ni log par lta ba'i gnyen por
T02D2512-2:90a-32: gyur pa yang dag par lta ba'i rang bzhin can
T02D2512-2:90a-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid
T02D2512-2:90a-34: padma'i rigs bstan pa'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:90a-36: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bar ma chad
T02D2512-2:90a-37: pa ste dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o
T02D2512-2:90a-38: // 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
T02D2512-2:90a-39: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad
T02D2512-2:90a-41: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do ;
T02D2512-2:90a-42: / de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad
T02D2512-2:90a-43: kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2512-2:90a-44: de rang bzhin gyis dag cing gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2512-2:90a-45: sems dang sems las byung ba de nyid ni don
T02D2512-2:90a-46: yod cing thogs pa med pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:90a-47: thams cad dag pa ni sgrib pa med pa'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-0: padma'i @90b rigs kyi tshul gyi chos gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-1: de de ltar gyur pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyi byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-2: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /
T02D2512-2:90b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:90b-4: la sogs pa gsungs ta da bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-2:90b-5: cad kyi / rdo rje ye shes ni chos thams
T02D2512-2:90b-6: cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes nges par byas
T02D2512-2:90b-7: cad kyi / pa'o // de'i phyag rgya ni padma'i
T02D2512-2:90b-8: rigs te de gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du sems can
T02D2512-2:90b-9: gyi khams rgyas btab nas phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-10: dngos por 'dzin pa'i mngon par zhen pa ni sgrib pa'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-11: de 'di la mi mnga' bas na sgrib pa med pa'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-12: de'i phyag rgya ni padma'i rigs te des gzugs de
T02D2512-2:90b-13: lta bu gang yin pa de la dmigs pas mid
T02D2512-2:90b-14: de skad bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin
T02D2512-2:90b-15: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i rdo
T02D2512-2:90b-16: rje ye shes kyi tshul gyi phyag rgya zhes bya
T02D2512-2:90b-17: ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o
T02D2512-2:90b-18: // snyoms par zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-20: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad padma'i rigs kyi
T02D2512-2:90b-21: rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad de padma'i rigs
T02D2512-2:90b-22: kyi rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad de padma'i
T02D2512-2:90b-23: rigs sprul nas sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-2:90b-24: rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin
T02D2512-2:90b-25: no // bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:90b-26: padma yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na padma'i rigs chen no //
T02D2512-2:90b-27: de nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dri ma dang bral bas na dag pa'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-28: skyed par mdzod ces bya ba ni 'byung bar mdzod cig pa'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-29: mchog kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na mchog yin te /
T02D2512-2:90b-30: rang bzhin gyis yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis thams cad du song bas na chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:90b-31: tshul de nyid kyi dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
T02D2512-2:90b-32: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag
T02D2512-2:90b-33: pa ste gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la zhes
T02D2512-2:90b-35: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ste sngags gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2512-2:90b-36: ci zhig mdzad nas she na /
T02D2512-2:91a-0: chos thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te chos kyang yin la @91a * //
T02D2512-2:91a-1: thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad de padma'i rigs kyi tshul lo //
T02D2512-2:91a-2: de rnams la gzigs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul gyis so sor rtog par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:91a-3: de nas rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2512-2:91a-4: rnam par gnon pa ni mthu rtsal lo //
T02D2512-2:91a-5: padma'i rigs kyi sprul pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas sngags gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:91a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:91a-7: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhal nas so
T02D2512-2:91a-8: // padma'i mdog gi mdangs can zhes bya ba ni dkar dmar ro //
T02D2512-2:91a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od can no zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-2:91a-10: de rnams kyi phyag na ci zhig bsnams zhes padma'i
T02D2512-2:91a-11: mda' la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya
T02D2512-2:91a-12: ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:91a-13: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa de
T02D2512-2:91a-14: dag nyid padmas mtshan pa'i rdo rje mda' la sogs
T02D2512-2:91a-15: pa bsnams pa padma'i rigs kyi tshul gyis byung ngo
T02D2512-2:91a-16: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:91a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba 'chang zhes bya
T02D2512-2:91a-18: ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med
T02D2512-2:91a-21: na bza' dmar po 'chang ba zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:91a-22: padma chen po'i sems dpa' rnams phyung nas dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:91a-23: chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:91a-24: padma chen po'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i ngo bor sems
T02D2512-2:91a-25: dpa' de rnams rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi
T02D2512-2:91a-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs kyis
T02D2512-2:91a-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug yongs
T02D2512-2:91a-29: su bskor nas / phyogs dang mtshams rnams su zhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:91a-30: bcom ldan 'das ni 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02D2512-2:91a-31: zhal rab tu bzhad pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i don gzigs pas so //
T02D2512-2:91a-32: g-yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje rang gi
T02D2512-2:91a-33: thugs gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams zhing g-yon pas
T02D2512-2:91a-34: zhes bya ba g-yon gyi padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo
T02D2512-2:91a-35: rje padma 'dzin zhing bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis padma'i skyil
T02D2512-2:91a-37: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas
T02D2512-2:91b-0: brtsams te rdo rje skyil mo @91b krung gis bzhugs
T02D2512-2:91b-1: so zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ting nge 'dzin gnyis
T02D2512-2:91b-3: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro bas rang gi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2512-2:91b-4: rdo rje padma'i lcags kyu la sogs pa'i las kyi
T02D2512-2:91b-5: phyag rgya rnams bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D2512-2:91b-6: dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang /
T02D2512-2:91b-7: bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba la dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:91b-8: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-2:91b-9: rnams kyis rgyas btab la mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang
T02D2512-2:91b-10: bskur ba'am padma'i phreng bas dbang bskur la las rnams
T02D2512-2:91b-12: de la las ni 'di dag yin te /
T02D2512-2:91b-13: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:91b-14: de'i sngags bzlas nas 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:91b-15: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug rang bzhin gyis dag
T02D2512-2:91b-16: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sems can gyi khams thams
T02D2512-2:91b-17: cad rnam par dag par mdzod cig ces brjod do
T02D2512-2:91b-18: // de nas padma'i rdo rje yid las byung ba'i phyag rgya chen bo bcings la /
T02D2512-2:91b-19: bcom ldan 'das padmo'i rdo rje yid las byung ba
T02D2512-2:91b-20: padma'i 'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas
T02D2512-2:91b-21: la sems can gyi khams rab tu 'jog par mdzod
T02D2512-2:91b-23: padma k'i li k'i la'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2512-2:91b-24: la bcom ldan 'das padma k'i li k'i la la
T02D2512-2:91b-25: sems can gyi khams ma lus pa padma'i rigs pa'i
T02D2512-2:91b-26: gnas rnam par dag pa'i gnas la 'jog par mdzod
T02D2512-2:91b-27: ces brjod do // de bzhin du padma'i 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:91b-28: bcom ldan 'das padma'i 'bebs pas sems can gyi khams
T02D2512-2:91b-29: ma lus pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i padma
T02D2512-2:91b-30: 'bebs pa'i ye shes nyid kyis dbang du mdzod cig
T02D2512-2:91b-31: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:91b-32: 'di ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:91b-33: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bshad nas da ni
T02D2512-2:91b-34: dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis
T02D2512-2:91b-35: bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i
T02D2512-2:91b-36: don bstan par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor zhes bya
T02D2512-2:92a-0: ba @92a * // la sogs pa la slob dpon gyi las kyi chog dang /
T02D2512-2:92a-1: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:92a-2: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2512-2:92a-3: dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo //
T02D2512-2:92a-4: zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:92a-5: 'khor chen po'i dbyibs ltar 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig
T02D2512-2:92a-6: gdab par bya'o // de'i nang du snga ma bzhin
T02D2512-2:92a-7: du ka brgyad kyi tshul gyi padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D2512-2:92a-8: pa la padma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba bri
T02D2512-2:92a-9: ba ni rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug dang padma
T02D2512-2:92a-10: rdo rje yid las byung ba dang /
T02D2512-2:92a-11: padma k'i li k'i la dang ;
T02D2512-2:92a-13: padma bsnyems pa'i sngags thig skud la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing /
T02D2512-2:92a-14: aom badzra s'u tra sa ma ya s'u tram ma
T02D2512-2:92a-15: ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams
T02D2512-2:92a-16: pa bzung la thig skud la brgya rtsa brgyad bzla
T02D2512-2:92a-17: bar bya'o // de nas des dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo //
T02D2512-2:92a-18: de bzhin du thams cad du yang bdag po lnga'i
T02D2512-2:92a-19: sngags bzlas pa de'i rjes la thig gdab pa'i sngags
T02D2512-2:92a-20: thig skud la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa yin
T02D2512-2:92a-22: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag //
T02D2512-2:92a-23: padmas mtshan pa'i tshogs rnams bri //
T02D2512-2:92a-24: zhes bya ba ni de ltar dkyil 'khor thig btab
T02D2512-2:92a-25: nas de bzhin du yang bdag po lnga'i sngags bzlas
T02D2512-2:92a-26: la / tshon rtsi dgye ba byas la bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:92a-27: 'das rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug dkyil 'khor dbus
T02D2512-2:92a-28: ma'i dbus su ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag cing
T02D2512-2:92a-29: bzhugs su gsol la padma'i rdo rje yid las byung
T02D2512-2:92a-30: ba nas padma 'bebs pa'i bar du rang rang gi
T02D2512-2:92a-31: gnas su ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-2:92a-32: la / // aom hr'i: bam ho: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'o //
T02D2512-2:92a-33: gzhan dag gi ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:92a-34: chen por bshad pa'i snying po rnams yin par shes
T02D2512-2:92a-35: par bya'o // de nas dkyil 'khor bris nas slob dpon rdo rje padma'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-2:92a-36: badzra badzra zhes bya ba rdo rje shugs zlos shing
T02D2512-2:92a-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i
T02D2512-2:92a-38: glu yang len cing 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:92a-39: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo
T02D2512-2:92a-40: rje bcings la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng la bkug ste
T02D2512-2:92b-0: padma'i @92b 'dab ma gnyis kyi tshul gyis bkan te
T02D2512-2:92b-1: bzhag la snying ga'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni rdo
T02D2512-2:92b-2: rje padma ste dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2512-2:92b-3: // 'dis zhugs pa la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2512-2:92b-4: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:92b-5: de nas bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod nas /
T02D2512-2:92b-6: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:92b-7: mdzub mo'i lcags kyu gnyis kyis zhes bya ba 'jug
T02D2512-2:92b-8: pa'i phyag rgya'i mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis
T02D2512-2:92b-9: byas la spyan drang ba'i sngags zlos shing des dgug
T02D2512-2:92b-10: par bya'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:92b-11: cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin no zhes
T02D2512-2:92b-12: bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D2512-2:92b-13: cho ga thams cad ji ltar gsungs pa 'dir yang
T02D2512-2:92b-14: de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2512-2:92b-15: // de ltar gzhung 'dis slob dpon gyi las kyi
T02D2512-2:92b-16: cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:92b-17: cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:92b-18: yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste bdag bsrung ba
T02D2512-2:92b-19: dang gnas bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i
T02D2512-2:92b-20: phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'jig rten dbang
T02D2512-2:92b-21: phyug gi gsung gi dkyil 'khor sbrul te /
T02D2512-2:92b-22: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa byas nas sngom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:92b-23: de nas rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams
T02D2512-2:92b-24: pa bcings la rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral
T02D2512-2:92b-25: bar bya'o // de nas rdo rje 'bebs pas bdag
T02D2512-2:92b-26: nyid la dbab par byas la rang gi snying gar
T02D2512-2:92b-27: phyag rgya dgrol bar byas nas rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2512-2:92b-28: gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snga ma
T02D2512-2:92b-29: bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje bcing bar bya'o //

T02D2512-2:98b-35: la rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su rin
T02D2512-2:98b-36: po che yid las byung ba la sogs pa bri'o
T02D2512-2:98b-37: // rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs te
T02D2512-2:98b-38: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thal mo brkyang la
T02D2512-2:99a-2: dbral ba'i mdzod spu'i gnas su gzhag pa 'di ni thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-2:99a-3: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-2:99a-4: 'dis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la /
T02D2512-2:99a-5: badzra badzra zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:99a-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs pa'i
T02D2512-2:99a-7: 'jug pa'i glu zlos shing dkyil 'khor du ji lta
T02D2512-2:99a-9: mdzub mo gnyis po de nyid lcags kyur byas la
T02D2512-2:99a-10: dgug pa bya zhing zhugs nas cho ga thams cad
T02D2512-2:99a-11: rdzogs par byas la 'jug pa'i phyag gya las mdzub
T02D2512-2:99a-12: mo gnyis lcags kyu gnyis su byas te de dang
T02D2512-2:99a-13: spyan 'dren pa'i sngags kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams
T02D2512-2:99a-14: cad bkug nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:99a-15: de nas zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-2:99a-16: cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin no zhes
T02D2512-2:99a-17: bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:99a-18: du gsungs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub pa'i
T02D2512-2:99a-19: rgyun rnams gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2512-2:99a-20: // 'di skad ston te bdag bsrung ba dang /
T02D2512-2:99a-21: gnas bsrung ba byas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-2:99a-22: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi cho ga bshad pa'i tshul
T02D2512-2:99a-23: gyis sdig pa dral ba'i mthar thug pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-2:99a-24: rnams rjes su spyad nas rang gi snying gar gnas
T02D2512-2:99a-25: pa'i rdo rje rin po che la aom li ti
T02D2512-2:99a-26: ba be trata tram zhes bya ba yid kyis bris
T02D2512-2:99a-27: la rig pa 'di nyid yid la zlos shing chos
T02D2512-2:99a-28: thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par bya'o
T02D2512-2:99a-29: // de nas rig pa de nyid dbyangs kyi yi
T02D2512-2:99a-30: ge bcu drug dang bcas pas rang gi sems zla
T02D2512-2:99a-32: de'i steng du rig pa de nyid dang /
T02D2512-2:99a-33: ka la sogs pa nas ksha'i mthar thug gi bar
T02D2512-2:99a-34: du skar ma lta bu'i gzugs can 'dra ba las
T02D2512-2:99a-36: yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa rig pa de
T02D2512-2:99a-37: dang bcas pa las dang po'i rdo rje bsam par
T02D2512-2:99a-38: bya'o // de nas rig pa zlos shing rdo rje
T02D2512-2:99a-39: de rdo rje rin po cher bsams la rin po
T02D2512-2:99a-40: che'i dbus su rig pa'i yi ge rnam par bsams
T02D2512-2:99a-41: nas de nyid yid la zlos shing sangs rgyas thams
T02D2512-2:99a-42: cad kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-2:99b-0: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyi mchod pa'i @99b
T02D2512-2:99b-1: dam tshig gi dngos grub bsgrub par bsgom zhing de
T02D2512-2:99b-2: thams cad las nor bu'i rigs yid kyis spros te
T02D2512-2:99b-3: / des sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam
T02D2512-2:99b-4: pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas nas de
T02D2512-2:99b-6: rin po che'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:99b-7: de nas rin po che de sems dpar byin gyis
T02D2512-2:99b-8: brlab pa'i sbyor bas bdag nyid rdo rje sems par
T02D2512-2:99b-9: bskyed la / yang rig pa zlos shing rdo rje
T02D2512-2:99b-10: sems dpa'i de 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por bdag
T02D2512-2:99b-12: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes nga rgyal bskyed la /
T02D2512-2:99b-13: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcings te /
T02D2512-2:99b-14: sa ma yo nya ham zhes bya bas dam tshig ni bdag yin no zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:99b-15: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis
T02D2512-2:99b-16: rang gi snying ga dang dbral ba dang lkog ma
T02D2512-2:99b-17: dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya zhing sa
T02D2512-2:99b-18: ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva mam zhes bya
T02D2512-2:99b-19: bas dam tshig sems dpar byin gyis brlab par bya'o
T02D2512-2:99b-20: // de nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug
T02D2512-2:99b-21: la g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo
T02D2512-2:99b-22: rje rin po che bzung la snyems tshul du byas
T02D2512-2:99b-23: te lag ba g-yas la nor bus mtshan pa'i dang
T02D2512-2:99b-24: po'i rdo rje rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul
T02D2512-2:99b-25: gyis 'jog cing rig pa bzla bar bya ste 'di
T02D2512-2:99b-26: ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:99b-27: de nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang
T02D2512-2:99b-28: gi snying ga'i zla bar yid kyis zhugs la rdo
T02D2512-2:99b-29: rje 'khor los 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:99b-30: 'khor bskyed la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:99b-31: des me tog gi phreng ba blangs la dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:99b-32: zhugs nas me tog gi phreng ba de rang gi mgo la dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:99b-33: de nas de rang gi mgo la ji lta ba
T02D2512-2:99b-34: bzhin du bcings te dngos grub kyir do rje brtul
T02D2512-2:99b-35: zhugs kyi bar gyi cho ga rdzogs par byas nas
T02D2512-2:99b-36: / dkyil 'khor de rang gi snying ga'i zla bar
T02D2512-2:99b-37: zhugs par bsams la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rnal
T02D2512-2:99b-38: 'byor chen po byas nas cho ga thams cad rjes
T02D2512-2:99b-39: su spyad la phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-2:99b-40: yid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su 'dug ste yang rdo
T02D2512-2:100a-0: rje 'khor los nam mkha'i phyogs su rang gi @100a
T02D2512-2:100a-2: lha thams cad kyi gnas su hri las na tshogs padma'i gdan skyed par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:100a-3: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su de bzhin
T02D2512-2:100a-4: du 'dug la bdag nyid la spro ba bskyed par
T02D2512-2:100a-5: bya'o // de nas de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams
T02D2512-2:100a-6: cad spyan drangs par byas nas ting nge 'dzin gsum
T02D2512-2:100a-7: bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // de nas bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:100a-8: 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2512-2:100a-9: la rang gi rig pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:100a-10: de nas de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-2:100a-11: cad kyis bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam
T02D2512-2:100a-12: par bya'o // de nas cho ga thams cad snga
T02D2512-2:100a-13: ma bzhin du rjes su spyad la bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:100a-14: kyis rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2512-2:100a-15: rang gi rig pa zlos shing badzrod tishtha mandalam aud
T02D2512-2:100a-16: tha ba y'a zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de nam
T02D2512-2:100a-17: mkhar gzhag ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid
T02D2512-2:100a-18: kyis bdag nyid la lan cig byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2512-2:100a-19: yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-2:100a-20: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02D2512-2:100a-21: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02D2512-2:100a-22: rang gi rig pa yongs zlos shing //
T02D2512-2:100a-23: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02D2512-2:100a-24: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2512-2:100a-25: las bshad pa'i cho gas snga ma bzhin du cho
T02D2512-2:100a-26: ga thams cad rjes su spyad la dkyil 'khor thig
T02D2512-2:100a-27: gdab bo // yang dag par bris la sngar bshad
T02D2512-2:100a-28: pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam

T02D2512-2:100a-30: ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o //

T02D2512-2:100a-37: gyis gzung ba'i rin po che'i me tog gi lcug
T02D2512-2:100a-39: bum pa gang ba las yongs su bzlas la lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o //

T02D2512-2:100a-41: thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
T02D2512-2:100b-0: pa @100b la yang dag par mchod la rdo rje

T02D2512-2:100b-2: ser pos stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang gdong g-yogs
T02D2512-2:100b-3: byas la / phyag bya ba la sogs pa'i cho

T02D2512-2:100b-5: byang chub kyi sems bskyed de g-yas pa'i rin po
T02D2512-2:100b-6: che khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che bzung
T02D2512-2:100b-7: la rang gi snying gar 'jog cing snying po 'dis
T02D2512-2:100b-8: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rin po che bsam
T02D2512-2:100b-9: byas la / par bya'o // su ra ta sa
