T02D2512-2:100b-11: byas la / par bya'o // / de nas shar
T02D2512-2:100b-12: sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i
T02D2512-2:100b-13: chus g-yas pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis blangs
T02D2512-2:100b-14: la bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya'o //

T02D2512-2:100b-16: kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la badzra badzra
T02D2512-2:100b-17: zhes zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2512-2:100b-18: por bshad pa'i 'jug pa'i glu yang 'don zhing dkyil
T02D2512-2:100b-19: 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par bya'o
T02D2512-2:100b-20: // de nas rang gi cho ga rjes su spyad

T02D2512-2:100b-22: par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs nas de
T02D2512-2:100b-23: bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur zhing
T02D2512-2:100b-24: rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dang rin po
T02D2512-2:100b-25: che'i cod pan gyis kyang bdag nyid dbang bskur la
T02D2512-2:100b-26: // / rdo rje rin po che dang bdag po
T02D2512-2:100b-27: dang ming gi dbang bskur bas kyang dbang bskur la
T02D2512-2:100b-28: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs te dum
T02D2512-2:100b-29: bu dang po las bshad pa'i tshul gyis ji lta
T02D2512-2:100b-30: ba de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje rin po
T02D2512-2:100b-31: che bzung zhing chos kyi dril bu dkrol la /
T02D2512-2:100b-32: de bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la snying po bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:100b-33: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang rin po
T02D2512-2:100b-34: che'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod
T02D2512-2:100b-35: pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-2:100b-36: bcom ldan 'das las tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-2:100b-40: phyag rgya bzhi nye bar bstan pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:100b-41: la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das las gnang pa
T02D2512-2:100b-42: mnos la / yang de bzhin du bdag la byin gyis brlab pa byas la /
T02D2512-2:100b-43: rang gi ming nas kyang brjod nas /
T02D2512-2:101a-1: de bzhin du rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //

T02D2512-2:101a-3: sems dpa'i lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2512-2:101a-4: so gol mang po brdab bgyis la //
T02D2512-2:101a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //

T02D2512-2:101a-7: sngar bshad pa'i lcags kyus bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
T02D2512-2:101a-8: rdo rje gnod sbyin dang khu tshur dang bsrung bas las rnams byas la /
T02D2512-2:101a-9: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la rang gi rig pas mchod yon phul la /
T02D2512-2:101a-10: dam tshig phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya'o //

T02D2512-2:101a-12: rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur

T02D2512-2:101a-16: rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod

T02D2512-2:101a-22: de srid kyi bar du dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o
T02D2512-2:101a-24: srid pa'i bde ba rnam dag phyir //
T02D2512-2:101a-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:101a-26: de ltar bka' mnos nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:101a-27: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:101a-29: // / de nas bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su 'dzin
T02D2512-2:101a-30: pa'am dge sbyong dang dge slong gi bslab pa gzung
T02D2512-2:101a-31: ba'i slob ma la rig pa'i sngom pa ji lta
T02D2512-2:101a-32: ba bzhin du 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02D2512-2:101a-33: de nas de byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa byed du gzhug go //

T02D2512-2:101a-35: gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs la gzhag ste
T02D2512-2:101a-36: snga ma bzhin du bskyed do //

T02D2512-2:101a-38: byin gyis brlabs la dri dang me tog la sogs
T02D2512-2:101a-39: pas mchod nas yon gyi mchog blangs te /
T02D2512-2:101a-40: shar sgor bltas te phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-2:101b-0: rang gi 'jug pa'i tshul gyis dkyil @101b 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:101b-1: de nas de'i rnam par chags bral lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //

T02D2512-2:101b-6: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad nas /

T02D2512-2:105a-0: bdag la byin brlabs mchog grub @105a * //
T02D2512-2:105a-2: / nyin re grub pa de yis ni //
T02D2512-2:105a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob bo //

T02D2512-2:114b-4: de nas khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2512-2:114b-5: la de rdo rje blta ba khro ba dang bcas
T02D2512-2:114b-6: pas bltas la / ji srid mthong bar gyur cing

T02D2512-2:114b-16: bum pa la sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs
T02D2512-2:114b-18: de nas bdag nyid khyab 'jug tu byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-2:114b-19: dkyil 'khor nang gi shar ngos su sna tshogs padma bris nas /
T02D2512-2:114b-20: de'i steng du khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya chen por
T02D2512-2:114b-21: bsams te 'dug la me tog la sogs pas bdag

T02D2512-2:114b-28: rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:114b-29: de nas rang gi snying gar 'khor lo dril bu dang bcas pa bzung la /
T02D2512-2:114b-30: de nyid kyis bdag po dang /
T02D2512-2:114b-31: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs nas /
T02D2512-2:114b-32: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2512-2:114b-33: las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang bdag nyid yang
T02D2512-2:114b-34: dag par mchod la khyab 'jug la phyag byas te
T02D2512-2:114b-35: snying po gzung la phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes blangs

T02D2512-2:115a-27: de rnams la khyed kyis brnyas par ma byed cig //
T02D2512-2:115a-28: de nas cho ga thams cad rdzogs par byas la
T02D2512-2:115a-29: slob ma rnams la rma bya'i sgro'i chings ma spyin
T02D2512-2:115a-30: par bya zhing sgrub pa bslab par bya'o //

T02D2512-2:115b-0: de nas @115b chings ma blangs te /

T02D2512-2:115b-10: // / de ltar lha ma yin gyi rtog pa bshad
T02D2512-2:115b-11: nas de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas klus

T02D2512-2:115b-13: yin no // de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni

T02D2512-2:115b-21: 'jog po dang padma chen po ni rje'u rigs so //
T02D2512-2:115b-22: karko ta dang padma ni dmangs rigs so //

T02D2512-2:116a-4: char cha brgyad pa'i tshad kyi sgro bzhi 'di la

T02D2512-2:116b-10: sarba n'a ga ku la a'a na ya h'um phu /

T02D2512-2:116b-36: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste //

T02D2512-2:117a-0: de nas snying po byin la phyag @117a * //

T02D2512-2:117a-20: po'i rdo rje nyid las klu'i zhags pa de'i dbus

T02D2512-2:117b-42: dkyil 'khor nam mkhar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:118a-0: de nas gdengs ka'i phyag rgya dang phu zhes bya bas @118a * //
T02D2512-2:118a-1: bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la phyag rgya chen po bcings te yongs su bskur bar bya'o //

T02D2512-2:118a-5: de nas klu'i dkyil 'khor klu'i rigs brgyad dang bcas pa snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:118a-6: de nas sgo dbye ba byas la klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa mchod nas /

T02D2512-2:118a-15: lag pa gdengs ka'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:118a-16: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
T02D2512-2:118a-17: lag pa g-yon pas klu'i zhags pa bzung ste /

T02D2512-2:118a-22: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddha mam /

T02D2512-2:118a-27: de bzhin du zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par
T02D2512-2:118a-28: dbab par bya'o // bya'o // de nas phu nyid kyis me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:118a-29: de nas de blangs la de nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:118a-30: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D2512-2:118a-31: de nas de nyid zlos shing dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:118a-32: de nas gdengs ka'i lag pa bcings la tishtha badzra
T02D2512-2:118a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar
T02D2512-2:118a-34: dgrol bar bya'o // de nas she sha'i phyag rgya

T02D2512-2:118a-36: bcas pas bltas la ji srid dngos grub ster bar

T02D2512-2:118b-4: me tog gi lcug ma las /

T02D2512-2:118b-7: bum pa'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par

T02D2512-2:118b-9: brlabs la shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas pas dkyil 'khor

T02D2512-2:118b-12: dri la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod de /
T02D2512-2:118b-13: mchod yon blangs nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje khu

T02D2512-2:118b-15: blangs la / phu aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes zlos shing /

T02D2512-2:118b-17: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang
T02D2512-2:118b-18: bskur zhing rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur
T02D2512-2:118b-19: bar bya'o // de nas zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:118b-20: rdo rje rtse gsum pa blangs la de bzhin du bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-2:118b-21: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:118b-22: de nas mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang las kyi
T02D2512-2:118b-23: phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid la mchod la she
T02D2512-2:118b-24: sha la phyag bya zhing phu zhes bya ba dang

T02D2512-2:118b-27: rang gi ming nas kyang brjod de dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:118b-28: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02D2512-2:118b-29: gdengs ka'i lag pas she sha 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02D2512-2:118b-30: gdengs ka'i phyag rgya bcings la phu dri shya zhes
T02D2512-2:118b-31: bya bas she sha 'khor dang bcas pa la blta
T02D2512-2:118b-32: bar byas la sa ma ya stvam /

T02D2512-2:118b-34: de nas h'um las rang gi lce la rdo rje
T02D2512-2:118b-35: dkar po bsams la she sha la sogs pa'i lce
T02D2512-2:118b-36: la yang phu zhes bya ba bsams la /
T02D2512-2:118b-37: 'di ni de rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-2:118b-38: aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-2:119a-0: @119a * // she sha la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:119a-1: de nas h'um las rang gi snying gar rdo rje
T02D2512-2:119a-2: rtse lnga pa bsams la she sha la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:119a-3: phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:119a-4: de nas rdo rje rin gyi phyag rgyas she sha
T02D2512-2:119a-5: la sogs pa la dbang bskur la mchod pa rnam
T02D2512-2:119a-7: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2512-2:119a-8: de nas yang phyag rgya chen po bcings la ji
T02D2512-2:119a-9: srid mtshan ma thob par 'gyur ba de srid kyi
T02D2512-2:119a-11: de legs par mchod la phyag byas te /
T02D2512-2:119a-12: slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir bka' nos la slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:119a-13: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:119a-15: // / de nas slob ma thams cad dug med par byas la /
T02D2512-2:119a-16: rang gi 'jug pa'i tsho gas bcug la rang gi
T02D2512-2:119a-17: cho ga dang de rnams kyi khyad par gyi cho

T02D2512-2:119a-21: // / dpal mchog dang po'i dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2512-2:119a-22: klu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa rgyas par bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:119a-24: // / bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba ni
T02D2512-2:119a-25: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:119a-26: thams cad de ; rtog pa bcu'o //

T02D2512-2:119a-29: po rdo rje gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs
T02D2512-2:119a-30: pa ni / rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D2512-2:119a-31: de la bde ba thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D2512-2:119a-32: de nyid ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2512-2:119a-33: pa'i tshul gyis thams cad du khyab pas na dam
T02D2512-2:119a-34: tshig go // de las byung ba ni dang po'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-2:119a-35: de'i gsang ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i 'jig
T02D2512-2:119a-36: rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:119a-37: bcu'o // de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:119a-38: sgrub par byed pa'i tshogs so //
T02D2512-2:119a-39: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba las /
T02D2512-2:119a-40: dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'jig rten
T02D2512-2:119a-41: pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu'i
T02D2512-2:119b-0: rtog pa bshad pa @119b rdzogs so /

T02D2512-2:119b-3: dkyil 'khor bcu'i rtog pa gsungs nas /
T02D2512-2:119b-4: da ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
T02D2512-2:119b-5: gsungs pa'i rtog pa rnams kyang gal te gdul bya'i
T02D2512-2:119b-6: nyes pas grub par ma gyur na /
T02D2512-2:119b-7: bsgrub pa'i khyad par gyis myur du bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:119b-8: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas dpal rdo
T02D2512-2:119b-9: rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i rtog pa gsungs pa yin
T02D2512-2:119b-10: no // de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2512-2:119b-11: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2512-2:119b-12: tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
T02D2512-2:119b-13: bstan nas don de bsgom par bya ba'i phyir bde
T02D2512-2:119b-14: ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas kyi
T02D2512-2:119b-16: der ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs te rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur nas /
T02D2512-2:119b-17: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-2:119b-18: rdo rje ri rab chen po'i rtse mo de'i steng na rdo rje gzhal yas khang chen po na /
T02D2512-2:119b-19: bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2512-2:119b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshogs las byung
T02D2512-2:119b-21: ba 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gdul bya rnams
T02D2512-2:119b-22: la so sor snang bar gyur ba rdo rje'i rang
T02D2512-2:119b-23: bzhin can gyi ri rab chen po'i rtse mo de'i
T02D2512-2:119b-24: steng na phyogs bcu thams cad du gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2512-2:119b-25: rje nor bu chen por ro //

T02D2512-2:119b-27: she na rdo rje rin chen po la sogs pa

T02D2512-2:119b-30: smos te / 'dir / nor bu rin po che yin te /
T02D2512-2:119b-31: gang gi phyir rdo rje phyed dang ldan pa ni

T02D2512-2:119b-33: phyir ro // de rnams kyi 'od 'bar ba ste /

T02D2512-2:119b-35: rdo rje rin chen 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2512-2:119b-36: des brgyan pa ni brgyan par byas pa'o //
T02D2512-2:119b-37: dra ba dang dra ba phyed la sogs pas 'od
T02D2512-2:119b-38: dang mdangs dri ma med pa 'di la yod pas
T02D2512-2:119b-39: na dri med mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2512-2:119b-40: dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis brgyan pa de ni de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2512-2:120a-0: zur bzhi pa zhes bya ba la @120a * //
T02D2512-2:120a-1: sogs pa ni bshad zin to //

T02D2512-2:120a-3: tu mdzes pa de la dril bu btags pa des
T02D2512-2:120a-4: sgra sgrogs pa ni theg pa gsum gyis chos ston
T02D2512-2:120a-5: pa'i sgra sgrogs pa de na'o //
T02D2512-2:120a-6: dra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2512-2:120a-7: la dra ba ni mu tig gi chun 'phyang dbus
T02D2512-2:120a-8: na yod pa'o // me long ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:120a-9: me tog chun po ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi me tog go //
T02D2512-2:120a-10: dra ba dang me long dang me tog chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:120a-11: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2512-2:120a-12: rgyan rnams kyis bskor ba ni brgyan pa'o //

T02D2512-2:120a-14: rdo rje kun gyis ni rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-2:120a-18: bde ba chen po rdo rje chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:120a-19: rdo rje thams cad ni bde ba chen po rdo rje thams cad do //

T02D2512-2:120a-21: der rdo rje sems dpa'i snang ba chen po yod
T02D2512-2:120a-22: pa ni rdo rje chen po'i snang ba chen po'o
T02D2512-2:120a-23: // der sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba 'jig
T02D2512-2:120a-24: rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang
T02D2512-2:120a-25: mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis nges par
T02D2512-2:120a-26: // bsten pa ste / der bzhugs pas de bsten par mdzad pa'o ;
T02D2512-2:120a-27: / gnas der byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02D2512-2:120a-28: de rnams kyis gnas pa ni spyod lam rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D2512-2:120a-29: thugs rje chen po la sogs pa yid kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:120a-30: de mchog tu gyur pas na byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2512-2:120a-31: der rdo rje 'chang ba kun ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2512-2:120a-33: de rnams kyi gnas ni bzhugs gnas te /
T02D2512-2:120a-35: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
T02D2512-2:120a-36: nor bu rin chen zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:120a-37: bde ba chen po'i nor bu chen po rdo rje
T02D2512-2:120a-38: nor bu rin chen ni ji skad du bshad pa'i
T02D2512-2:120a-40: des mchog tu gyur pa ni dam par gyur pa
T02D2512-2:120a-41: gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya
T02D2512-2:120a-42: bas nor bu rin chen mchog ces bya ba /
T02D2512-2:120a-43: rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:120b-0: der stong pa nyid bco brgyad kyi ting nge 'dzin @120b ni rdo rje chen po ste /

T02D2512-2:120b-2: rdo rje chen po'i khang brtsegs na //

T02D2512-2:120b-7: ba chen po bzhugs pa ni gnas par mdzad pa'o
T02D2512-2:120b-9: bde ba chen pos rnam par bzhugs //
T02D2512-2:120b-10: zhes bya ba ni 'di la bde ba chen po mnga' bas na /

T02D2512-2:120b-22: ni stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin yin

T02D2512-2:120b-25: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis dbang du mdzad nas /

T02D2512-2:124a-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lhag par mos pa'i sems
T02D2512-2:124a-10: can gyi don du dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs
T02D2512-2:124a-11: 'dzin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul du
T02D2512-2:124a-12: byas la / de ltar na de bsrung bar bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:124a-13: rdo rje bsnyems ma'i tshul 'chang zhes pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:124a-14: phyag rgya thams cad rnam dag phyir //
T02D2512-2:124a-15: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya yang yin la thams
T02D2512-2:124a-16: cad kyang yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad de
T02D2512-2:124a-17: / phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-2:124a-18: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni gdul bya gzhan du ma gyur pa'i sems kyis rtogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir //
T02D2512-2:124a-20: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ni /
T02D2512-2:124a-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i grub mchog pa ste /
T02D2512-2:124a-22: gdul bya rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po mngon sum du byas pa'o ;
T02D2512-2:124a-23: / bde chen rdo rje che sgrub pa //
T02D2512-2:124a-24: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-2:124a-25: de sgrub pa ni bskyed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124a-26: rgyu ci zhig gi phyir zhe na /
T02D2512-2:124a-27: dngos grub kun la zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2512-2:124a-28: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub la sogs pa thams cad do//
T02D2512-2:124a-29: de thams cad sgrub pa de'i don du snying po gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124a-30: ci de 'ba' zhig gsungs sam zhe na //
T02D2512-2:124a-31: ye shes phyag rgyar yang dag ldan //
T02D2512-2:124a-33: de la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pas bsgrub
T02D2512-2:124a-34: pa la nges par sbyor ba'i bsgom pa ni ye
T02D2512-2:124a-36: de ston par byed pa'i sgra la yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2512-2:124a-37: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes gang bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124a-38: 'dod chags dam tshig ces grags te /
T02D2512-2:124a-40: de yi rjes grub rnal 'byor ni //
T02D2512-2:124a-41: rjes su chags pa zhes pa bshad do //
T02D2512-2:124b-1: / ye shes kyi phyag rgya nyid dam tshig ste /
T02D2512-2:124b-2: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T02D2512-2:124b-3: su ro gcig pa'i ye shes la nges par sbyor
T02D2512-2:124b-4: ba'i tshul gyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par
T02D2512-2:124b-5: rtog pa med pa'i phyir de dang yang dag par
T02D2512-2:124b-6: ldan pa ni bcings ba ste /
T02D2512-2:124b-7: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang yang dag pa'i snying
T02D2512-2:124b-8: po ni ye ge h'um de ston par byed pa'am
T02D2512-2:124b-10: de nyid kyis na dam pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124b-11: gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa //
T02D2512-2:124b-12: zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos spong ba'am /
T02D2512-2:124b-13: mtshams med pa la sogs pa mi dge ba thams cad byed pa ni bsod nams mi ldan pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124b-14: de rnams kyang gang gi dngos grub thams cad rnyed par dka' ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:124b-15: de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa //
T02D2512-2:124b-16: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du ma zhugs te de dag kyang ngo //
T02D2512-2:124b-17: don yod pa ni 'bras bu yod pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124b-18: thogs pa med pa ni bzlog tu med pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124b-20: mchog ni dam par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124b-21: thams cad ni ma lus pa ste dngos grub thams cad rnyed par dka' ba ma yin pa ste /
T02D2512-2:124b-22: snying po gang zhig gsungs pa des don yod pa dang /
T02D2512-2:124b-25: mchog gi dngos grub thams cad rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D2512-2:124b-26: kyis dngos grub rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs par
T02D2512-2:124b-27: skyed par gyur pa de la de skad ces bya'o
T02D2512-2:124b-28: // bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
T02D2512-2:124b-29: gsang ba'i mchog ste dam tshig brtan //
T02D2512-2:124b-30: zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje
T02D2512-2:124b-31: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi mchog ste
T02D2512-2:124b-32: bskyed pa'i rgyu'o ; / brtan pa ni mi shigs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124b-33: dngos po thams cad bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2512-2:124b-34: zhes bya ba ni bum pa bzang po la sogs pa dngos po thams cad bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:124b-35: rtog pa thams cad myur 'grub byed //
T02D2512-2:124b-36: ces bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bur /
T02D2512-2:124b-37: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rtogs pa gsungs pa dang /
T02D2512-2:124b-38: gnyis par gang gsungs pa de rnams bsgrub pa ni yi ge h'um snying po'i tshul gyis bsgrub bo //
T02D2512-2:124b-39: thog ma mtha' med cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thog ma ni dang por skye ba'o //
T02D2512-2:125a-1: thog mtha' med cing zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-2:125a-2: thog ma dang tha ma'i bral ba dang /
T02D2512-2:125a-3: da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu bzhugs so zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:125a-4: dang por byung bzhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:125a-5: bskal ba bzang po la sogs pa'i dang por thog
T02D2512-2:125a-6: ma med pa'i tshul nyid kyis bzhugs pa yin pa'i
T02D2512-2:125a-8: bsod nams thams cad cher ma thob //
T02D2512-2:125a-9: zhes bya ba ni gtsang bar byed pas bsod nams te /
T02D2512-2:125a-10: sdig pa'i dri ma thams cad 'khrud pas dag par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:125a-11: bsod nams kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas
T02D2512-2:125a-12: na bsod nams thams cad de 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2512-2:125a-13: rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams de thams cad ni
T02D2512-2:125a-14: chen po yang yin la mthon po yang yin pas
T02D2512-2:125a-15: na / bsod nams thams cad cher ma thob ste /
T02D2512-2:125a-16: bsod nams ma lus par skyes zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:125a-17: gzi can rnams kyi bde mchog phyir //
T02D2512-2:125a-19: chos bdag med pa'i ye shes kyi snang bas bag
T02D2512-2:125a-20: chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bud shing nges
T02D2512-2:125a-21: par bsreg pas na gzi can te /
T02D2512-2:125a-22: gzi mdangs kyis 'bar ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T02D2512-2:125a-23: gzi can de rnams kyi rang gi dang gis rnam
T02D2512-2:125a-24: pa rtog pa med par byung ba sems dang sems
T02D2512-2:125a-25: las byung ba de ni bde ba yin te /
T02D2512-2:125a-26: de'i don du gdul bya rnams kyi thar pa chen
T02D2512-2:125a-27: po bsgrub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2512-2:125a-28: // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir //
T02D2512-2:125a-29: zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi ni aa nu
T02D2512-2:125a-30: r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:125a-31: yin te / rjes su chags pa sgom pa ste //
T02D2512-2:125a-32: thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo gsang ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:125a-33: 'khor gyi rang bzhin bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
T02D2512-2:125a-34: ba chen po yang dang yang mngon du bya'o zhes
T02D2512-2:125a-35: bya ba ni rjes su chags par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-2:125a-36: ba yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par ston
T02D2512-2:125a-37: pa'i tshig ste / de lta bu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:125a-38: ci bzhin zhes bya ba ni ci nus pa ste /
T02D2512-2:125a-39: rang gi nus pas sam sngon gyi 'phen shugs kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:125a-40: ye shes rab 'jug ces bya ba ni lhag pa'i rnal 'byor ni nges bde ni ye shes te //
T02D2512-2:125b-0: de'i rab tu 'jug @125b pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de /
T02D2512-2:125b-1: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya ba'o //
T02D2512-2:125b-2: des na aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes //
T02D2512-2:125b-3: ji bzhin ye shes rab 'jug pas //
T02D2512-2:125b-4: zhes bya ba ni 'dis 'dul ba rnams la thun mong du bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:125b-5: nye ba'i snying po dang bcas snying po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:125b-6: nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i snying po ni yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D2512-2:125b-7: de nyid ni dang po ste thog ma med pa'i
T02D2512-2:125b-8: tshul gyis bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i thog
T02D2512-2:125b-9: mar rgyun mi 'chad par bzhugs shing mtha' med pas
T02D2512-2:125b-10: na dang po'o // bskal thog ces bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:125b-11: bskal pa ni bzang po la sogs pa'i thog ma
T02D2512-2:125b-12: na dang po'o // ste / dang por bcom ldan 'das gsungs zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:125b-13: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs shing bka' stsal pa ste /
T02D2512-2:125b-14: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:125b-15: nye ba'i snying po dang bcas pa'i snying po gsungs
T02D2512-2:125b-16: so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:125b-18: gcig tu tshogs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:125b-19: phyung zhes bya ba ni bskyed par gyur pa ste /
T02D2512-2:125b-20: phyogs bcu thams cad du 'gro ba sems can dang
T02D2512-2:125b-21: snod kyi 'jig rten bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-2:125b-22: tha tshig go // 'di skad ston pa yin te
T02D2512-2:125b-23: sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di chags pa'i gong
T02D2512-2:125b-24: na nam mkhar gyur pa nam mkha'i phyogs der /
T02D2512-2:125b-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' thams
T02D2512-2:125b-26: cad la gnas pa'i rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas
T02D2512-2:125b-27: khang na sna tshogs padma la rdo rje lha mo'i
T02D2512-2:125b-28: tshogs dang bcas pa bzhugs te /
T02D2512-2:125b-29: aa nu r'a ga ya mi h'um zhes gsungs par gyur pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:125b-30: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i
T02D2512-2:125b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dus par mdzad nas gshegs
T02D2512-2:125b-32: te / byon nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems
T02D2512-2:125b-33: can gyi 'jig rten dang bcas pa skyed par mdzad
T02D2512-2:125b-34: te / pa yin no // phyung zhing 'gro ba
T02D2512-2:125b-35: thams cad dang snod kyi 'jig rten sna tshogs te
T02D2512-2:125b-36: te / pa yin no // / rgyu ba dang
T02D2512-2:125b-37: mi rgyu ba'i rang bzhin can skyed cing phyung bar
T02D2512-2:125b-38: te / pa yin no // / gyur to // gtso bos dngos grub dris gyur pa //
T02D2512-2:125b-39: zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi khams de bskyed
T02D2512-2:125b-40: pa rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ji ltar
T02D2512-2:126a-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la dres pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:126a-2: ji ltar skad cig gis 'gro grub //
T02D2512-2:126a-3: sems dpa' chen po myur du smros //
T02D2512-2:126a-4: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'gro ba sems can
T02D2512-2:126a-5: gyi khams 'di rnams skad cig gis zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:126a-6: bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-2:126a-7: la sogs pa'i dngos grub tshe 'di nyid la myur
T02D2512-2:126a-8: du grub pa de lta bus sems can chen po
T02D2512-2:126a-9: myur du smros shig ces gtso bos dpal rdo rje
T02D2512-2:126a-10: sems dpa' la dris pa yin no zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-2:126a-11: tha tshig go // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2512-2:126a-12: de nas dris pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02D2512-2:126a-13: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' dang po'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:126a-14: 'khor de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang por sems can
T02D2512-2:126a-16: byin gyis brlabs nas rgya che ba'i tshul can gyis /
T02D2512-2:126a-17: sems can thams cad la so sor snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:126a-18: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de bstan par mdzad pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:126a-19: de'i khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2512-2:126a-20: rdo rje kun mchog dam tshig ni //
T02D2512-2:126a-22: rdo rje kun ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis
T02D2512-2:126a-23: bsdus pa gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las
T02D2512-2:126a-24: byung ba'o // de rnams kyi dam tshig ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de'o //
T02D2512-2:126a-25: de nas bsgrub pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa bskyed pa ni grub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:126a-26: cho ga ji lta ba ni /
T02D2512-2:126a-27: ji ltar slob ma 'jug pa'i cho gas 'dir slob
T02D2512-2:126a-28: ma sgrub pa de bzhin du de rnams kyang ring
T02D2512-2:126a-29: por mi thogs par snod du rung bar bsgrub pa'o
T02D2512-2:126a-30: // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2512-2:126a-31: de ltar ring por mi thogs par snod du byas
T02D2512-2:126a-32: pa'i sems can rnams la rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
T02D2512-2:126a-33: la sogs pa dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrub par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:126a-34: // pa na / de'i rjes thogs nyid la skyes shing byung ba'o //
T02D2512-2:126a-35: de phan chad ces bya ba ni sems can khams gsum na spyod pa thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:126a-36: ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'gro //
T02D2512-2:126a-37: zhes bya ba ni sems can gang de dag gi las dkar po'am nag po'am /
T02D2512-2:126a-38: 'dres ma ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du las
T02D2512-2:126a-39: des bde 'gro la sogs par ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2512-2:126b-0: ji bzhin las kyi rjes su @126b 'gro na /
T02D2512-2:126b-1: rang gi las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang las skyes zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:126b-2: rtag par sdig kun kun du spyod //
T02D2512-2:126b-4: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni nyin re'o //
T02D2512-2:126b-5: sdig pa kun ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:126b-6: kun du spyod pa ni byed pa ste /
T02D2512-2:126b-7: des na rtag par sdig kun kun du spyod /
T02D2512-2:126b-8: ces bya ba ste 'dis ni sems can sdig pa
T02D2512-2:126b-9: can mi dge ba kun du spyod pa yin no
T02D2512-2:126b-10: // ngan zhe na ni dngos po ngan pa la
T02D2512-2:126b-11: chags shing zhen pa ste de nyid du mthas gtugs
T02D2512-2:126b-12: pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:126b-13: 'dis ni sems can gyi tshogs gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:126b-14: le lo byas pa ni dge ba'i las la mi 'jug pa dang /
T02D2512-2:126b-15: mi dge ba'i las la mi 'jug pa dang /
T02D2512-2:126b-16: nor ba sogs pa la yang mi 'jug pa gang
T02D2512-2:126b-17: yin pa de ni ci yang mi byed pas na
T02D2512-2:126b-18: / de ni 'dir le lo can zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-2:126b-19: 'dis ni sems can gyi tshogs gsum pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:126b-20: da ni zhes pa ni da ltar te /
T02D2512-2:126b-21: bshad ma thag pa'i sems can gyi tshogs gsum pa
T02D2512-2:126b-22: ni sems can gyi khams la gzigs pa'i 'jig rten
T02D2512-2:126b-23: gyi mgon po de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:126b-24: rdo rje 'chang chen po la dris par gyur pa
T02D2512-2:126b-27: bcom ldan 'das 'o na ji ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:126b-28: bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ji ltar zhes bya ba ni mi bzod pa'o //
T02D2512-2:126b-29: na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni rtog pa'o //
T02D2512-2:126b-30: 'byin pa zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad bskyed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:126b-31: dge ba thams cad kun du bskyed //
T02D2512-2:126b-33: dge ba ni bsod nams so //
T02D2512-2:126b-34: thams cad ni ma lus pa'o //
T02D2512-2:126b-35: kun du bskyed pa ni bskyed par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:126b-37: gal te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' sems can thams cad skyed par mdzad na /
T02D2512-2:126b-38: bsod nams thams cad bskyed par gyur na /
T02D2512-2:126b-39: de'i yongs su dag pa nyid kyis sems can dag par gyur na /
T02D2512-2:126b-40: de lta bur mi snang ngo //
T02D2512-2:126b-41: de bas na ci zhig tu nges she na sems
T02D2512-2:126b-42: can gyi phung po nye bar nges pas na bcom
T02D2512-2:126b-43: ldan 'das ni skyed pa po ma yin no //
T02D2512-2:126b-44: de rnams kyi ni tshig gsan nas //
T02D2512-2:126b-45: zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis dris pa'i tshig gsan nas so //
T02D2512-2:127a-1: 'di skad du gsungs pa yin zhes bya ba ni gsungs par 'gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:127a-3: rdo rje 'dzin ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2512-2:127a-4: rdo rje 'dzin na ni rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D2512-2:127a-5: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad sprul pas na kun byed do //
T02D2512-2:127a-6: skyed par byed pa yin pas na 'byin pa'o //
T02D2512-2:127a-7: yang ci zhig gsungs she na /
T02D2512-2:127a-8: las kyi 'ching ba lhod gyur pa //
T02D2512-2:127a-10: 'di dag mi dge ba la 'jug pa las kyang dge ba la 'jug par byed la /
T02D2512-2:127a-11: dge ba la zhugs pa las kyang mi dge ba la 'jug par 'gyur la /
T02D2512-2:127a-12: la la ni dge ba dang mi dge ba gnyi ga la 'jug pa'am /
T02D2512-2:127a-13: ci yang mi byed pa dag kyang yod do //
T02D2512-2:127a-14: de bas na 'di dag ni 'dres mar spyod pa yin gyi /
T02D2512-2:127a-15: 'di rnams kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba dang /

T02D2512-2:154b-30: rab tu dga' ba'i las rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis kha sbyar ro zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:154b-31: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje bcings nas gar gyi
T02D2512-2:154b-32: tshul gyis langs te spyi bor thal mo kha sbyar
T02D2512-2:154b-33: ba byas nas 'dis ni las thams cad kyi dngos
T02D2512-2:154b-35: rdo rje snyems ma bshad pa'o zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-2:154b-36: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya ni
T02D2512-2:154b-37: / rdo rje snyems ma ste des las kyi dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:154b-38: mthe chung gi ngos kyis mdud pa'i mdzub mo mnyam
T02D2512-2:154b-39: pa rtse mo yongs su bskor te 'og nas bteg
T02D2512-2:155a-0: pa la mdzub mo mnyam pa'i rtse @155a * //
T02D2512-2:155a-1: mo dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag na rdo rje
T02D2512-2:155a-2: mdzod spu'o zhes bya ba la rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2512-2:155a-3: gnyis bcings nas / mthe'u chung gnyis phan tshun du
T02D2512-2:155a-4: sa la mdud pa byas na mdzub mo gnyis kyi
T02D2512-2:155a-5: rtse mo'i steng du kha blta bar yang dag par
T02D2512-2:155a-6: sbyar nas 'og nas bteg la dbang bskur ba'i gnas
T02D2512-2:155a-7: su gzung bar byas na 'dis phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2512-2:155a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:155a-10: dum bu 'di gnyis kyi rgyud phyi ma las rdo
T02D2512-2:155a-11: rje khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'i byang chub mchog
T02D2512-2:155a-12: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur
T02D2512-2:155a-14: de bcings nas ye shes thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:155a-15: rdo rje gar ni bshad pa yin no zhes bya ba la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2512-2:155a-16: sgeg pa dang bcas pa thams cad la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:155a-17: bkrol bas klog 'gyu ba'i gar gyis g-yas su bskor
T02D2512-2:155a-18: ba gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gar ma
T02D2512-2:155a-19: ste / des ni thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:155a-20: mdzub mo phyir phyogs pa bslang ba'i rdo rje snying
T02D2512-2:155a-21: gar badzra h'um zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-2:155a-23: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings mdzub mo gnyis phyir
T02D2512-2:155a-24: blta ba bslang ste rtse mo yang dag par sbyar
T02D2512-2:155a-25: nas snying ga'i phyogs su bzung zhing badzro& ham zhes
T02D2512-2:155a-26: bya ba bsams nas rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog
T02D2512-2:155a-28: ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis ta th'a ga to&
T02D2512-2:155a-29: ham zhes bya ba la byang chub mchog bcings nas
T02D2512-2:155a-30: ta th'a ga to& ham zhes bya ba la bsgoms
T02D2512-2:155a-31: na 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog
T02D2512-2:155a-33: las kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2512-2:155a-34: phyag rgya chen po bshad pa yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-2:155a-35: ba la / dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni bshad zin pa ste /
T02D2512-2:155a-36: des rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:155a-37: las kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid thams cad bstan pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:155a-38: rdo rje med pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rnams kyi
T02D2512-2:155a-39: las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:155b-0: gsungs te / rdo rje khu tshur @155b de dag bskyed pa'i rgyu bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:155b-1: de nas rdo rje khu tshur bcing ba'o //
T02D2512-2:155b-3: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa rjod par byed pa ste /
T02D2512-2:155b-4: rang gi rdo rje khu tshur gyis phyag rgya rnams
T02D2512-2:155b-5: gang las byung ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog
T02D2512-2:155b-6: pa 'di bskyed pas de ma thag kho nar rdo
T02D2512-2:155b-7: rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2512-2:155b-8: ni 'ching ba zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:155b-9: rdo rje bsdams pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:155b-10: la ji ltar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdo
T02D2512-2:155b-12: mthe bo gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du bcug ste /
T02D2512-2:155b-13: rang gi mthe chung dang srin lag gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:155b-14: 'ching ba'i bar du bzhag nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug
T02D2512-2:155b-15: cing de'i rtse mo rang gi mthe bo'i steng du
T02D2512-2:155b-17: 'dis ni dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-2:155b-18: thams cad dngos grub mchog stsol ba //
T02D2512-2:155b-20: phyag rgya thams cad 'ching ba'i dngos grub ster ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:155b-21: de nyid du byas nas zhes bya ba de ni dam tshig rdo rje mchog gi khu tshur ro //
T02D2512-2:155b-22: dngos grub phyir zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba rdzogs pa'i don du'o //
T02D2512-2:155b-23: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtag / ces bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:155b-24: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje thams cad la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2512-2:155b-25: mdzad pa dang las kyi phyag rgya rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:155b-26: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T02D2512-2:155b-27: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis po 'di brtag par mdzad
T02D2512-2:155b-28: pa yin no // dpal mchog dang bo'i rgya cher bshad pa /
T02D2512-2:155b-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba las /
T02D2512-2:155b-30: dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2512-2:155b-31: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:155b-33: // / de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:155b-34: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:155b-35: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i
T02D2512-2:155b-36: rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba gsungs
T02D2512-2:155b-37: te / de nas kyi sgra ni skabs la babs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:156a-2: de'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te /
T02D2512-2:156a-3: de'i phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams te /
T02D2512-2:156a-4: de rnams kyi rgyud ni phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ston pa'i sgra'i tshogs so //
T02D2512-2:156a-5: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-2:156a-6: la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye bar gyur pa'i rgyun
T02D2512-2:156a-7: no // phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi de bzhin
T02D2512-2:156a-8: gshegs pa ni bdag yin no zhes bya ba bcings
T02D2512-2:156a-10: ji lta ba bzhin du sems so sor rtogs pa
T02D2512-2:156a-11: la sogs pa'i rim pas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:156a-12: par bsams la / ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2512-2:156a-13: ta tishtha ham zhes bya bas nga rgyal bskyed la
T02D2512-2:156a-14: par bsams la / / de nas sa ma yo
T02D2512-2:156a-15: nya ham zhes bya bas dam tshig gi nga rgyal
T02D2512-2:156a-16: par bsams la / / bskyed par bya'o // de
T02D2512-2:156a-17: nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas sa ma
T02D2512-2:156a-18: ya satva aa dhi tishtasva mam zhes bya bas byin
T02D2512-2:156a-19: gyis brlabs la rdo rje skyil mo krung bcings la
T02D2512-2:156a-20: par bsams la / / bskyed par bya'o // /
T02D2512-2:156a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcing bar bya
T02D2512-2:156a-22: par bsams la / / bskyed par bya'o // /
T02D2512-2:156a-23: ste / khu tshur g-yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2512-2:156a-24: dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyems par byas nas /
T02D2512-2:156a-25: g-yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje blangs la gsor te /
T02D2512-2:156a-26: aom dhi ta th'a ga to& ham zhes brjod cing
T02D2512-2:156a-27: rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis gzung bar
T02D2512-2:156a-28: byas nas / 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po yin no //
T02D2512-2:156a-29: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02D2512-2:156a-30: ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa las 'dir shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:156a-31: dam tshig mchog ces bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te /
T02D2512-2:156a-32: de dag ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-2:156a-33: mthe bo mthe chung mnyam pa yi //
T02D2512-2:156a-34: rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-2:156a-35: zhes bya ba la rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas
T02D2512-2:156a-36: mthe bo gnyis kyi rtse mo zur du yang dag
T02D2512-2:156a-38: mthe chung gnyis kyis kyang rtse mo sbyar te dang
T02D2512-2:156a-39: po'i rdo rje'i tshul gyis dbus ma gnyis nang du
T02D2512-2:156a-40: bcug ste rtse mo sbyar te 'di ni dbus ma'i
T02D2512-2:156a-42: sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:156a-43: 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-2:156a-44: sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bya bar brjod do //
T02D2512-2:156a-45: mda' la sogs pa bcing ba ni de bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:156b-0: ji ltar rdo @156b rje sems dpa'i gsang ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:156b-1: 'khor du rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:156b-2: rnams kyi dang po'i rdo rje las byung ba'i mda'
T02D2512-2:156b-3: gzhu la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa de bzhin
T02D2512-2:156b-4: du 'dir yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi
T02D2512-2:156b-6: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:156b-8: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo
T02D2512-2:156b-9: rje ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2512-2:156b-10: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-2:156b-12: mthe ba mdzub rtse sbyar dbus ma'i rtse //
T02D2512-2:156b-14: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i'o //
T02D2512-2:156b-16: dbus ma'i rdo rje 'og tu ni //
T02D2512-2:156b-17: mthe bong gis mnan btsir bar bya //
T02D2512-2:156b-18: zhes bya ba ni k'i li k'i la'i'o //
T02D2512-2:156b-19: rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i phyag rgya nyid rdo rje 'dren ma dang 'dra bar /
T02D2512-2:156b-20: srin lag mthe chung kha phye ba //
T02D2512-2:156b-21: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dren ma'i'o //
T02D2512-2:156b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid
T02D2512-2:156b-23: bskor nas pus mor gzhag pa gang yin pa de
T02D2512-2:156b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya nyid //
T02D2512-2:156b-26: gyen du gtor dang thur du blugs //
T02D2512-2:156b-27: mthe bo sbyar nas bskor ba dang /
T02D2512-2:156b-28: rang tu brkyang zhing byug pa dang //
T02D2512-2:156b-29: bskor zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang //
T02D2512-2:156b-30: bskor zhing snying gar gzhag par bya //
T02D2512-2:156b-31: yongs su bskor zhing bzhad pa dang //
T02D2512-2:156b-32: kha las gyen du dbyung ba dang //
T02D2512-2:156b-33: de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba'o //
T02D2512-2:156b-34: mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis so //
T02D2512-2:156b-35: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo g-yas kyis gzung //
T02D2512-2:156b-36: mdzub mo mthe bo 'ching ba dang //
T02D2512-2:156b-37: mthe bo mtha' ma'i nang du gzhag / ces bya
T02D2512-2:156b-38: ba 'di rnams rim pa bzhin du dpyid ka rdo
T02D2512-2:156b-40: rdo rje dril bu ma'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams yin no //
T02D2512-2:156b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rang
T02D2512-2:156b-42: gi snying po rnams kho na 'dir chos kyi phyag
T02D2512-2:156b-44: las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de nyid yin no
T02D2512-2:156b-45: zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:156b-46: du rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:156b-47: rdo rje dril bu ma'i bar du las kyi phyag
T02D2512-2:156b-48: rgya rnams gang bar bstan pa de nyid de bzhin
T02D2512-2:157a-1: 'khor 'dir yang las kyi phyag rgya gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:157a-2: khyad par ni 'di yin te 'dir khu tshur gnyis las 'byung ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:157a-3: 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:157a-4: pa'i khu tshur gyis de bzhin du bcing ba'o zhes
T02D2512-2:157a-5: bya ba la / 'dis ni don 'di bstan par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-2:157a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas g-yon pa rdo rje snyems ma dang /
T02D2512-2:157a-7: g-yas pa rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul gyis snying gar bzung ste /
T02D2512-2:157a-8: 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya yin no //
T02D2512-2:157a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas sgeg
T02D2512-2:157a-10: pa dang bcas pas mtha' la sogs pa bkrol la
T02D2512-2:157a-11: klog 'gyu ba'i tshul gyis g-yas su yongs su bskor
T02D2512-2:157a-12: te spyi bo'i phyogs su ka pu ta'i thal mo
T02D2512-2:157a-13: kha sbyor bcings te phab nas rdo rje thal mo
T02D2512-2:157a-14: bcings la de nyid sgeg pas me tog 'bul ba'i
T02D2512-2:157a-15: tshul gyis te / steng du gtor la slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02D2512-2:157a-16: mda' dang gzhu gtod pa'i tshul bya ste 'di ni
T02D2512-2:157a-17: rdo rje mtshon cha ma'i las kyi phyag rgya yin
T02D2512-2:157a-18: no // de bzhin du gar byas nas rdo rje thal mo bcings la /
T02D2512-2:157a-19: de nyid sgeg pas sbos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis 'og tu blugs la /
T02D2512-2:157a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la bdag nyid 'khyud par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:157a-21: 'di ni rdo rje k'i li k'i la'i'o //
T02D2512-2:157a-22: de bzhin du gar byas nas rdo rje thal mo
T02D2512-2:157a-23: bcings te de nyid sgeg cing mar me 'bul ba'i
T02D2512-2:157a-24: tshul gyis mthe bo sbyor zhing bskor bar byas la
T02D2512-2:157a-25: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te
T02D2512-2:157a-26: rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya ste
T02D2512-2:157a-28: de bzhin du gar byas la rdo rje thal mo bcings te /
T02D2512-2:157a-29: de nyid sgeg pas snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang la dris byug pa'i tshul gyis rab tu sbyar te /
T02D2512-2:157a-30: slar yang rdo rje thal mo bcings nas spyi bor bzung ste /
T02D2512-2:157a-31: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la snyems pa gnyis bya ste /
T02D2512-2:157a-33: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis
T02D2512-2:157a-34: kyis gar byas la kha sbyor gyi thal mo spyi
T02D2512-2:157b-0: @157b de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis snying ga'i phyogs su bskor zhing bcings te /
T02D2512-2:157b-1: me tog 'bul ba'i tshul gyis steng du gtor bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:157b-2: 'di ni rdo rje dpyid ka ma'i'o //
T02D2512-2:157b-3: de bzhin du gar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2512-2:157b-4: khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing snying ga'i phyogs su bcings
T02D2512-2:157b-5: la / spos 'bul ba'i tshul gyis 'og tu blugs par bya ste 'di ni rdo rje sprin ma'i'o //
T02D2512-2:157b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la /
T02D2512-2:157b-7: mar me 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mthe bo sbyar zhing bskor bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:157b-8: 'di ni ston ka rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D2512-2:157b-9: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis
T02D2512-2:157b-10: bcings nas bskor te snying ga'i phyogs su brkyang ste
T02D2512-2:157b-11: / des dris byug pa'i tshul du bya ste /
T02D2512-2:157b-12: slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings
T02D2512-2:157b-13: te spyi bo'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ste 'di
T02D2512-2:157b-15: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis
T02D2512-2:157b-16: bskor nas snying ga'i phyogs su bcings nas gzung bar
T02D2512-2:157b-18: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis
T02D2512-2:157b-19: bskor zhing bcings la bzhad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su
T02D2512-2:157b-20: bskor nas kha'i mthar gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:157b-22: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02D2512-2:157b-23: ngag 'byin pa'i tshul gyis kha las gyen du drang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:157b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bskor zhing bcings la /
T02D2512-2:157b-26: gar gyi tshul gyis bskor bar bya ste 'di ni gar ma'i'o //
T02D2512-2:157b-27: gar dang bral ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2512-2:157b-28: mdzub mo gnyis kyis lcags kyu gnyis byas te 'di ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i'o //
T02D2512-2:157b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te g-yas
T02D2512-2:157b-30: ba'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bspreng
T02D2512-2:157b-32: 'di ni rdo rje zhags pa ma'i'o //

T02D2512-2:172b-42: rgya la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //

T02D2512-2:172b-44: de bsgrub pa ni rang nyid la dbang du bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:173a-2: nyin re zhes bya ba ni zhag re re la'o //
T02D2512-2:173a-3: sngon du ni snga ma'i thun mtshams kyi dus su'o //
T02D2512-2:173a-4: lan cig ni lan cig go //
T02D2512-2:173a-5: rang gi lha'i snying pos rang nyid bsgrub pa ni bdag nyid bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:173a-6: rang nyid bsgrub pa 'dis cir 'gyur zhe na / rang gi bcings nas mdor bsdus pas //
T02D2512-2:173a-8: zhes bya ba la 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-2:173a-9: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings te
T02D2512-2:173a-10: de dang de rang gi lha'i snying po brjod cing
T02D2512-2:173a-12: 'di ltar phyag rgya de dang rang nyid dam tshig
T02D2512-2:173a-13: gi bcing bas bcings nas sgrub pa po de'i dbang
T02D2512-2:173a-15: 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyang 'byung ngo //
T02D2512-2:173a-16: de ltar rang gi lha'i snying po brjod pas //
T02D2512-2:173a-17: dang por phyag rgya thams cad bcings te /
T02D2512-2:173a-18: phyi nas rang gi lha'i snying po aa nu r'a
T02D2512-2:173a-19: ga ya mi zhes pa 'di dang bcas par bzlas
T02D2512-2:173a-20: na de rnams grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-2:173a-21: don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:173a-22: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:173a-23: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gsang ba bsgrub pa /
T02D2512-2:173a-24: aa nu r'a ga ya mi zhes bya ba'i snying
T02D2512-2:173a-25: po 'di dang bcas pa'i rigs thams cad kyi snying
T02D2512-2:173a-27: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa //
T02D2512-2:173a-28: zhes bya ba la snying po ni dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2512-2:173a-29: po las gsungs pa'i rigs dang rigs su sngags kyi
T02D2512-2:173a-32: sngags ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i yi ge rnams so //
T02D2512-2:173a-33: rigs pa ni las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:173a-34: chos dang las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyang snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-2:173a-35: rig par brjod pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:173a-36: snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-2:173a-37: rig pa 'di rnams bsgrub pa 'di ni rjes su chags pa'i mtshan nyid can nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-2:173a-38: de nyid rmad du byung ba ni sngon ma byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:173a-39: 'di nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:173a-40: ci nus ci 'dod bzlas pa yi //
T02D2512-2:173a-41: nye ba'i snying po gsang ba'o //
T02D2512-2:173b-0: zhes bya ba la gang @173b zhig 'di ci nus pa dang /
T02D2512-2:173b-1: yid kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas gsang ba ste /
T02D2512-2:173b-2: rjes su chags pa'i dngos po nye ba'i snying po
T02D2512-2:173b-3: sgrub pa bstan pa de ni rmad du byung ba'i
T02D2512-2:173b-6: don yod ces bya ba la don yod thogs med gsang ba ni phyag rgya rnams so ;
T02D2512-2:173b-7: / grub pa ni de dag grub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:173b-8: ji ltar zhe na rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D2512-2:173b-9: de bzhin du rjes su chags pa sgrub pa'i rnam
T02D2512-2:173b-10: pa des bsod nams dang mi ldan pa'i sgrub pa
T02D2512-2:173b-11: po sdig ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi yang phyag
T02D2512-2:173b-12: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi
T02D2512-2:173b-13: phyag rgya rnams dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:173b-14: te / de'i phyir phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa 'dis rmad du byung ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:173b-15: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la snying po
T02D2512-2:173b-16: mchog ni sbyin par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-2:173b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i snying po dkyil
T02D2512-2:173b-18: 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la sbyin par mi
T02D2512-2:173b-19: bya'o // gsang zhing gsang ba'i rgyud de ni //
T02D2512-2:173b-21: yang dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di gsang zhing gsang
T02D2512-2:173b-22: ba'i dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la bstan
T02D2512-2:173b-23: par mi bya'o // gal te dngos grub yid 'ong 'dod ;
T02D2512-2:173b-24: / ces bya ba la gal te slob dpon nges
T02D2512-2:173b-25: dpal mchog dang po'i dngos grub shin tu yid du
T02D2512-2:173b-26: 'ong ba 'dod na de'i tshe dkyil 'khor du ma
T02D2512-2:173b-27: zhugs pa rnams la sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D2512-2:173b-28: gang gi khyim du gnas gyur pa //
T02D2512-2:173b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o /
T02D2512-2:173b-31: // / de ltar dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud bstan nas //
T02D2512-2:173b-32: da ni de nyid dang dum bu dang po las
T02D2512-2:173b-33: gsungs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rtog pa thams cad
T02D2512-2:173b-34: bsdu ba'i phyir / sems can thams cad bde don du //
T02D2512-2:173b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:173b-36: de la sems can thams cad kyi bde ba 'jig
T02D2512-2:173b-37: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste de'i don
T02D2512-2:173b-38: du'o // de bzhin du bstan pa thams cad ni
T02D2512-2:173b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' phan pa dang bde ba'i
T02D2512-2:173b-40: don du gnyer ba rnams kyi bya ba 'di yin
T02D2512-2:173b-41: du'o // no zhes bya'o // de grub pa ni
T02D2512-2:173b-42: gdul bya rnams kyis de'i rjes su 'brang bas te
T02D2512-2:174a-0: du'o // no zhes bya'o // / de'i don du @174a * //
T02D2512-2:174a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad de /
T02D2512-2:174a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' sras dang bcas pas /
T02D2512-2:174a-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa rdo rje
T02D2512-2:174a-4: 'chang chen po de la 'di skad ces zhus so
T02D2512-2:174a-5: // bde ba chen po rab grub phyir //
T02D2512-2:174a-6: zhes bya ba ni gdul bya rnams kyis so //
T02D2512-2:174a-7: chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir //
T02D2512-2:174a-8: zhes bya ba ni de dag nyid kyis so //
T02D2512-2:174a-9: rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud //
T02D2512-2:174a-10: sems dpa' chen po bshad du gsol //
T02D2512-2:174a-11: zhes bya ba la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2512-2:174a-12: pa'i rigs lnga'i rtog pa rnams bsdus pa ni rtog
T02D2512-2:174a-13: pa thams cad bsdus pa ste /
T02D2512-2:174a-14: de dang der bstan pa'i rtog pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:174a-15: sgra thams cad kyi don gdul bya rnams kyis gzung
T02D2512-2:174a-16: ba'i don zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:174a-17: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ni ming gi rnam
T02D2512-2:174a-18: grangs kyi sgo nas don ston par byed pa'i sgra'i
T02D2512-2:174a-19: tshogs gsungs shig ces bya ba la de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:174a-20: pa sras dang bcas pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:174a-21: rdo rje 'chang chen po la zhus pa'o //
T02D2512-2:174a-22: rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la //
T02D2512-2:174a-23: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:174a-24: bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol //
T02D2512-2:174a-25: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis mdor bstan pa'i gzhung gis zhus pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:174a-26: de nas kyi sgra ni de ma thag pa la
T02D2512-2:174a-27: ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhus pa'i
T02D2512-2:174a-29: sems can thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:174a-30: pa thams cad kyi rtog pa rnams bsdus pa dris
T02D2512-2:174a-31: pa'i bka' grub pa bstan pa'i don yod par gzigs
T02D2512-2:174a-32: nas zhal shin tu rnam par bzhad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:174a-33: dam tshig chen po thams cad kyi de kho na
T02D2512-2:174a-34: nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba rnam par gnon
T02D2512-2:174a-35: pa mdzad nas zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:174a-36: dam tshig chen po yang yin la thams cad kyang
T02D2512-2:174a-37: yin pas na dam tshig chen po thams cad de
T02D2512-2:174a-38: / rigs thams cad gnyis su med par shes pa'o //
T02D2512-2:174a-39: de kho na nyid kyis ni rigs lnga'i de kho na nyid bcu'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2512-2:174a-40: de nyid de bzhin nyid rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje ste /
T02D2512-2:174b-0: @174b de'i ming can gyis rnam par gnon pa'i rigs
T02D2512-2:174b-1: lngar sbrul pas sems can gyi don mdzad nas 'di
T02D2512-2:174b-2: zhes bya ba ni thugs la gnas pa'i rtog pa
T02D2512-2:174b-3: thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i rgyud
T02D2512-2:174b-4: phyi ma ste / mchog tu gyur pa'i sgra'i tshogs
T02D2512-2:174b-5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa
T02D2512-2:174b-6: phyi ma ste / yin no // de la phyag
T02D2512-2:174b-7: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rtog pa nges par
T02D2512-2:174b-8: shes pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2512-2:174b-9: ba'i don 'di rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-2:174b-10: phyi ma ste / yin no // // de la
T02D2512-2:174b-11: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rtog pa khyab pa'i rgyud
T02D2512-2:174b-12: 'di yin no zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:174b-13: de la zhes bya ba'i sgra ni dmigs kyis dgar ba'am /
T02D2512-2:174b-14: ngag nye bar dgod pa la blta bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:174b-15: 'di zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:174b-16: rnam par mi rtog pa ni rtog pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T02D2512-2:174b-17: de las sngon goms pa'i stobs kyis 'byung ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:174b-18: 'khor la sogs pa sgrub pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T02D2512-2:174b-19: ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i rtog pa'o //
T02D2512-2:174b-20: de khyab pa ni gdul bya skye bo'i rgyud la
T02D2512-2:174b-21: sos sor gtad pa'i don du sgra'i tshogs ni 'dir
T02D2512-2:174b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzung ba dang 'dzin
T02D2512-2:174b-24: pa'i rtog pa phral ba'i chos bdag med pa'i ting
T02D2512-2:174b-25: nge 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
T02D2512-2:174b-26: ni'i sgra ni nges par bzung ba ste rnam par
T02D2512-2:174b-27: mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid las so
T02D2512-2:174b-28: // sems can don ni yongs su brtag / ces
T02D2512-2:174b-29: bya ba la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:174b-30: dngos grub sems can rnams kyi don du gnyer bar
T02D2512-2:174b-31: byas na sems can gyi don no //
T02D2512-2:174b-32: sems can gyi don de yongs su ni phyogs bcu
T02D2512-2:174b-33: kun du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rab
T02D2512-2:174b-34: tu 'jug pas na yongs su brtag par brjod pa
T02D2512-2:174b-35: yin no // yongs su brtag pa'i rgyud de'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:174b-36: des na rtog pa bshad pa ste zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:174b-37: rtog pa las byung ba'i rgyud de nyid kyi phyir
T02D2512-2:174b-38: phyag rgya chen po la sogs par ston par byed
T02D2512-2:174b-39: pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rtog pa zhes bya ba ste
T02D2512-2:174b-40: // de bshad pa ni brjod pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:174b-41: rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:174b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gdul bya rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa spang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:175a-1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
T02D2512-2:175a-2: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyi dbang gis bstan pa la 'jug pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:175a-3: slar yang gdul bya rnams la ni /
T02D2512-2:175a-4: 'di ltar rtog pa 'byung ba yin te /
T02D2512-2:175a-5: bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par rtog cing rnam par
T02D2512-2:175a-6: dpyad nas tshig tu gsung pa yin gyi rnam par
T02D2512-2:175a-7: rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa med pas ni ma yin no //
T02D2512-2:175a-8: de ltar bstan pa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2512-2:175a-9: pa'i sgom pa po rnams rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D2512-2:175a-10: ting nge 'dzin rtog pa'i phyir slob bzhin pa rnams
T02D2512-2:175a-11: kyi rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i ting nge
T02D2512-2:175a-12: 'dzin yin no // de bas rtog pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir rtog pa bshad pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:175a-13: de ltar phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i rtog pa shes pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:175a-14: da ni snying po'i rgyud shes pas dngos grub thob
T02D2512-2:175a-15: pa yin gyi rnam pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin
T02D2512-2:175a-16: no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:175a-17: de la bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:175a-18: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D2512-2:175a-19: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yin la /
T02D2512-2:175a-20: de ston par byed pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-2:175a-21: sa la yi ge gnas bris nas /
T02D2512-2:175a-23: ji ltar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la /
T02D2512-2:175a-24: kha dog dbyibs kyis bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:175a-25: ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D2512-2:175a-26: yi ge'i gnas ni yi ge'i gnas te rten no //
T02D2512-2:175a-27: 'gyur ba med pa chos kyi dbyings mngon du byed pa'i thabs so //
T02D2512-2:175a-28: bde ba chen po zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-2:175a-29: zhes bya ba la bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'i thabs dang /
T02D2512-2:175a-30: bde ba chen po'i rgyu dang mthun pa dang /
T02D2512-2:175a-31: bde ba chen po ston par byed pa nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2512-2:175a-32: kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:175a-33: de nyid bde ba chen po zhes bya bar brjod
T02D2512-2:175a-34: pa yin no // de'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes
T02D2512-2:175a-35: bya ba la gang zhig bde ba chen po'i snying
T02D2512-2:175a-36: po yi ge bcu bdun po nyid ni mi phyed
T02D2512-2:175a-37: pa yin no // pa'i phyir ro // rdo rje
T02D2512-2:175a-38: de nyid rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor de'i dam
T02D2512-2:175a-39: tshig ni bskyed pa'i rgyu yin no //
T02D2512-2:175a-40: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2512-2:175b-0: snying po @175b thams cad sgrub par byed po'o zhes
T02D2512-2:175b-1: bya ba la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D2512-2:175b-2: byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa
T02D2512-2:175b-4: de las byung ba'i yi ge bcu bdun gyi bdag nyid can nye bar btags pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-2:175b-5: de nyid 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2512-2:175b-6: dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par byed pa nyid kyi
T02D2512-2:175b-7: phyir thams cad sgrub par byed pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:175b-8: 'dis ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can du nges pa'i ye shes ni snying po'o //
T02D2512-2:175b-9: de las byung ba'i sgra'i rang bzhin rigs thams cad
T02D2512-2:175b-10: kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bskyed pa'i rgyu gang yin pa
T02D2512-2:175b-11: de yang snying por bstan to //
T02D2512-2:175b-13: bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa las sngon du
T02D2512-2:175b-14: thog ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid gnyis su med
T02D2512-2:175b-15: pa'i ye shes gnas pa yin te de'i phyir yi
T02D2512-2:175b-16: ge bcu bdun pa'i snying po bar mtshams med pa
T02D2512-2:175b-17: nyid du rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams skyed
T02D2512-2:175b-18: par byed pa nyid du gnas pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:175b-19: de ltar snying po shes pa'i rgyud bstan nas //
T02D2512-2:175b-20: da ni ji ltar sbrul pa'i dkyil 'khor shes pas
T02D2512-2:175b-21: dngos grub thob pa'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi bshad
T02D2512-2:175b-23: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2512-2:175b-24: ji ltar gnas zhes bya ba ni ji ltar dkyil
T02D2512-2:175b-25: 'khor rgyal mchog bsgoms pa'i dus su //
T02D2512-2:175b-26: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:175b-27: gnas bstan pa de bzhin du skyed mos tshal gyi
T02D2512-2:175b-28: gnas su dkyil 'khor gnas te rnam par bsgoms la
T02D2512-2:175b-29: / gnas de ru dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:175b-30: ji ltar dus zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:175b-31: rgyas pa'i las ni snga dro //
T02D2512-2:175b-32: drag po'i las ni nyi ma phyed dam mtshan phyed //
T02D2512-2:175b-33: zhi ba la ni srod kyi dus su'o //
T02D2512-2:175b-34: sgrub pa chen po la ni nyi ma 'char ka'i dus su dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:175b-35: ji ltar 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo
T02D2512-2:175b-36: rje sems dpa'i rigs su ni sgeg pa'i nyams gtso
T02D2512-2:175b-37: ba'o // de bzhin gshegs pa ni zhi ba'i nyams gtso ba'o //
T02D2512-2:175b-38: rdo rje h'um mdzad khro zhing rngam pa ste khro bo'i nyams gtso ba'o //
T02D2512-2:175b-39: rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ni snying rje'i nyams gtso ba'o //
T02D2512-2:176a-1: nam mkha'i snying po'i khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal

T02D2512-2:182a-32: snying po de dpag tu med pa bzlas pas dpal
T02D2512-2:182a-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2512-2:182a-34: pa'i dngos grub chen po'i bde ba ster ba yin
T02D2512-2:182a-35: no // de ltar dang po'i snying po'i sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:182a-36: da ni snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang
T02D2512-2:182a-37: rig pa rnams kyi shes pas snying po dang phyag
T02D2512-2:182b-0: rgya dang sngags dang rig pa rnams kyi @182b dngos
T02D2512-2:182b-1: grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rab tu
T02D2512-2:182b-3: de nas snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang
T02D2512-2:182b-4: rig pa bsgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba
T02D2512-2:182b-5: gsungs te / de la snying po ni 'dir phyag
T02D2512-2:182b-6: rgya chen po'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-2:182b-7: gsungs te / rgya'o // sngags ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-2:182b-8: rig pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-2:182b-9: rgyud gzhan nas gsungs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:182b-10: la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya
T02D2512-2:182b-11: ba'i phyir / sems dpa' gang gis zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:182b-12: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ji ltar bshad pa'i snying po dang /
T02D2512-2:182b-15: rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bdag nyid dam mdun du bsgrub par byas na /
T02D2512-2:182b-17: da ni dngos grub shes pas rigs lnga las gsungs
T02D2512-2:182b-18: pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:182b-19: rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:182b-20: de nas dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:182b-21: rdo rje sems dpa'i nyang dang /
T02D2512-2:182b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /
T02D2512-2:182b-25: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po nyid rdzogs shing nges
T02D2512-2:182b-26: par 'grub pa gang yin pa de ni dngos grub
T02D2512-2:182b-27: shes pa'o // rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che //
T02D2512-2:182b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid rtog pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:182b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun te /
T02D2512-2:182b-31: de rnams kyi dngos grub gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi'o //
T02D2512-2:182b-32: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs te de'i dngos po ni rdo rje nyid do //
T02D2512-2:182b-33: byang chub kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' ste padma'i rigs so ;
T02D2512-2:182b-34: / de'i dngos po ni byang chub sems dpa' nyid do //
T02D2512-2:182b-35: las kyang yin la kun yang yin pas kun te rin po che'i rigs rnams so //
T02D2512-2:182b-36: 'di rnams kyi mchog gi dngos grub ni rigs thams cad rtogs pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D2512-2:183a-0: de dag gi mchog gi dngos grub @183a * //
T02D2512-2:183a-1: ni 'di rnams yin no zhes bya bar nges pa bskyed nas /
T02D2512-2:183a-2: de rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa byas nas rnal 'byor grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:183a-3: de ltar dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:183a-4: da ni bsod nams med pa'i dngos grub shes pas
T02D2512-2:183a-5: bsod nams med pa rnams med kyang 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:183a-6: ro zhes bya ba rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:183a-7: de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyi yang dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:183a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshe
T02D2512-2:183a-10: ji skad bshad pa'i bsnyen pa sngon du byas pas
T02D2512-2:183a-11: kyang rnal 'byor ba la sgrib pa yod pas mngon
T02D2512-2:183a-12: par 'dod pa'i dngos grub grub par ma gyur na
T02D2512-2:183a-13: / de'i tshe rang gi rigs kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:183a-14: mtha' mar thal pas kyang bris pa la 'jug pa'i
T02D2512-2:183a-16: zhag bzhir phyag rgya chen po bcings nas dkyil 'khor bsgom par byas na /
T02D2512-2:183a-17: de sgrib pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:183a-18: de ltar bsod nams med pa rnams kyi yang sgrub pa shes pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:183a-19: da ni slob dpon gyi dngos grub shes pas kyang
T02D2512-2:183a-20: dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rab
T02D2512-2:183a-22: de nas slob dpon nyid kyi dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:183a-23: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams te /
T02D2512-2:183a-24: de dag gi gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig ni
T02D2512-2:183a-25: dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad
T02D2512-2:183a-27: der ji skad bshad pa'i 'jug pa'i tshogs zhugs te /
T02D2512-2:183a-28: sngar bshad pa'i chogs bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:183a-29: de ltar na slob dpon nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:183a-30: da ni me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'bul
T02D2512-2:183a-31: ba shes pas me tog la sogs pa phul bas
T02D2512-2:183a-32: tshogs yongs su rdzogs nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:183a-33: ro zhes bya ba rab tu bstan pa'i phyir me
T02D2512-2:183a-34: tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba shes pa'i
T02D2512-2:183a-35: rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:183b-0: rdo rje @183b 'dzin la mchod pa kun //
T02D2512-2:183b-1: zhes bya ba la sngon po dang /
T02D2512-2:183b-4: dkar po'i kha dog can gyi me tog la sogs
T02D2512-2:183b-5: pa rnams ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs la dbul
T02D2512-2:183b-6: par bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni kha dog dkar po can no //
T02D2512-2:183b-7: rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyi rigs la ni kha dog nag po can no //
T02D2512-2:183b-8: padma'i rigs la ni kha dog dmar po can no //
T02D2512-2:183b-9: nor bu'i rigs la ni kha dog ser bo can no //
T02D2512-2:183b-10: 'di rnams kyang dpyid ka'i rdo rje ma la sogs
T02D2512-2:183b-11: pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis blangs te dbul
T02D2512-2:183b-12: bar bya ba yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2512-2:183b-13: phyir / de nas 'bul ba shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:183b-14: rdzogs pa'am zhes bya ba ni dpyid ka rdo rje
T02D2512-2:183b-15: ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya phyi rol
T02D2512-2:183b-16: gyi me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang bcas
T02D2512-2:183b-17: pa'o // de dang bral ba ni ma tshang ba'o //
T02D2512-2:183b-18: yang na ji ltar rnyed pa'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:183b-19: phyogs gcig tsam thob pa ni bskyed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:183b-20: rdo rje gar ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa yis zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:183b-21: rdo rje gar ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:183b-22: de nyid dang po gang dag la yod pa de
T02D2512-2:183b-23: ni rdo rje gar ma la sogs ba'i mchod pa'o
T02D2512-2:183b-24: // dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D2512-2:183b-25: de dag gis rtag tu ste rtag pa kho nar
T02D2512-2:183b-26: phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2512-2:183b-27: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du me tog la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:183b-29: da ni dus kyi mchod pa bsgrub par shes pas
T02D2512-2:183b-30: kyang mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub grub par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:183b-31: ro zhes bya ba rab tu bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:183b-32: de nas dus kyi mchod pa shes pa sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:183b-33: drug ldan la sogs pa'i glu'i khyad par gyis rdo
T02D2512-2:183b-34: rje glu brjod cing gar las byung ba'i dpyid ka
T02D2512-2:183b-35: rdo rje ma la sogs pa mchod pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:183b-36: de bzhin du bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:183b-37: de nas dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i snying po brjod cing /
T02D2512-2:183b-38: dpyid ka rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas dor bas /
T02D2512-2:184a-1: pa'i rang bzhin gyis mchod pa rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:184a-2: de ltar dus kyi mchod pa bsgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:184a-3: da ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:184a-4: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi po shes bas kyang dngos
T02D2512-2:184a-5: grub thob pa yin no zhes rab tu bstan par
T02D2512-2:184a-6: bya ba'i phyir / de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:184a-7: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa ni ji skad bshad
T02D2512-2:184a-8: pa'i mtshan nyid can du shes par bya ste bcas
T02D2512-2:184a-9: pa'o // go rims ji lta ba bzhin du //
T02D2512-2:184a-11: rdo rje glu len cing sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2512-2:184a-12: kha sbyor gyi thal mo spyi bor bcings te phab
T02D2512-2:184a-13: la / rdo rje thal mo bcings nas snga ma
T02D2512-2:184a-14: bzhin du me tog la sogs pa 'bul ba'i tshul
T02D2512-2:184a-15: gyis te der dor la rdo rje sems dpa'i las
T02D2512-2:184a-17: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i las kyi
T02D2512-2:184a-18: phyag rgya bcing ba ni go rims ji lta ba
T02D2512-2:184a-19: bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgras brjod pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:184a-20: bzlas pa'i don gyis ma brjod kyang /
T02D2512-2:184a-21: mchog gi dngos grub grub par 'gyur //
T02D2512-2:184a-22: zhes bya ba la rdo rje glu'i don gang yin pa dang /
T02D2512-2:184a-23: rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i snying po'i
T02D2512-2:184a-24: don gang yin pa de ni bzlas pa'i don to
T02D2512-2:184a-25: // bzlas pa'i don des rdo rje glu dang rdo
T02D2512-2:184a-26: rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i snying po ma
T02D2512-2:184a-27: brjod na yang gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi
T02D2512-2:184a-30: 'di ni sgrub pa mchog yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D2512-2:184a-31: / da ni bdag nyid la smad par mi bya'o
T02D2512-2:184a-32: zhes bya ba rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-2:184a-33: / de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa yang
T02D2512-2:184a-34: grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te
T02D2512-2:184a-35: / / dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang //
T02D2512-2:184a-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-2:184a-37: rnal 'byor ba gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs par
T02D2512-2:184a-38: ma gyur pa de yang phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2512-2:184a-39: nas ting nge 'dzin mngon du byed na sdig pa
T02D2512-2:184a-40: thams cad las rnam par 'gyur na gzhan lta smos
T02D2512-2:184a-41: kyang ci dgos / de'i phyir na ngag tshul khrims
T02D2512-2:184a-42: 'chal ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2512-2:184b-0: @184b rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid la smad par mi
T02D2512-2:184b-1: kyang ci dgos / bya ste / phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-2:184b-2: po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis tshul khrims 'chal
T02D2512-2:184b-3: ba la sogs pa 'jig pa dang /
T02D2512-2:184b-4: tshul khrims la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:184b-5: byang chub kyi sems la smad pa dang dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur te /
T02D2512-2:184b-6: de bas na de yongs su spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:184b-7: de nas dngos grub mi thob pa'i rgyu shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:184b-8: chags pa ni chos bdag med pa la chags pa dang /
T02D2512-2:184b-9: sems can smin pa dang grol ba la chags pa'o //
T02D2512-2:184b-10: de'i phyir sems can la chags pas ci zhig bya
T02D2512-2:184b-11: zhes bya ba'i don smod pa rnal 'byor bas mi
T02D2512-2:184b-12: bya'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2512-2:184b-13: rnam par dag ba zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-2:184b-14: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:184b-15: de rnam par dag pa yin no ;
T02D2512-2:184b-16: / de bzhin bde ba ster zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-2:184b-17: de'i dmigs pa la zhugs pa'i sgrub pa po rnams
T02D2512-2:184b-18: la chags pa des 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
T02D2512-2:184b-19: 'das pa'i bde ba ster ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:184b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyang chags pa che //
T02D2512-2:184b-21: zhes bya ba la thog ma dang tha ma med
T02D2512-2:184b-22: pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ni
T02D2512-2:184b-23: chags pa chen po ste smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2512-2:184b-27: chags pa chen po'i rang bzhin can sems can thams
T02D2512-2:184b-28: cad rjes su chags pa 'di ma dag na ni
T02D2512-2:184b-29: / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i
T02D2512-2:184b-30: dri mas gos pas rnal 'byor pa grub par mi
T02D2512-2:184b-31: 'gyur pa de'i phyir 'di la smad par mi bya
T02D2512-2:184b-32: ste shin tu gus pas bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-2:184b-34: de ltar byang chub kyi sems la smod pa dgag
T02D2512-2:184b-35: par byas nas re zhig rang gi lha'i tshul 'dzin
T02D2512-2:184b-37: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub 'byung ngo zhes bya bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:184b-38: de nas dngos grub bsgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:184b-39: ji bzhin yul ngang ldan gyur nas //
T02D2512-2:185a-1: ba la ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa' 'am /
T02D2512-2:185a-2: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa'i lha'i
T02D2512-2:185a-3: khyad par gzhan dag cod pan la sogs pa'i yul
T02D2512-2:185a-4: rnams kyis yul dang ldan pa de bzhin du rang
T02D2512-2:185a-5: gi lha'i rgyan rnams kyi rnal 'byor ba yul dang
T02D2512-2:185a-6: ldan par gyur nas rang gi phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-2:185a-7: la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya
T02D2512-2:185a-8: ba yin no // de ci'i phyir rang gi lha'i
T02D2512-2:185a-9: tshul 'dzin pas bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe
T02D2512-2:185a-10: na rtog pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:185a-11: ba yin no // pa la / gang gi phyir
T02D2512-2:185a-12: rtog pa thams cad la rang gi lha'i tshul gyis
T02D2512-2:185a-13: rnal 'byor 'di skye ba 'di nyid la phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:185a-14: chen po la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa ni
T02D2512-2:185a-15: rnal 'byor pa rnams la rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:185a-16: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:185a-17: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rigs thams cad
T02D2512-2:185a-18: kyi gnyis su med pa'i sems dang sems las byung
T02D2512-2:185a-19: ba rnams te / de dag gi gsang ba ni rigs thams cad du gtogs pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02D2512-2:185a-20: de rnams nyid ni rtogs pa chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:185a-21: de nyid nam mkha'i khams thams cad la rtag tu
T02D2512-2:185a-22: bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi
T02D2512-2:185a-23: rdo rje thams cad la khyab pa rnams kyi skyed
T02D2512-2:185a-24: pa'i rgyu par mtshams med pa nyid du gyur pa'i
T02D2512-2:185a-25: phyir mdzes shing gsal bar gyur pas na rtog pa
T02D2512-2:185a-27: de las byung ba'i sgra'i tshogs kyang de ston par byed pa'i phyir rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2512-2:185a-28: rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po de las rtog pa
T02D2512-2:185a-29: thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba 'di
T02D2512-2:185a-30: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rtog pa thams
T02D2512-2:185a-31: cad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa
T02D2512-2:185a-32: de dag gi rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa zhes
T02D2512-2:185a-33: bya ba phyi ma'i rgyud ni phul du byung ba'i
T02D2512-2:185a-34: rgyud do // de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni rnam
T02D2512-2:185a-35: pa sna tshogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub
T02D2512-2:185a-37: de ltar rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i
T02D2512-2:185a-38: cho ga rgyas pa mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par
T02D2512-2:185a-40: da ni bcom ldan 'das rtag pa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:185b-0: la sogs pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha @185b
T02D2512-2:185b-1: mo'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par
T02D2512-2:185b-2: bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:185b-3: de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos rdo
T02D2512-2:185b-4: rje bsgrub pa'i rgyud gsungs so zhes bya ba dang
T02D2512-2:185b-5: sbyar ro // de nas kyi sgra ni skabs la bab pa'o //
T02D2512-2:185b-6: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:185b-7: rtag pa zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha
T02D2512-2:185b-8: ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang de'i rgyu mthun
T02D2512-2:185b-9: par de ltar byung ba'i rang bzhin gyis rtag tu
T02D2512-2:185b-10: bzhugs pa rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2512-2:185b-11: 'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin can rdo rje 'chang chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:185b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin can bstan pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:185b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:185b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la gsang ba yang
T02D2512-2:185b-15: yin pas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de
