T02D2512-2:189a-6: rang gi las kyi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:189a-7: 'dis zhes bya ba la dang po'i rdo rje bcing
T02D2512-2:189a-8: ba'i sgrub pa 'dis rtog pa thams cad de 'jig
T02D2512-2:189a-9: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rtog pa thams
T02D2512-2:189a-10: cad la ji ltar bshad pa'i phyag rgya thams cad
T02D2512-2:189a-11: ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:189a-12: thams cad mdor bsdus pas rang gis rang nyid bcings
T02D2512-2:189a-13: nas bsgrub pa'i dbang du 'gyur zhing grub par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:189a-14: bas / de'i phyir ma bsgrub kyang 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:189a-15: dang po'i rdo rje bcings pa las dus phyis sngar
T02D2512-2:189a-16: bshad pa'i rang gi snying po brjod pa med kyang
T02D2512-2:189a-17: phyag rgya de rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:189a-18: de ltar dang po'i rdo rjes bcings nas /
T02D2512-2:189a-19: phyag rgya gzhan yang bcing bar bya'o zhes bya ba bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:189a-20: re zhig spyod lam bzhi pos chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:189a-21: thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don rab
T02D2512-2:189a-22: tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

T02D2512-2:189a-24: de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags bsgrub pa
T02D2512-2:189a-25: gsungs so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:189a-26: de nas kyi sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:189a-27: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:189a-28: chos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T02D2512-2:189a-29: rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba'o
T02D2512-2:189a-30: // de dag gi de kho na nyid ni rang

T02D2512-2:189a-32: ni lha thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge rnams
T02D2512-2:189a-33: te de'i bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:189a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D2512-2:189a-37: rang gi lha'i chos kyi phyag rgya bkod nas /

T02D2512-2:189a-42: na gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje la dgod par
T02D2512-2:189b-0: bya'o // padma dang rin @189b po che'i rigs kyi
T02D2512-2:189b-1: rnal 'byor pas ni rang gi snying ga na gnas
T02D2512-2:189b-2: pa'i rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma la bkod de

T02D2512-2:189b-4: sku gzugs brnyan bzhin du langs pa'am 'dug pas bsgom
T02D2512-2:189b-5: bya'o // / par bya'o // thams cad rjes chags
T02D2512-2:189b-6: rnal 'byor ni 'dir rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i ngo
T02D2512-2:189b-7: bya'o // / par bya'o // bo yin no // des cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:189b-8: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:189b-9: rigs thams cad kyi rang gi lha rnams kyi phyag rgya grub pa ni /
T02D2512-2:189b-12: de ltar phyag rgya bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:189b-13: da ni las kyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa pos yi
T02D2512-2:189b-14: ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo
T02D2512-2:189b-15: rje rnam par bsams la las kyi phyag rgya bcings

T02D2512-2:189b-18: phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyi rnam pas mchod pa bya zhing ;
T02D2512-2:189b-19: gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi lha bsgom par bya'o
T02D2512-2:189b-20: zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di rab tu bstan par
T02D2512-2:189b-21: bya ba'i phyir / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2512-2:189b-22: las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i
T02D2512-2:189b-23: rgyud ces bya ba gsungs te /

T02D2512-2:189b-28: pa 'bul ba'am / kyis gsungs so // gsang ba'i gar mchog mchod pa la //

T02D2512-2:189b-31: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:189b-32: de nas gar gyi tshul gyis bsgom par bya zhing rang gi lha bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:189b-33: yang na mchod pa ci bde bar //
T02D2512-2:189b-34: zhes bya ba la rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi phyag
T02D2512-2:189b-35: rgya'i mchod pa yang dang yang du bya zhing rang
T02D2512-2:189b-37: de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor bsgoms na /

T02D2512-2:189b-39: de ltar las kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa bstan nas /

T02D2512-2:189b-41: gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o zhes

T02D2512-2:190a-5: phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste //

T02D2512-2:190a-9: rang gi snying po lan cig bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:190a-10: de ltar byas pas cir 'gyur zhe na /

T02D2512-2:190a-13: ces bya ba la brtan pa ni mi phyed pa'o //

T02D2512-2:190a-18: bzhin can phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyis grub
T02D2512-2:190a-20: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:190a-21: da ni rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa pos ri
T02D2512-2:190a-22: bhi ta la sogs pa'i byed pa'i khams kyi glu

T02D2512-2:190a-37: ri da la sogs pa'i rgyan ni ri da la

T02D2512-2:190b-11: de kho na nyid kyang yin la chen po yang

T02D2512-2:190b-35: dpas gsungs so // thog ma tha ma med pa

T02D2512-2:205a-21: ci'i don du zhe na 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-2:205a-22: rtog ba'i rgyal po chen po 'dir yongs su mthar
T02D2512-2:205a-23: thug pa'i don to zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro
T02D2512-2:205a-24: // dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i rgyud dang phyi
T02D2512-2:205a-25: ma'i rang bzhin 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i thog
T02D2512-2:205a-26: ma tha ma med pa'i nam mkha' dang mnyam pa
T02D2512-2:205a-27: nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D2512-2:205a-28: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-2:205a-29: dam tshig gi phyag rgya las byung ba'o //
T02D2512-2:205a-30: bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig
T02D2512-2:205a-31: ces bya ba ni gzugs thams cad ston par nam
T02D2512-2:205a-32: mkha' thams cad khyab par byed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:205a-33: khams thams cad ces bya ba ni nam mkha'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02D2512-2:205a-34: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams ni khams thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:205a-35: khams thams cad kyang de yin la ma lus pa
T02D2512-2:205a-36: yang de yin pas khams thams cad ma lus pa'o
T02D2512-2:205a-37: // der kun du 'gro ba ni spro ba ste
T02D2512-2:205a-38: khyab pa gang la yod pa de la de skad
T02D2512-2:205a-39: // ces bya'o // phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2512-2:205a-40: pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa
T02D2512-2:205a-41: ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i
T02D2512-2:205a-42: rgyun gang la yod pa de la yang de skad
T02D2512-2:205a-43: // ces bya'o // ces bya'o // srid pa thams
T02D2512-2:205b-0: @205b cad kyi mtha' ni khams gsum gyi rang bzhin
T02D2512-2:205b-1: can te de yongs su mthar ma thug pa'i gsung
T02D2512-2:205b-2: rab kyi bstan pa gang la yong ba de la
T02D2512-2:205b-4: de yongs su mthar thug pa'i don ni yongs su
T02D2512-2:205b-5: rdzogs pa'i phyir thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo
T02D2512-2:205b-6: rje sems dpa' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2512-2:205b-7: kyis gsol ba btab pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:205b-8: gang zhig yongs su mthar thug pa'i byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-2:205b-9: pa'i don du gsol ba btab pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal
T02D2512-2:205b-10: po de nyid kyis khyad par slar yang bstan pa'i
T02D2512-2:205b-11: phyir rdo rje nam mkha' la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2512-2:205b-12: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2512-2:205b-13: rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:205b-15: rgyu 'di nyid kyi phyir chos kyi dbyings chen po
T02D2512-2:205b-16: spro ba ste de bzhin nyid kyis khyab pa'i dngos
T02D2512-2:205b-17: po'o // rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid de /
T02D2512-2:205b-18: de'i phyir rtog pa gzhan dag las mchog ste phul du byung ba'o ;
T02D2512-2:205b-19: / chos thams cad las khyab par byed pa'i de
T02D2512-2:205b-20: bzhin nyid ni rdo rje nam mkha' chen po'i chos
T02D2512-2:205b-21: kyi dbyings te / de spro ba'i dngos grub ni de bzhin nyid rtog pa'o //
T02D2512-2:205b-22: de stsol bas na rdo rje 'chang chen po'i chos kyi dbyings spro pa'i dngos grub stsol ba ste /
T02D2512-2:205b-23: rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi theg pa de yin no //
T02D2512-2:205b-24: de ltar gyur pa'i theg pa chen po ste rdo rje 'chang gcig bu'i ma yin te /
T02D2512-2:205b-25: 'on kyang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
T02D2512-2:205b-26: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas ba zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-2:205b-27: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2512-2:205b-31: don yongs grub pa ba gtso bor gyur pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:205b-32: de dag nyid rtag tu ste /
T02D2512-2:205b-33: dus thams cad du de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje chen po 'dzin pas na /
T02D2512-2:205b-34: rdo rje 'chang chen po ste rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-2:205b-35: la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi lha'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-2:205b-36: can rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D2512-2:205b-37: de dang bcas pa ni de dang lhan cig tu'o //
T02D2512-2:205b-38: rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni //
T02D2512-2:206a-0: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid rdo rje 'chang @206a * //
T02D2512-2:206a-2: de rnams nyid kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
T02D2512-2:206a-3: de theg pa yin te gzhan dag ni ma yin
T02D2512-2:206a-4: no // yongs su mthar thug nus pa min //
T02D2512-2:206a-5: zhes bya ba la nam mkha' khyab pas mtha' yas
T02D2512-2:206a-6: pa'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po'i theg pa yin te
T02D2512-2:206a-7: / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
T02D2512-2:206a-8: yongs su rdzogs par bstan pas gdul bya rnams la
T02D2512-2:206a-9: bstan par mi spyod pa de'i phyir le lo can
T02D2512-2:206a-10: la mdor bsdus nas rab tu bstan par mdzad pa'i
T02D2512-2:206a-11: phyir rtog pa 'di yongs su mthar thug par byin
T02D2512-2:206a-12: gyis brlab pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2512-2:206a-13: kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba btab
T02D2512-2:206a-14: / pa yin no // dngos po mi sdug pa la zhen pas na ngan zhen no //
T02D2512-2:206a-15: ae ma'i sgra ni rjes su bzung ba la'o //
T02D2512-2:206a-16: rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po thos pa dang /
T02D2512-2:206a-17: bsam pa la rab tu 'jug pa la dbang ba med pa'i sems can ni le lo can no //
T02D2512-2:206a-18: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la spyod pas na las kun ldan pa'o //
T02D2512-2:206a-19: thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod //
T02D2512-2:206a-20: ces bya ba la dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje
T02D2512-2:206a-21: chen po'i rang bzhin ni thugs rje dam pa'i rdo
T02D2512-2:206a-22: rje'o // byang chub sems ni bla na med //
T02D2512-2:206a-23: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-2:206a-24: rab sgrub pa zhes bya ba ni rgya che bas
T02D2512-2:206a-25: 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D2512-2:206a-26: dngos grub rab tu bsgrub pa ste /
T02D2512-2:206a-27: de ltar yongs su mthar thug par byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-2:206a-28: pa'i don du gsol ba btab pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:206a-29: rdo rje 'chang chen pos mdor bsdus pa'i gzhung byin
T02D2512-2:206a-30: gyis brlabs la thugs rtse gcig par mdzad nas /
T02D2512-2:206a-31: bde ba chen po rab sgrub pa //
T02D2512-2:206a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlab pa gsung pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:206a-34: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang gi tshul
T02D2512-2:206a-35: 'dis ni dum bu gnyis pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyud dang
T02D2512-2:206a-36: / rgyud phyi ma 'khrul pa med pa'i rna ba'i
T02D2512-2:206a-37: shes pa mchog ste phul du byung ba nyan par
T02D2512-2:206a-38: / 'gyur ba'am / rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
T02D2512-2:206a-39: rang bzhin gyi tshul 'di glegs bam la bris te
T02D2512-2:206a-40: sems can gang dag gi khyim na gnas par gyur
T02D2512-2:206b-0: pa de rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du @206b
T02D2512-2:206b-1: bshad pa'i phan yon can gyi mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D2512-2:206b-2: dngos grub tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur te
T02D2512-2:206b-3: / 'gyur ba'am / / ji ltar bya ba'i rgyud
T02D2512-2:206b-4: la sogs pa'i sgrub pa po'i gdul bya rnams la
T02D2512-2:206b-5: sdig pa yongs su zas par bya ba'i phyir de
T02D2512-2:206b-6: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thog mar spyod pa la
T02D2512-2:206b-7: sogs pa'i tshul mdzad pa de bzhin du 'dir ni
T02D2512-2:206b-9: pa'i stobs kho nas sdig pa yongs su zad pa'i
T02D2512-2:206b-11: ro // rgyu 'di nyid kyis phyir phyi rol gyi
T02D2512-2:206b-12: bgegs rnams 'byung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:206b-14: bgegs med de bzhin bdud kyang med //
T02D2512-2:206b-15: rtog par zhes bya ba la mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D2512-2:206b-16: ye shes bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis bdud bzhi mi dmigs
T02D2512-2:206b-17: pa'i phyir rtog pa 'dir dngos grub thams cad 'phel
T02D2512-2:206b-18: ba kho nar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D2512-2:206b-19: ji lta ba bzhin du bris pa'i dkyil 'khor byas
T02D2512-2:206b-20: pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdud chen
T02D2512-2:206b-21: po'i gzugs dmigs pa'i nus pas bdud nyid du bdag
T02D2512-2:206b-22: 'gyur ba de bzhin du 'dir ni ma yin no
T02D2512-2:206b-23: // bstan pa med pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-2:206b-25: ji lta ba bzhin bris pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ji
T02D2512-2:206b-26: ltar bshad pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par mchod nas
T02D2512-2:206b-27: gshegs su gsol ba la slob dpon gyis sprul pa
T02D2512-2:206b-28: rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D2512-2:206b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i
T02D2512-2:206b-30: rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la
T02D2512-2:206b-31: / byin gyis brlab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas /
T02D2512-2:206b-32: rdo rje bsrung ba dang rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2512-2:206b-33: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:206b-34: rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas na yang rdo
T02D2512-2:206b-35: rje sems dpa' yang nas yang du yongs su bzlas
T02D2512-2:206b-36: te / yi ge brgya ba lan gsum brjod nas langs te /
T02D2512-2:206b-37: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2512-2:206b-38: dge ba'i bya bas gnas par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:206b-39: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-2:206b-40: bde ba chen po ni 'dir mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te de nyid rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-2:206b-41: de'i gsang ba ni de dang rgyu mthun pa'i dum bu gnyis pa la rtsa ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D2512-2:207a-1: rang bzhin can gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02D2512-2:207a-2: dang po zhes bya ba ni bskal ba bzang po las snga nas gnas pa'o //
T02D2512-2:207a-3: mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab
T02D2512-2:207a-4: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu la ltos
T02D2512-2:207a-5: na mchog gi bsgrub bya dang /
T02D2512-2:207a-6: sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2512-2:207a-7: mchog tu grub pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:207a-8: yongs su rdzogs pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2512-2:207a-9: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2512-2:207a-10: mtshan nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi
T02D2512-2:207a-11: rang bzhin bstan pa'i ngo bo dang /
T02D2512-2:207a-12: rnam par smin pa'i sku dang /
T02D2512-2:207a-13: mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /
T02D2512-2:207a-14: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-2:207a-15: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:207a-16: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa /
T02D2512-2:207a-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba
T02D2512-2:207a-18: zhes bya ba las dum bu gnyis pa rtsa ba'i
T02D2512-2:207a-19: rgyud dang / rgyud phyi ma'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:207a-21: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta mkhas pa chen po mantra ka la sha dang /
T02D2512-2:207a-22: sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts'a ba chen po bod kyi
T02D2512-2:207a-23: dpal lha btsan po lha bla ma dge slong zhi
T02D2512-2:207a-24: ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te
T02D2512-2:207a-27: // / de ltar dum bu gnyis pa rtsa rta ba'i rgyud dang /
T02D2512-2:207a-29: da ni dum bu gnyis pa nyid kyi rtog pa
T02D2512-2:207a-30: thams cad kyi phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin sgrub
T02D2512-2:207a-31: pa po'i rang bzhin myur du grub pa bshad pa
T02D2512-2:207a-32: ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2512-2:207a-33: pa yin te / de nas dang po gnas nyams dgar //
T02D2512-2:207a-34: bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs //
T02D2512-2:207a-36: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa
T02D2512-2:207a-37: ston pa'i tshig yin te dum bu dang po dang
T02D2512-2:207a-38: gnyis pa las gsungs pa'i don gyi bsgrub pa'i khyad
T02D2512-2:207a-39: par gyis dngos grub myur du sgrub par bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:207a-40: 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs la /
T02D2512-2:207a-41: sngar gsungs pa'i sgrub pa des /
T02D2512-2:207a-42: gal te bdag cag ma grub par gyur na /
T02D2512-2:207a-43: yang don de nyid sgrub par bya'i /
T02D2512-2:207a-44: srog la thug kyang dor bar mi bya'o zhes mngon
T02D2512-2:207a-45: par 'dod pa skyes pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi bsam
T02D2512-2:207a-46: pa mkhyen pa'i rjes thogs nyid la /
T02D2512-2:207a-47: dang por zhes bya ba ni bskal pa bzang po
T02D2512-2:207b-0: la sogs pa'i thog mar @207b gnas pa'i phyir dang
T02D2512-2:207b-1: por ro // gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas
T02D2512-2:207b-2: khang thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas na gnas te
T02D2512-2:207b-3: por ro // / dang po yang yin la gnas kyang yin pas na dang po'i gnas so //
T02D2512-2:207b-4: khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
T02D2512-2:207b-5: nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:207b-6: shin tu sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje
T02D2512-2:207b-7: sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pas yid dang
T02D2512-2:207b-8: rjes su mthun pa yin pas na yid du 'ong
T02D2512-2:207b-9: ba yin pa'i phyir nyams dga' ba'o //
T02D2512-2:207b-10: rnam mkha' yang yin la kun kyang yin pas na nam mkha' kun te /
T02D2512-2:207b-11: phyogs bcu na rdzas dang bral ba'i rang bzhin rnams so//
T02D2512-2:207b-12: de na zla ba lta bur rab tu snang bas
T02D2512-2:207b-13: na gdul bya thams cad kyi rgyud la so sor
T02D2512-2:207b-14: snad bar gyur pa de ni /
T02D2512-2:207b-15: nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
T02D2512-2:207b-17: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2512-2:207b-18: rtse lnga pas rtse mo mtshan pa'i yid bzhin gyi
T02D2512-2:207b-20: de rnams kyi 'od ni 'od zer rnams te de
T02D2512-2:207b-21: rnams kyis 'di gsal zhing snang bar byas pas na
T02D2512-2:207b-22: rdo rje rin chen 'od 'bar gsal zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:207b-23: brgyan cing zhes bya ba ni dar dang /
T02D2512-2:207b-29: rta ba bas rnam ba sna tshogs dang /
T02D2512-2:207b-31: mda' yab kyi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan cing spungs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:207b-32: dri med pa dang sa ldan zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:207b-33: rang gi 'od dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang
T02D2512-2:207b-34: mnyam pas snang bar byas na dri med mdangs ldan
T02D2512-2:207b-35: pa'o // de ni rdo rje rin po che'i 'od
T02D2512-2:207b-36: kyis gsal bar byas pa yang yin la brgyan pa
T02D2512-2:207b-37: yang yin zhing dri ma med ba'i mdangs dang ldan
T02D2512-2:207b-39: rdo rje rin chen 'od kyis gsal //
T02D2512-2:207b-40: brgyan cing dri med mdangs ldan pa'o //
T02D2512-2:207b-42: brgyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa'i gnas der ro //
T02D2512-2:207b-43: zur bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:207b-44: rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod //
T02D2512-2:207b-45: ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzungs
T02D2512-2:207b-46: kyi lha mo'i tshogs ni rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs
T02D2512-2:207b-47: te de rnams kha khyer la gnas pa rnams ni
T02D2512-2:207b-48: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod cing bsnyen
T02D2512-2:207b-49: bkur byed pa'o // grva yi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02D2512-2:208a-2: zla ba phyed la gnas pa yis //
T02D2512-2:208a-3: rdo rje rin chen yang dag 'bar //
T02D2512-2:208a-4: zhes bya ba ni gnas 'di dag tu zla ba
T02D2512-2:208a-5: kham pa la gnas ba'i rdo rje rin po che
T02D2512-2:208a-7: rlung gis bteg pa ni zhes bya ba ni bteg pa'o //
T02D2512-2:208a-8: sna tshogs ba ni kha dog tha dad pa ste /
T02D2512-2:208a-13: dkar po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:208a-15: rtser zhes bya ba smos te rtse ni mthar te thams cad kyi 'og gi char ro //
T02D2512-2:208a-16: gang gi mthar zhes na ba dan zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2512-2:208a-17: de lta bu'i ba dan de'i rtse mor ro //
T02D2512-2:208a-18: dril bu btags pa sgra sgrogs pa yin pas na /
T02D2512-2:208a-19: rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D2512-2:208a-20: ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs //
T02D2512-2:208a-22: dra ba ni mu tig gi chun 'phyang mchog dbus su btags pa'o //
T02D2512-2:208a-23: me long ni me long gi dkyil 'khor nyid do //
T02D2512-2:208a-24: me tog rtag ces bya ba ni me tog gi
T02D2512-2:208a-25: shing rtag tu me tog thams cad kyi char 'bebs
T02D2512-2:208a-26: pa'i tshul gyis rtag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2512-2:208a-27: me tog gi phreng ba ni me tog gi chun 'phyang ngo //
T02D2512-2:208a-28: rgyan gyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad
T02D2512-2:208a-29: pa las gzhan pa dag yin par shes par bya
T02D2512-2:208a-30: ste / dra ba la sogs pa de rnams kyis
T02D2512-2:208a-31: bskor ba ni kun nas bskor te mdzes par byas
T02D2512-2:208a-32: ste / pa'o // bde ba chen po ni thar pa chen po ste /
T02D2512-2:208a-33: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba bcom ldan 'das

T02D2512-2:211a-26: // des 'dul ba'i sems can nyan thos dang rang
T02D2512-2:211a-27: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu 'jog cing
T02D2512-2:211a-29: de lta bus 'dul ba'i 'jig rten gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2512-2:211a-30: chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur //
T02D2512-2:211a-31: zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul
T02D2512-2:211a-32: ba'i 'jig rten ni ji skad du bshad pa'i nyan
T02D2512-2:211a-33: thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bsgoms pa'i
T02D2512-2:211a-34: sems nyid kyis dag par 'gyur zhing nyan thos dang
T02D2512-2:211a-35: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du byed par
T02D2512-2:211a-36: 'gyur ro // 'dir zhes bya ba ni bla na
T02D2512-2:211b-0: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @211b chub
T02D2512-2:211b-1: don du gnyer ba'i 'jig rten rdo rje theg pa
T02D2512-2:211b-2: 'gyur ro // 'di la'o // 'dod chags chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2512-2:211b-3: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:211b-4: bde ba chen po zhes bya ba ni bla na
T02D2512-2:211b-5: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
T02D2512-2:211b-6: ngo bor thar pa chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:211b-7: ji ltar zhes bya ba ni thabs gang gis na zhes rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D2512-2:211b-8: 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du byed cing rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:211b-9: de yi tshig de gsan pa dang //
T02D2512-2:211b-10: zhes bya ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig
T02D2512-2:211b-11: 'jig rten chags bral zhes bya ba nas 'grub par
T02D2512-2:211b-12: 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gsan pa dang /
T02D2512-2:211b-13: rgyal ba rang nyid kyis tshig 'di skad gsungs shing bka' stsal to //
T02D2512-2:211b-14: tshig ji lta bu gsungs she na /
T02D2512-2:211b-15: khyod ni thabs chen nyid yin te //
T02D2512-2:211b-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2512-2:211b-18: chub thob par bya ba la khyed nyid thabs chen
T02D2512-2:211b-19: po yin no zhes bya ba ste nyid ces bya
T02D2512-2:211b-20: ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don to //
T02D2512-2:211b-21: byang chub sems dpa' ste thog ma'i lha zhes bya
T02D2512-2:211b-22: ba ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi sems
T02D2512-2:211b-23: ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D2512-2:211b-24: de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i lhag pa'i lha
T02D2512-2:211b-25: yin pas na byang chub sems te thog ma'i lha
T02D2512-2:211b-26: zhes bya ba la lhag pa'i lha nyid yin pas
T02D2512-2:211b-28: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:211b-29: de yang bcom ldan 'das sems ni 'dod chags chen po ste /
T02D2512-2:211b-30: 'di'i lha nyid do zhes 'og nas bshad pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:211b-31: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston te gang gi phyir
T02D2512-2:211b-32: khyed ni gdul bya rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems
T02D2512-2:211b-33: lhag pa'i lha nyid yin la de bas na khyod
T02D2512-2:211b-35: bde ba chen po dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir rgyur gyur pa yin gyi gzhan pas na /
T02D2512-2:211b-36: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2512-2:211b-38: zhes rtog pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:211b-39: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02D2512-2:211b-40: zhes bya ba sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:211b-41: ji srid sems ni rnam rtog pa //
T02D2512-2:211b-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
T02D2512-2:212a-2: ces bya bas sems can gcig gi ched du yang
T02D2512-2:212a-3: phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med par gnas par mdzad
T02D2512-2:212a-4: pas ji srid smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'phangs pa'i
T02D2512-2:212a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2512-2:212a-6: chub kyi sems yod par gyur pa de ji srid
T02D2512-2:212a-7: kyi bar du 'khor ba chen por mi gnas pa'i
T02D2512-2:212a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sangs
T02D2512-2:212a-9: rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:212a-10: byang chub sems can la phan phyir //
T02D2512-2:212a-11: rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis //
T02D2512-2:212a-12: zhes bya ba la byang chub ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D2512-2:212a-13: sems can skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs
T02D2512-2:212a-14: rgyas nyid du sgrub pa ni phan pa'i phyir zhes
T02D2512-2:212a-15: bya ba de'i don du kye rdo rje can rdo
T02D2512-2:212a-16: rje 'chang ba ci bde bar gyis shig ces de
T02D2512-2:212a-17: skad rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:212a-18: 'di skad ston pa yin te thabs dang shes rab
T02D2512-2:212a-19: kyis 'dul ba'i gdul bya rnams kyi phyir khyed kyi
T02D2512-2:212a-22: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin can gyi stobs kyis gdul bya
T02D2512-2:212a-23: gang zhig gis bsgrubs shing mngon sum du byas pas
T02D2512-2:212a-24: sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur pa de ltar gyis
T02D2512-2:212a-25: shig pa'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:212a-26: pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo
T02D2512-2:212a-27: rje sems dpa' la de skad ces gsungs pa dang
T02D2512-2:212a-28: shig pa'o // / rang gi lha mo'i dkyil 'khor bskal pa bzang po'i thog ma ste /
T02D2512-2:212a-29: sngon du gnas pas dang por gyur pa thog ma
T02D2512-2:212a-30: zhes pa sngar sems can thams cad gzhug bar bya
T02D2512-2:212a-31: ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs shing brtan par
T02D2512-2:212a-32: mdzad nas / rdo rje kun gyis zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:212a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2512-2:212a-34: sems dang sems las byung ba de rnams kyi dam
T02D2512-2:212a-35: tshig gi mchog ni de'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor te
T02D2512-2:212a-37: / ji bzhin cho gas sgrub pa nyid //
T02D2512-2:212a-38: ces bya ba ni ji ltar bris ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:212a-39: du 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'byung bar
T02D2512-2:212a-40: 'gyur ba de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:212a-41: du ring por ma lon par ni de'i snod du
T02D2512-2:212a-42: gyur pa rnams la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
T02D2512-2:212b-0: dpas @212b 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga mdzad
T02D2512-2:212b-1: la / cho ga des sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo
T02D2512-2:212b-2: rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub nyid sgrub pa yin no
T02D2512-2:212b-4: bde ba chen por rab grub phyir //
T02D2512-2:212b-5: 'dod chags chen po dag phyir dang //
T02D2512-2:212b-6: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:212b-7: ji bzhin cho gas sgrub pa nyid ;
T02D2512-2:212b-8: / ces bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:212b-9: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:212b-10: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pas bzlas brjod dang /
T02D2512-2:212b-11: bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:212b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:212b-13: pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa
T02D2512-2:212b-14: dang slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-2:212b-15: rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:212b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:212b-17: ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas sems can
T02D2512-2:212b-18: thams cad dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas sangs rgyas nyid
T02D2512-2:212b-19: dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid grub cing bskyed par gyur nas /
T02D2512-2:212b-20: de'i rjes thogs nyid la sngar //
T02D2512-2:212b-22: zhes dngos grub 'dri bar mdzad pa gang yin pa'i
T02D2512-2:212b-23: bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-2:212b-25: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor bris
T02D2512-2:212b-26: nas sems can rnams ji skad du grub par bya
T02D2512-2:212b-27: ba'i phyir / gsol ba btab pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:212b-28: ji ltar gsol ba btab ce na /
T02D2512-2:212b-29: bcom ldan 'das khyed la gsol ba ni //
T02D2512-2:212b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:212b-31: snying po rtog pa dam pa 'di //
T02D2512-2:212b-32: zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i snying po dang bcas
T02D2512-2:212b-33: pa'i yi ge h'um gi rtog pa dam pa ste
T02D2512-2:212b-34: / mchog tu gyur pa bshad du gsol //
T02D2512-2:212b-36: las ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2512-2:212b-37: bde chen myur du grub byed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:212b-39: thar pa chen po myur ba nyid du sgrub par byed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:212b-40: de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas //
T02D2512-2:212b-41: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsan nas /
T02D2512-2:212b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po //
T02D2512-2:213a-1: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po na
T02D2512-2:213a-2: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de bka' stsal
T02D2512-2:213a-4: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig go //
T02D2512-2:213a-5: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste gang
T02D2512-2:213a-6: gi phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med par gdul
T02D2512-2:213a-7: bya skal ba dang ldan pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid
T02D2512-2:213a-8: dam / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid bstan pa'i snod du mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:213a-9: de bas na de rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2512-2:213a-10: sems dpa' bstan pa'i snod du gyur pa rnams la
T02D2512-2:213a-11: / sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bstan
T02D2512-2:213a-12: cing skal ba dang ldan pa nyid du sa bon
T02D2512-2:213a-13: bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-2:213a-14: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste /
T02D2512-2:213a-15: mchog tu gyur pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2512-2:213a-16: ming ji skad ces bya zhe na /
T02D2512-2:213a-17: bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog / gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2512-2:213a-19: bshad do zhes bya ba ni bstan pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2512-2:213a-20: dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-2:213a-22: phyag rgya ni dam tshig gsum mo //
T02D2512-2:213a-23: gang gis 'di dag thob pa ni dam tshig gsum thob pa'o //
T02D2512-2:213a-24: slob dpon du rab tu gyur pa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:213a-25: ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang
T02D2512-2:213a-26: bskur bar gyur pa ni slob dpon du rab tu
T02D2512-2:213a-28: rang gi phyag rgya ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-2:213a-29: phyag rgya chen po ste rang gi phyag rgya des
T02D2512-2:213a-30: 'khor lo'i cho ga thams cad bya'o //
T02D2512-2:213a-32: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //
T02D2512-2:213a-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:213a-35: gyi las la rdo rje dang dril bu rtag tu
T02D2512-2:213a-36: 'chang bas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi las rnams rtag
T02D2512-2:213a-37: tu bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:213a-38: ci'i phyir rdo rje dang dril bu bcang bar bya zhe na gang gi phyir /
T02D2512-2:213a-39: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku dang gsung
T02D2512-2:213a-40: dang thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo'i rtog pa thams cad
T02D2512-2:213a-41: ni rdo rje dang dril bu 'chang ba'i stobs kyis
T02D2512-2:213a-42: dkyil 'khor du yang dag par 'jug cing rab tu
T02D2512-2:213b-0: de bas @213b na dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab
T02D2512-2:213b-1: tu 'jug cing 'bebs par byed pa'i rdo rje dril
T02D2512-2:213b-2: bu la ni dam tshig gsum zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:213b-3: rdo rje thams cad yang dag par 'bebs pas de ni sngags grub pa'i phyag rgya yin no //
T02D2512-2:213b-4: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pas des na phyag
T02D2512-2:213b-5: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad
T02D2512-2:213b-6: sgrub pa ni rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya'o
T02D2512-2:213b-7: // rdo rje dang dril bu bsgrags pa des //
T02D2512-2:213b-9: cho ga lhag gam mtshang yang //
T02D2512-2:213b-13: gal te bag med pas cho ga lhag pa'am mtshang
T02D2512-2:213b-14: bar gyur na 'di la dril bu'i sgras bskang bar
T02D2512-2:213b-15: byas te des nyes pa gnyis dang ldan par gyur
T02D2512-2:213b-16: pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod
T02D2512-2:213b-17: pa'i dngos grub nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:213b-18: de ni nyes pa gnyis po des smad par bya ba ma yin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:213b-19: yang dkyil 'khor ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-2:213b-20: dkyil 'khor gnas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:213b-21: sa spyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba dang /
T02D2512-2:213b-22: byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga gsang ba mthon po las gsungs pa'i sbyor bas sam /
T02D2512-2:213b-23: gsang ba'i rgyud las bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:213b-24: bri bar bya ba'i phyir gnas spyang ba legs par
T02D2512-2:213b-25: byas la dkyil 'khor gyis de'i dbus su der rig
T02D2512-2:213b-26: pa'i brtul zhugs sngon du spyad pa'i slob dpon gyis
T02D2512-2:213b-27: dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni cho
T02D2512-2:213b-28: ga bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
T02D2512-2:213b-29: de ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-2:213b-30: dngos grub byin brlab cho ga yis //
T02D2512-2:213b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho
T02D2512-2:213b-33: ga ni dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o
T02D2512-2:213b-34: // dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub kyi rjes thogs nyid
T02D2512-2:213b-35: la 'og nas ston pa'i glu dang rol mo'i mchod
T02D2512-2:213b-36: pa'i cho gas bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:213b-37: de la dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni lha mo'i dkyil 'khor te bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:213b-38: da ni dngos grub byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:214a-1: bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa yin te de la rdo rje glu la sogs pa ni glu'o //
T02D2512-2:214a-2: rdo rje rol mo la sogs pa ni rol mo'o /
T02D2512-2:214a-3: de bdag nyid kyis mchod pa ni mchod pa yin pas glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa'o //
T02D2512-2:214a-4: me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis ;
T02D2512-2:214a-5: / zhes bya ba ni mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2512-2:214a-9: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2512-2:214a-13: me tog gi shing la sogs pa ni /
T02D2512-2:214a-14: spos la sogs pa mchod pa yis //
T02D2512-2:214a-16: / mchog dang po ni brtag par bya //
T02D2512-2:214a-17: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo'i
T02D2512-2:214a-18: dkyil 'khor kha dog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid bsam
T02D2512-2:214a-19: par bya ba'i tshul can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2512-2:214a-20: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:214a-21: ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni phyi'i yo byad ji snyed pas so //
T02D2512-2:214a-22: ci 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni tshad ci 'dod pa'o //
T02D2512-2:214a-23: ci'i phyir tshad ci 'dod par brtag par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-2:214a-24: mchog dang po zhes bya ba smos te gang gi
T02D2512-2:214a-25: phyir 'di ni mchog dang po yin zhing chos kyi
T02D2512-2:214a-26: dbyings kyi rgyu mthun pa las 'byung ba yin pas
T02D2512-2:214a-27: na thog ma med cing tha ma dang dbus kyi
T02D2512-2:214a-28: cha yang med pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha
T02D2512-2:214a-29: tshig go // rtsa mo zhes bya ba ni mtha'i cha'o //
T02D2512-2:214a-30: gang la mtha' yod pa ma yin pa de ni mtha' yas mchog ste /
T02D2512-2:214a-32: bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni 'di'i gong na gzhan med pas bla na med pa'o //
T02D2512-2:214a-33: rgyu 'di nyid kyis na 'di la 'dra ba'i dpe gzhan med pas na dpe med pa'o //
T02D2512-2:214a-34: nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas //
T02D2512-2:214a-35: zhes bya ba ni zla ba ltar thams cad du snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:214a-36: grong khyer zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-2:214a-37: de ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu bzhugs pas na mi 'gyur mchog ces bya ste /
T02D2512-2:214a-38: rtag pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:214a-39: ji ltar na mi 'gyur ba'i mchog pa yin zhe na /
T02D2512-2:214a-40: thog ma med mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:214b-0: gang gi phyir @214b 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D2512-2:214b-1: kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:214b-2: pa thams cad byung nas rtag tu 'khor bar bzhugs
T02D2512-2:214b-3: pa'o // yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ma byung na yang zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:214b-4: bzhugs pa ni da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas shing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:214b-6: grong khyer de ni mi 'gyur mchog //
T02D2512-2:214b-8: gal te bzhugs gnas de nam mkha' thams cad la gnas pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:214b-9: ji ltar na so so'i skye bo rnam par rtog
T02D2512-2:214b-10: pa lhan cig ma tshang bas kun du gang ba
T02D2512-2:214b-11: yin zhe na / kun mchog mnyam pa nyid kyis na //
T02D2512-2:214b-13: de bzhin nyid bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:214b-14: tha ma dbus med nam mkha' ni //
T02D2512-2:214b-15: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' gang la mtha' 'am dbus med pa de ni grong khyer 'di'o ;
T02D2512-2:214b-16: / mtha' dang dbus med pa na 'di la dkyil yang med do zhe na /
T02D2512-2:214b-17: 'di yi dbus mar brtags pa na //
T02D2512-2:214b-19: 'di'i dbus mang brtags pas na 'di dbus kyi tha snyad 'jug pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:214b-20: tha ma bzhi'i cha mnyam pa la ltos nas tshad
T02D2512-2:214b-21: du bya ba nyid 'di'i dbus kyi char ji ltar
T02D2512-2:214b-23: de'i phyir phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D2512-2:214b-24: rnam par brtag pa 'di'i dbus nyid ces gsungs te
T02D2512-2:214b-25: / mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin gyis gnas 'di nas
T02D2512-2:214b-26: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ting
T02D2512-2:214b-27: nge 'dzin gyis dbus kyi char slob dpon gyis brtag
T02D2512-2:214b-28: / par bya'o // de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D2512-2:214b-29: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:214b-30: der zhes bya ba bzhugs gnas de'i dbus su slob
T02D2512-2:214b-31: dpon gyis yu bar bcas zhes bya ba sdong bu
T02D2512-2:214b-32: dang bcas pa'i padma chen po bya'o ;
T02D2512-2:214b-33: / de khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2512-2:214b-34: sna tshogs 'dab mas yang dag khebs //
T02D2512-2:214b-40: dkar po'i 'dab ma dang ldan pas kun du khebs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:215a-0: ci'i phyir kha dog sna lngas kun @215a * //
T02D2512-2:215a-1: tu khebs pa yin zhe na /
T02D2512-2:215a-2: thams cad dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:215a-3: gang gi phyir byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:215a-7: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can
T02D2512-2:215a-8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i thams cad dag pa'i gdan
T02D2512-2:215a-9: du gyur pa ni padma de yin la /

T02D2512-2:215a-11: dag pa ston par byed pas na kha dog sna
T02D2512-2:215a-13: de nas thig ni gdab byas te //
T02D2512-2:215a-14: zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i tshul dang /

T02D2512-2:215a-16: gnas par byas nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su
T02D2512-2:215a-17: slob dpon gyis ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas srad
T02D2512-2:215a-18: bu dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur dang de nas thig
T02D2512-2:215a-19: gdab par bya'o // tshad ji tsam zhe na /
T02D2512-2:215a-20: nam mkha' kun gyi tshad kyis ni //
T02D2512-2:215a-21: tshad ni tshad med pa nyid yin //
T02D2512-2:215a-23: gang gi phyir 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin pas de'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:215a-24: 'di la khru la sogs pa'i tshad kyis nges par mi bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:215a-25: da ni mi mnyam med pas zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-2:215a-26: sogs pas 'di'i dbyibs su gsungs pa yin te shar
T02D2512-2:215a-29: byang gi ngos bzhi'i ri mo dang bcas pa'i zur bzhi'o //
T02D2512-2:215a-31: mi mnyam med pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:215a-35: btang snyoms kyi tshul gyis gnod sems la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:215a-36: mi mnyam zhing mi zad pa dang bral bas mi
T02D2512-2:215a-38: de ltar na mi mnyam pa med pas na dkyil 'khor 'di ni zur bzhi pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:215a-39: dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste //
T02D2512-2:215a-40: zhes bya ba 'di la shar dang /
T02D2512-2:215a-43: byang gi sgo bzhi yod pas na sgo bzhi'o //
T02D2512-2:215a-44: dran zhes smos pa ni dad pa dang /
T02D2512-2:215a-48: shes rab kyi dbang po sgo bzhi'i tshul du gyur
T02D2512-2:215a-49: pa 'di las thar pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par
T02D2512-2:215a-50: 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir 'di skad
T02D2512-2:215b-0: bsam @215b gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi //

T02D2512-2:215b-5: ting 'dzin khyams su bshad pa yin //
T02D2512-2:215b-6: zhes bya ba ni gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol
T02D2512-2:215b-7: kun nas yongs su bskor bar kha khyer gyis bskor
T02D2512-2:215b-8: ba de ni khyams zhes bya ste /
T02D2512-2:215b-9: de ni 'di'i ting nge 'dzin no zhes bshad cing bstan to //
T02D2512-2:215b-10: khyams la brten pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D2512-2:215b-13: rnams ni rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyi gzungs rnams
T02D2512-2:215b-14: so // khyams la brten pa la yang yin la /
T02D2512-2:215b-15: rdo rje'i bdag nyid can gyi gzungs rnams kyang yin pas /
T02D2512-2:215b-16: khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje bdag nyid can gyi gzungs rnams zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:215b-19: rgyan rnams kun gyis zhes bya ba ni gos dang
T02D2512-2:215b-20: gdugs la sogs pas bkra ba gang yin pa de
T02D2512-2:215b-21: ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad
T02D2512-2:215b-22: yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no //

T02D2512-2:215b-24: 'dis sems can thams cad rnams 'dul bas na 'dul ba ste /
T02D2512-2:215b-25: sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:215b-26: bskyod ni g-yo bar byas pa'o //
T02D2512-2:215b-27: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:215b-28: dam pa sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i chos yin pas na /
T02D2512-2:215b-29: 'dul bas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog //
T02D2512-2:215b-31: de la mchog kyang yin la /
T02D2512-2:215b-32: de thams cad du 'gro ba yang yin pas na /
T02D2512-2:215b-33: 'dul bas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /
T02D2512-2:215b-34: dam chos mchog ste kun du 'gro //
T02D2512-2:215b-36: yon tan 'di gsal bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:215b-37: ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs //
T02D2512-2:215b-38: zhes bya ba 'di bris pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:215b-39: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
T02D2512-2:216a-1: shes rtag / ces bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:216a-2: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni me tog
T02D2512-2:216a-3: ces bya ba dus thams cad pa'i me tog yin
T02D2512-2:216a-4: no // byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02D2512-2:216a-5: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
T02D2512-2:216a-6: ni me tog gi phreng ba'i mtshan nyid can yin
T02D2512-2:216a-7: no // de dag gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:216a-8: dra ba me long me tog che //
T02D2512-2:216a-9: me tog phreng ba rgyan gyis bskor //
T02D2512-2:216a-10: zhes bya ba 'di bris pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:216a-11: kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni //
T02D2512-2:216a-12: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
T02D2512-2:216a-13: zhes bya ba 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi
T02D2512-2:216a-14: rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba de nyid ni
T02D2512-2:216a-15: bde ba chen po zhes bshad cing bstan pa yin
T02D2512-2:216a-16: no // tshul de ltar bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas dang /
T02D2512-2:216a-17: dang po'i gnas bri par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:216a-18: de ltar thar pa'i grong khyer de legs par bris
T02D2512-2:216a-19: nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa yin pa'i
T02D2512-2:216a-20: phyir phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsam zhing
T02D2512-2:216a-21: mngon du bya'o // de ltar 'di yan chad kyi
T02D2512-2:216a-22: gzhung gis ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ston par gyur pa
T02D2512-2:216a-23: mngon du bya'o // yin no // phyi'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:216a-24: de'i nang du dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo zhes
T02D2512-2:216a-25: bya ba'i thig gdab pa ni nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:216a-26: mngon du bya'o // yin no // yin no // ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2512-2:216a-27: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu ni //
T02D2512-2:216a-29: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i thig gis dkyil 'khor brgyad pa
T02D2512-2:216a-30: ltar byas pa gang yin pa de ni dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:216a-31: brgyad pa lta bu yin zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:216a-32: ci zhig gi rang bzhin yin zhe na /

T02D2512-2:216a-36: rnam par thar pa brgyad ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-2:216a-37: de'i rang bzhin yin pa nyid kyis 'di ni 'jig
T02D2512-2:216a-38: rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba thams
T02D2512-2:216a-39: cad rab tu ster ba yin no //

T02D2512-2:216a-43: mdo sde'i 'khor lo gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la
T02D2512-2:216a-44: bskor zhing skyed par mdzad pas na /
T02D2512-2:216a-45: theg pa chen po byang chub kyi sems mdo sde'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyu des na /
T02D2512-2:216b-0: rdo rje thig gis yongs @216b bskor bar //
T02D2512-2:216b-1: zhes bya ba rdo rje'i phreng bas phyi rol kun

T02D2512-2:216b-5: chen po bris par rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par
T02D2512-2:216b-6: bar bya'o // bya'o // ji ltar zhe na /
T02D2512-2:216b-7: lugs ma 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa snos te /
T02D2512-2:216b-8: gser dngul la sogs pa bzhu nas blugs te sku gzugs su byas pa ni lugs ma'o //
T02D2512-2:216b-9: shel la sogs pa la 'bur du brkos te byas pa ni bskor pa'o //

T02D2512-2:216b-12: 'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la //
T02D2512-2:216b-13: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //

T02D2512-2:216b-19: dmar po'i ri mo sna tshogs shing 'bar ba gang
T02D2512-2:216b-20: yin pa de ni dmar shing kha dog 'bar ba
T02D2512-2:216b-21: zhes bya'o // sangs rgyas kyang yin la thams cad
T02D2512-2:216b-22: kyang yin pas na sangs rgyas thams cad de de

T02D2512-2:216b-29: sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs //
T02D2512-2:216b-30: rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa //

T02D2512-2:216b-33: rdo rje skyil krung phyed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:216b-35: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
T02D2512-2:216b-37: rdo rje snyems pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:216b-39: rdo rje snyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog / ces bya ste /
T02D2512-2:216b-41: su ra ta satvam zhes brjod la zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:216b-42: ni aom su ra ta stvam h'um zhes brjod la

T02D2512-2:217a-3: phyag rgyas 'da' bar mi bya ba'i rang bzhin can

T02D2512-2:217a-5: gsung dang thugs rdo rje bzhugs pa brtag pa ni dgongs pa brtag pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:217a-6: gang gis de rnams dgongs par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:217a-7: rdo rje lha mo la sogs tshogs //

T02D2512-2:217a-12: ba'o // dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur //
T02D2512-2:217a-13: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lha mo la sogs
T02D2512-2:217a-14: pa dgongs shing byin gyis rlob pa de rnams slob
T02D2512-2:217a-15: dpon dang slob ma de ji ltar mngon par 'dod
T02D2512-2:217a-16: pa'i dngos grub rnams grub par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:217a-17: de nas sku mchog la sogs pa //
T02D2512-2:217a-18: mngon bris yang dag bsgrub par bya /

T02D2512-2:217a-23: ci zhig zlos shing bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-2:217a-24: dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su //

T02D2512-2:217a-27: dang po'i rdo rje la sogs pa ni phyag rgya ni dam tshig mchog ste /
T02D2512-2:217a-28: de bcings la dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2512-2:217a-29: zhes bya ba rdo rje tshig gis zlos bzhin pa bsgrub par bya zhing rang dbang du bya'o //
T02D2512-2:217a-30: ci zhig zlos shing bsgrub par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-2:217a-31: ci zhig byas nas yang dag par byas she na /
T02D2512-2:217a-32: re zhig dang por bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems

T02D2512-2:217a-41: ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba nas /

T02D2512-2:217b-0: 'di @217b yis zhes bya ba ni spyan drang ba'i chogs so //

T02D2512-2:217b-10: pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba byas la /
T02D2512-2:217b-11: zhugs nas shin tu brtan pa ste /
T02D2512-2:217b-12: thugs gzhan du mi 'gyur bas dbang du byas nas grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:217b-13: 'od zer kun du ston la sogs //

T02D2512-2:217b-15: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de

T02D2512-2:217b-18: yon gyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la

T02D2512-2:225a-26: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //

T02D2512-2:225a-28: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de

T02D2512-2:225a-32: k'i li k'i li ma dang /

T02D2512-2:225b-7: bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2512-2:225b-8: thams cad kyi sku'i mchog / mtshan nyid 'og nas
T02D2512-2:225b-9: bshad pas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-2:225b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pa
T02D2512-2:225b-11: ni rin po che las byas pa lugs ma'am brkos

T02D2512-2:225b-31: pa ste / rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa des

T02D2512-2:226b-38: dad par gyur pa des kyang ngo //

T02D2512-2:234a-5: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02D2512-2:234a-6: rdo rje sems bdag deng grub mdzod //
T02D2512-2:234a-7: ces bya ba de kho na nyid brjod bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:234a-8: de nas dza:h'um bam ho:bra siddha mam zhes bya ba 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:234a-9: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la g-yon ba'i khro

T02D2512-2:234a-28: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /

T02D2512-2:234a-30: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor bas shis par

T02D2512-2:235a-0: de nas de'i snying gar su ra te sa ma ya stvam hi badzra siddha ya @235a * //
T02D2512-2:235a-1: tha su kham zhes bya ba dang /

T02D2512-2:235a-26: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar sgor bltas pa'o //
T02D2512-2:235a-27: sna tshogs padma la bris la /
T02D2512-2:235a-28: slob ma dpal rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-2:235a-29: phyag rgya chen po padma'i steng du gzhag ste /

T02D2512-2:235a-37: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:235b-0: da ni dam @235b tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02D2512-2:235b-1: slob dpon gyi dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par

T02D2512-2:235b-3: phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:235b-4: de nas zhes bya ba ni 'das ma thag pa ston pa'o //
T02D2512-2:235b-5: de phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste /
T02D2512-2:235b-6: gang gi phyir sgrub pa med par gdul bya rnams
T02D2512-2:235b-7: kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i don grub par mi 'gyur
T02D2512-2:235b-8: bas na rgyu de'i phyir sgrub pa bshad par bya'o
T02D2512-2:235b-9: // sgrub pa de nyid dngos grub kyi rgyu yin pas na sgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:235b-10: sgrub pa de'i dngos grub khyad par ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D2512-2:235b-11: shin tu rtag pa yin zhes gsungs te thog ma

T02D2512-2:235b-19: shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub nyid //

T02D2512-2:235b-26: byang chub sems dpa' ni zhes bya ba sgrub pa

T02D2512-2:235b-30: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug che //
T02D2512-2:235b-31: zhes bya ba rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:235b-32: dngos grub thams cad thob cing rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-2:235b-33: la sogs pa'i dngos grub rdzogs pas na /
T02D2512-2:235b-34: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug che //

T02D2512-2:236a-2: / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

T02D2512-2:236a-4: pa la gnas shid srid pa spangs pa grub cing

T02D2512-2:236a-15: nyid thob par bshad pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2512-2:236a-21: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gang yin pa de

T02D2512-2:236a-26: dam par gyur pa ji ltar 'dis thob par gyur

T02D2512-2:236a-28: 'gyur ro // tshul gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas nyid

T02D2512-2:236a-32: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub bskyed pa'i

T02D2512-2:236b-1: rgyas dang rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa mthong nas

T02D2512-2:236b-3: tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pas
T02D2512-2:236b-4: sems can thams cad kyi don rdzogs par mi 'gyur
T02D2512-2:236b-5: ro // de bas rgyud chen las grub pas //
T02D2512-2:236b-6: zhes bya ba ni bskyed pa'o //

T02D2512-2:240b-26: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rab tu bsgrubs nas /
T02D2512-2:240b-27: chos dang las kyi phyag rgya gnyis kyis rgyas btab la /
T02D2512-2:240b-28: phyag rgya chen po bcings te rang gi lha'i snying po bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:240b-29: de ltar na rnal 'byor pa la rang gi lha'i
T02D2512-2:240b-30: snying po des rang gi sku'i gsang bas byin gyis
T02D2512-2:240b-33: de ltar cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas
T02D2512-2:240b-34: phyag rgya chen pos bdag la byin gyis brlab pa

T02D2512-2:240b-36: po bzla bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di
T02D2512-2:240b-38: de la ji ltar na yi ge h'um gi glu
T02D2512-2:240b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no
T02D2512-2:240b-40: // ro bhi ta sogs phyag rgyar ldan //

T02D2512-2:241a-4: de bas na lce la rdo rje dkar po bsams
T02D2512-2:241a-5: la lte bar h'um la sogs pa rang gi lha'i
T02D2512-2:241a-6: snying po bsams la yang rang gi snying gar gnas

T02D2512-2:241a-25: pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /

T02D2512-2:241a-27: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sku ji
T02D2512-2:241a-28: srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar

T02D2512-2:241a-35: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //

T02D2512-2:241b-4: rang gi lha'i snying po bzla par bya'o //

T02D2512-2:241b-10: las kyi phyag rgya'i gar gyi mchod pa'o //
T02D2512-2:241b-11: gar gyi mchod pa rgyur gyur pas //

T02D2512-2:266a-33: rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par bzung ba ste /

T02D2512-2:272a-41: ces bya ba ni bskor ba lan gsum byas nas
T02D2512-2:272a-42: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mdun du
T02D2512-2:272a-43: 'dug ste / 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2512-2:272a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i de
T02D2512-2:272a-45: kho na nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:272a-46: rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar brjod par bya'o
T02D2512-2:272b-1: sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub phyir //
T02D2512-2:272b-3: sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo //
T02D2512-2:272b-4: de bzhin du phul du byung ba bsgrub pa ni rab grub pa ste /
T02D2512-2:272b-5: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ste shin tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-2:272b-6: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:272b-7: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a na'm a'a dya nutba nan tv'a ta /
T02D2512-2:272b-8: ces bya ba'i snying po dang drul bu dang bcas
T02D2512-2:272b-9: pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu ma dang 'bebs pas dgug
T02D2512-2:272b-10: cing spyan drangs nas myur ba nyid du rnam par
T02D2512-2:272b-11: snang mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
T02D2512-2:272b-13: thams cad ma skyes sbyor ba yis ;
T02D2512-2:272b-14: / zhes bya ba ni thams cad kyis ma skyes pa ni /
T02D2512-2:272b-15: thams cad ma skyes pa ste chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2512-2:272b-16: de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i sems kyi sbyor
T02D2512-2:272b-17: ba des dngos grub kun ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2512-2:272b-18: la sogs pa'i sgrub pa po'i dngos grub thams cad
T02D2512-2:272b-19: stsol zhing ster bar mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:272b-20: ni zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-2:272b-21: gang gi phyir 'dus pa rnams thams cad ma skyes
T02D2512-2:272b-22: pa'i sbyor bas sgrub pa po'i dngos grub thams cad
T02D2512-2:272b-23: rnal 'byor pa la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis stsol
T02D2512-2:272b-24: bar 'gyur ro // zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas so //
T02D2512-2:272b-26: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas phyag
T02D2512-2:272b-27: rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad
T02D2512-2:272b-29: dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog / sna tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D2512-2:272b-30: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas sgrub
T02D2512-2:272b-31: par byed pa ni rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub
T02D2512-2:272b-34: 'od zer mthong ba la sogs pa'i mchan ma'i mchog ste /
T02D2512-2:272b-35: dam pa'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:272b-36: de nas zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2512-2:272b-37: mchog tu slob ma gzhug pa ni dkyil 'khor chen por ro //
T02D2512-2:272b-38: cho ga rgyas pa de bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:272b-39: zhes bya ba ni 'dir slob dpon gyis rdo rje
T02D2512-2:272b-40: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i slob ma
T02D2512-2:272b-41: 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'dir bya
T02D2512-2:273a-2: / mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che //
T02D2512-2:273a-3: mchod pa byas nas slar 'byung bya //
T02D2512-2:273a-4: zhes bya ba ni gang 'di na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:273a-5: pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por mchod pa'i thal mo des
T02D2512-2:273a-6: me tog dang / bdug spos dang /
T02D2512-2:273a-8: dri la sogs pa blangs nas me tog la sogs
T02D2512-2:273a-9: pa der 'khor lo che zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:273a-10: mchod pa byas nas cho ga thams cad rjes su
T02D2512-2:273a-11: spyad la dkyil 'khor chen po de las slar 'byung
T02D2512-2:273a-12: bar bya'o // dngos grub cho ga ji bzhin du //
T02D2512-2:273a-13: sgrub pa rnams ni rab bshad bya //
T02D2512-2:273a-14: zhes bya ba la dngos grub ni bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T02D2512-2:273a-15: cho ga ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni cho ga'i rim pa ma 'chol bar ro //
T02D2512-2:273a-16: sgrub ces bya ba ni 'dis sgrub pas na bsgrub pa ste /
T02D2512-2:273a-18: rab bshad bya zhes bya ba ni de rab tu
T02D2512-2:273a-19: phye ste sgrub pa dang dngos grub bshad par bya'o
T02D2512-2:273a-20: zhes bya ba ste ci yang rung ba'i tshul du
T02D2512-2:273a-21: ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T02D2512-2:273a-22: // de la cho ga ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni sgra'i don ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-2:273a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs la rang gi lha'i sngags dang /
T02D2512-2:273a-24: phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du blangs te /
T02D2512-2:273a-25: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor byas la mdun du rang gi lha spyan drangs pa dang ;
T02D2512-2:273a-27: phyag byas nas de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:273a-28: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2512-2:273a-29: nas ras ris la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2512-2:273a-30: du nye reg lan cig byas la /
T02D2512-2:273a-31: zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas
T02D2512-2:273a-32: la de nas ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis ras
T02D2512-2:273a-33: ris kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul lam dpa' bo gcig
T02D2512-2:273a-35: de'i mdun du bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2512-2:273a-36: ras ris la rang gi lha ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2512-2:273a-37: du spyan drangs nas cho ga thams cad rjes su
T02D2512-2:273a-38: spyad pa'am / rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-2:273a-39: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis yang zla ba gcig gi
T02D2512-2:273a-40: bar du bzlas brjod byas la /
T02D2512-2:273a-41: mthar zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-2:273a-42: de nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:273b-0: bdud la sogs @273b las rnam rgyal brnyes //
T02D2512-2:273b-1: bcom ldan ras la bri bar bya //
T02D2512-2:273b-2: sgrub pa 'di las gcig tsam ni //
T02D2512-2:273b-3: de lta'i bsgrub byas sgrub par 'gyur //
T02D2512-2:273b-4: zhes bya ba 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi ras ris sgrub pa la gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:273b-5: dpa' bo gcig pu'i dbang du byas nas /
T02D2512-2:273b-6: sku gzugs la sogs mdun du yang ;
T02D2512-2:273b-7: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:273b-9: 'dis kyang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:273b-10: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi
T02D2512-2:273b-11: phyag rgya bcings la zla ba gcig tsam bzlas par
T02D2512-2:273b-12: brjod byas nas rang gi lha dpa' bo gcig pu
T02D2512-2:273b-13: ras la sogs pa la gzhug pa mdun du gzhug
T02D2512-2:273b-14: ste cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-2:273b-15: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la slar bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-2:273b-16: de nas zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag
T02D2512-2:273b-17: bzlas brjod byas na de lta bus ni rang gi
T02D2512-2:273b-18: lha'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thog par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:273b-19: ro // rgyud 'di la thams cad du yang ras ris sgrub pa la /
T02D2512-2:273b-20: lce la rdo rje dkar po bsams te bzlas brjod bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:273b-21: gzhung 'dis ni chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa yang bshad par gyur pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:273b-22: gang gi phyir phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:273b-23: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-2:273b-24: las kyi phyag rgya rnams bsgrubs pa'i rjes thogs nyid
T02D2512-2:273b-25: la ston pa yin gyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni
T02D2512-2:273b-26: ma yin no // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2512-2:273b-27: phyag rgya'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni zhes bya
T02D2512-2:273b-28: ba ni de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gnas
T02D2512-2:273b-29: skabs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:273b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:273b-31: pa'i rigs rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po ni de
T02D2512-2:273b-33: de rnams kyi sgrub pa chen po ni rang gi sku'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsgom pa'o //
T02D2512-2:273b-34: de ston par byed pa'i sgra ni tshogs rgyud do //
T02D2512-2:273b-35: phyag rgya gcig bcings nas ni //
T02D2512-2:273b-36: bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin bsams na //
T02D2512-2:273b-37: zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:273b-38: bdag nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes bsgom zhing yang dang yang du mngon du byed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:273b-40: phyag rgya chen po dngos grub che //
T02D2512-2:273b-41: brtan pa ring por mi thogs thob //
T02D2512-2:274a-1: la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rnam
T02D2512-2:274a-2: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni bdag
T02D2512-2:274a-3: nyid yin no zhes bsgoms na /
T02D2512-2:274a-4: rnal 'byor pa rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:274a-5: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bcar du ming cing
T02D2512-2:274a-6: gzhig tu med par brtan pa ring por mi thogs
T02D2512-2:274a-7: shing myur ba nyid du thob pa'o //
T02D2512-2:274a-8: de ltar phyag rgya chen po'i bsgrub pa gsungs nas /
T02D2512-2:274a-9: da ni dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D2512-2:274a-10: de nas dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba yin te /
T02D2512-2:274a-11: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:274a-12: dam tshig thams cad ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:274a-13: de rnams kyis sgrub pa ni rang gi snying gar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-2:274a-15: zhes phyag rgya bcing ba'i snying po zlos shing bcing ba'o //
T02D2512-2:274a-17: snying gar rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag ste /
T02D2512-2:274a-20: bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni /
T02D2512-2:274a-21: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur //
T02D2512-2:274a-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub bar 'dod pa'i sgrub
T02D2512-2:274a-25: pa pos bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs
T02D2512-2:274a-26: pa byas nas / sems dpa'i rdo rje snying gar bsams la /
T02D2512-2:274a-28: zhes brjod la rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:274a-29: de nas zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du phyag rgya bcing ba dang /
T02D2512-2:274a-30: rang gi lha'i sngags bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o //
T02D2512-2:274a-31: de nas yang de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas la
T02D2512-2:274a-32: mthar zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag bzlas
T02D2512-2:274a-33: brjod byas na de lta bus ni dam tshig gi
T02D2512-2:274a-34: phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:274a-35: ro // de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs nas /
T02D2512-2:274a-36: da ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa gsungs pa ni /
T02D2512-2:274a-37: de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni zhes bya ba yin te /
T02D2512-2:274a-38: de nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:274a-39: las kyi phyag rgya yang yin la thams cad kyang
T02D2512-2:274a-40: yin pas na las kyi phyag rgya thams cad do
T02D2512-2:274a-41: // de rnams kyi bsgrub pa ni bdud bcom pa la sogs ba sgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:274a-42: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
T02D2512-2:274a-43: bdud las rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod
T02D2512-2:274b-0: pa'i las kyi @274b phyag rgya bcings la bdud kyi
T02D2512-2:274b-2: mchog rtogs shing zhes bya ba ni mchog ni dam pa ste /
T02D2512-2:274b-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D2512-2:274b-4: de rtogs pa ni mngon par byang chub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:274b-5: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02D2512-2:274b-7: 'od dpag tu med pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas chos ston pa'o //
T02D2512-2:274b-8: mtshungs med sems dang don byas nas //
T02D2512-2:274b-9: zhes bya ba ni don yod par grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:274b-10: log par spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi don bya
T02D2512-2:274b-11: bar yid la bsams par byas na'ang de lta bus
T02D2512-2:274b-13: las kyi phyag rgya grub par 'gyur //
T02D2512-2:274b-16: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2512-2:274b-17: nas yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna
T02D2512-2:274b-20: zhes zlos shing mi bskyod pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la bdud rab tu gzhom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:274b-21: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi las kyi phyag
T02D2512-2:274b-22: rgya bcings la aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing mngon
T02D2512-2:274b-23: par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas bdag nyid mngon
T02D2512-2:274b-24: par sangs rgyas par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:274b-25: badzra ratna zhes zlos shing rin po che'i rigs kyi
T02D2512-2:274b-26: rang bzhin can gyis byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu
T02D2512-2:274b-27: chen pos bdag nyid la dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-2:274b-28: badzra dharm'a zhes zlos shing 'od dpag tu med pa'i
T02D2512-2:274b-29: las kyi phyag rgya bcings la chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D2512-2:274b-30: bskor bar bya'o // de nas badzra karma zhes zlos
T02D2512-2:274b-31: shing don yod par grub pa'i las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:274b-32: bskor bar bya'o // bcings la / sems can log par spyod pa dang /
T02D2512-2:274b-33: yongs su dga' ba rnams dbang du bsdus shing do
T02D2512-2:274b-34: byas nas bdag nyid bya ba byas pa lta bur
T02D2512-2:274b-35: bsams la / rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:274b-36: snga ma bzhin du zla ba gcig bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o //
T02D2512-2:274b-37: de'i rjes la zla ba gnyis pa la yang mthar
T02D2512-2:274b-38: zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas
T02D2512-2:274b-39: te / de lta bus ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi dngos grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:274b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mchog ni las kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa sgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:274b-41: de'i cho ga ni bya ba rnams so //
T02D2512-2:275a-0: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni chos @275a * //
T02D2512-2:275a-1: kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa sgrub pa'i rgyun no //
T02D2512-2:275a-2: de ston par byed pa sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
T02D2512-2:275a-3: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:275a-5: // / yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:275a-7: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas la bsang gtor
T02D2512-2:275a-8: bya ba'i phyir spos chab kyis bkang ba'i snod la
T02D2512-2:275a-9: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
T02D2512-2:275a-10: lha'i khang pa'i sgor bzhag la /
T02D2512-2:275a-11: mchod yon dang mchod pa rnam pa lnga la ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par bzla'o //
T02D2512-2:275a-12: mchod chen thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02D2512-2:275a-13: bdag la byin rlabs la sogs bsgrub //
T02D2512-2:275a-14: rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chad zhing //
T02D2512-2:275a-15: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D2512-2:275a-16: lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa'am /
T02D2512-2:275a-17: byas pa'am ni bris pa yi //
T02D2512-2:275a-18: dang po'i 'khor lo bzhag nas ni //
T02D2512-2:275a-19: des ni slar yang rab tu 'grub //
T02D2512-2:275a-20: yi ge h'um ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:275a-21: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:275a-22: sprul par bya'o // de nas gal te 'bor pa
T02D2512-2:275a-23: yod na me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod
T02D2512-2:275a-24: sprul par bya'o // la / aom sarba ta th'a
T02D2512-2:275a-25: ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta pra na me
T02D2512-2:275a-26: na badzra bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02D2512-2:275a-27: zhes zlos shing phyogs thams cad nas dkyil 'khor lnga
T02D2512-2:275a-28: pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang
T02D2512-2:275a-29: bcas pa la phyag bzhi byas nas cho ga thams
T02D2512-2:275a-32: de nas rdo rje thal mo dang /
T02D2512-2:275a-33: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas rdo rje bsdams pa rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:275a-34: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa bskyed la /
T02D2512-2:275a-35: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing
T02D2512-2:275a-36: rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:275a-37: dgrol bas dbab pa brtan par byas la rdo rje
T02D2512-2:275a-38: khu tshur gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2512-2:275a-39: / aom badzra mushta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:275a-40: de nas phyag rgya dgrol bar byas la sdig pa
T02D2512-2:275a-41: dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa rnam par dral bar
T02D2512-2:275a-42: bya'o // de nas rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas
T02D2512-2:275a-43: la skyil mo krung gi steng du rdo rje bsdams
T02D2512-2:275a-45: snying gar sems ma rdo rje bkod de /
T02D2512-2:275a-46: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs
T02D2512-2:275b-0: @275b pa'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pa
T02D2512-2:275b-1: bsgom par bya'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
