T02D2512-2:281b-3: sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par
T02D2512-2:281b-4: mchod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
T02D2512-2:281b-6: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po lnga yin te /
T02D2512-2:281b-7: rtag dang mi bskyod rin chen mchog /'jig rten dbang dang don yod grub //
T02D2512-2:281b-8: de bzhin gshegs kun nyid yin pas //
T02D2512-2:281b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bshad //
T02D2512-2:281b-10: de la rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni /
T02D2512-2:281b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod pa //
T02D2512-2:281b-12: rin chen 'byung ldan rin chen dbang //
T02D2512-2:281b-13: 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos //
T02D2512-2:281b-14: rdo rje las ni rab grub yin //
T02D2512-2:281b-15: de nas de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02D2512-2:281b-16: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:281b-17: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2512-2:281b-18: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02D2512-2:281b-19: zhes bya ba bslab par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:281b-20: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi glu'i mchod pa blangs
T02D2512-2:281b-21: nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhis mna' bsgags la
T02D2512-2:281b-22: bslab par bya'o // chog rgyas pa ni sngar bshad pa las shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:281b-23: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:281b-25: // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2512-2:281b-26: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho
T02D2512-2:281b-27: ga bstan nas dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob
T02D2512-2:281b-28: pa rnams la slob dpon gyis sgrub pa'i ye shes
T02D2512-2:281b-29: bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga 'di bstan
T02D2512-2:281b-31: de nas ma grub dngos grub mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:281b-32: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2512-2:281b-36: las kyi phyag rgya zla ba gnyis kyis bsgrub sa
T02D2512-2:281b-37: pa na gang gi tshe grub par ma gyur pa
T02D2512-2:281b-39: grub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:281b-40: grub pa med pas na ma grub pa ste /
T02D2512-2:281b-41: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ma grub pa ni dngos grub mchog go //
T02D2512-2:281b-42: las rnams ni 'dod chags ba la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi'o //
T02D2512-2:281b-44: de ni ma grub dngos grub mchog / las rnams kyi ni rgyun zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:281b-45: de nyid ni las gzhan las dam par gyur pas na mchog go //
T02D2512-2:282a-1: sel zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa nyes par spyod pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-2: sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni dbye ba rnam
T02D2512-2:282a-3: pa brgyas dngos grub thams cad grub par byed pa'o
T02D2512-2:282a-4: // go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin te /
T02D2512-2:282a-5: ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga'i rim gyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:282a-6: rab bshad ces bya ba de ltar gyur pa de rab tu bshad cing bstan bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-7: khyed 'chad par byed pa gang zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2512-2:282a-8: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:282a-9: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
T02D2512-2:282a-10: nad kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na nad thams cad de skya rbab la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-11: mya ngan zhes bya ba ni sdug pa dang bral
T02D2512-2:282a-12: ba las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba'i rgyun no
T02D2512-2:282a-13: // gnod pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i don grub pa ma rnyed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal lo //
T02D2512-2:282a-14: gnod byed ni gcong chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-16: mi rgyu ba'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2512-2:282a-17: sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ba'i las byung ba'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2512-2:282a-18: gshed byed ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-2:282a-19: lha dgug pa dag sngags kyi stobs kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-20: g-yeng byed ni phur bu'i phyag rgya'am /
T02D2512-2:282a-21: ming rus la sogs pa phyi'i phur bus lha la sogs pas phur bu btab pa'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-22: ro langs ni 'dir gzhan dag la gnod par bya
T02D2512-2:282a-23: ba'i phyir shi ba'i rol srin po gdug pa bcug
T02D2512-2:282a-24: pa'o // sngags ni sgrub pa po'i don la gegs byed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-25: sman ni 'dod pa'i don la gegs byed pas gzung ngo //
T02D2512-2:282a-26: bgegs ni sgrub pa po'i 'dod chags pa nang gi bgegs dang /
T02D2512-2:282a-27: dngos grub gyi bar du gcod pa'i phyir bgegs rnams so //
T02D2512-2:282a-28: log 'dren ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:282a-29: sdig pa ni sgrub pa po la za bar brtson pa'i srin po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-31: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282a-32: rims ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:282a-33: gdon ni sems can gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i lha'i
T02D2512-2:282a-34: gdon la sogs pa rig pa mchog pas gsungs pa
T02D2512-2:282a-35: bco brgyad do // mkha' 'gro ma ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-36: nye bar 'tshe ba ni khyim du srin po la sogs pa snang ba'o //
T02D2512-2:282a-37: des nye bar bcom pa ni nye bar 'tshe ba'o //
T02D2512-2:282b-0: glo bur ba ni 'go @282b ba'i nad do //
T02D2512-2:282b-1: nyes pa ni khang pa la sogs par nyes ba glo bur du byung ba'o //
T02D2512-2:282b-2: nyon mongs pa ni lus kyi sdug bsngal lo //
T02D2512-2:282b-3: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:282b-4: 'di rnams 'jig pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:282b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:282b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis nad btsir ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-10: khu tshur gyis bsal ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-11: kha zas dang khro bas phur bu dbyung ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-13: aom bris nas phyi ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-15: h'um dang bcas pas bsnun pa dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-17: tshon bris nas phyir byung ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-19: d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-22: skra nas bzung ste sbrug pa dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-23: kha tv'am ga steng du bzung ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-24: rang gi khyim du gzhag pa dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2512-2:282b-32: g-yas pa kun du bsgreng ba ni /
T02D2512-2:282b-33: g-yon pa'i rdo rje sor mos gzung ;
T02D2512-2:282b-34: / byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'di //
T02D2512-2:282b-35: sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin byed //
T02D2512-2:282b-36: ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur ro //
T02D2512-2:282b-37: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bskyed de /
T02D2512-2:282b-38: 'di bcings nas aom bhu kham zhes zlos shing des
T02D2512-2:282b-39: nad btsir la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2512-2:282b-40: kyis nad pa'i spyi bo nas brtsams te rkang mthil
T02D2512-2:282b-41: gyi bar du yongs su bkang bar bsam par bya
T02D2512-2:282b-42: ste / de lta bus ni nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:282b-43: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-2:282b-44: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:282b-45: lhan cig yid kyis gcig tu byas la mya ngan
T02D2512-2:282b-46: gzhig pa'i bsam pas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas
T02D2512-2:282b-47: rang gi mig phyi zhing bde ba skyes par bsams
T02D2512-2:282b-48: te / de lta bus ni mya ngan 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:282b-49: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas bsgrub par bya
T02D2512-2:282b-50: ba dang lhan cig tu byas par bsams la bsgrub
T02D2512-2:283a-1: dang bde ba ngang yid bde ba skyes pa'i bsam
T02D2512-2:283a-2: bas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te snying
T02D2512-2:283a-3: gar gzhag par bya ste de lta bus ni gnod
T02D2512-2:283a-5: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:283a-6: nad pa'i lus la bya ba par bya zhing de
T02D2512-2:283a-7: dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog
T02D2512-2:283a-8: dkar pos nad pa'i lus de bzhin du kun du
T02D2512-2:283a-9: gang bar bsams te de lta bus ni gnod byed
T02D2512-2:283a-11: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog
T02D2512-2:283a-12: gi phyag rgyas khu tshur gnyis kyis bsal bar byas
T02D2512-2:283a-14: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog
T02D2512-2:283a-15: gi phyag rgyas kha zas rnyed pa na sngags bzla
T02D2512-2:283a-16: zhing kha zas de rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang
T02D2512-2:283a-17: bzhin du bsams la de nas kha zas de zos
T02D2512-2:283a-18: na sbyar ba'i dug 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:283a-19: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:283a-20: gshed byed la mngon du phyogs te khros pas rdo
T02D2512-2:283a-21: rje 'bar ba 'phangs te gshed byed kyi steng du
T02D2512-2:283a-22: babs par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:283a-23: de lta bus ni 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:283a-24: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog
T02D2512-2:283a-25: gi phyag rgyas phur bu bzung la yid kyis phyung
T02D2512-2:283a-26: la de lta bus ni bka' 'khor du 'jug go
T02D2512-2:283a-27: // de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub
T02D2512-2:283a-28: mchog gi phyag rgyas phur bu bzung la bcings te
T02D2512-2:283a-29: // / des rting pas brdeg pa'i tshul du byas shing phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-2:283a-30: las kyang rdo rje 'bar ba spros la ro langs kyi steng du dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:283a-31: de lta bus ni ro langs thams cad 'jig go //
T02D2512-2:283a-32: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas yi ge aom bris la /
T02D2512-2:283a-33: sngags thams cad gzhig pa'i bsam bas dbyi bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:283a-34: de lta bus ni sngags thams cad 'jig go //
T02D2512-2:283a-35: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02D2512-2:283a-36: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te ;
T02D2512-2:283a-37: sman thams cad bzung ba'i bsam bas de sogs gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:283a-38: de lta bus ni sman thams cad 'jig go //
T02D2512-2:283a-39: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog
T02D2512-2:283a-40: gi phyag rgya tsham [?] ngam dang bcas pa dang
T02D2512-2:283a-41: / aom bhu kham h'um zhes bya bas bgegs thams cad la bsnun cing /
T02D2512-2:283b-0: bgegs thams cad @283b kyi steng du rdo rje 'bar
T02D2512-2:283b-1: ba yid kyis phab na de lta bus ni bgegs
T02D2512-2:283b-3: de bzhin du thams cad byas la log 'dren bkug
T02D2512-2:283b-4: ste de'i steng du byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:283b-6: de lta bus ni log 'dren thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:283b-7: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog
T02D2512-2:283b-8: gi phyag rgyas srin po la sogs pa sdig pa
T02D2512-2:283b-9: thams cad bsad pa'i bsam pa de nyid kyis dbyi
T02D2512-2:283b-10: bar bya zhing / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me
T02D2512-2:283b-11: ltar 'bar bas kyang de thal bar byas par bsam
T02D2512-2:283b-12: bar bya zhing / par bya ste / de lta
T02D2512-2:283b-13: bus ni sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-2:283b-14: bar bya zhing / par bya ste / // de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02D2512-2:283b-15: mdun du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spyan drangs te /
T02D2512-2:283b-16: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-2:283b-17: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas rmi lam ngan pa
T02D2512-2:283b-18: thams cad gzhig pa'i bsam pas sbyin sreg byas na
T02D2512-2:283b-19: / de lta bus ni rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro /
T02D2512-2:283b-20: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas /
T02D2512-2:283b-21: bcom ldan 'das thab kyi dbus su spyan drangs la cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2512-2:283b-22: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas d'ur ba'i sbyin sreg
T02D2512-2:283b-23: byas na dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jig par
T02D2512-2:283b-24: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du thams cad byas la
T02D2512-2:283b-25: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings la spyi bor
T02D2512-2:283b-26: 'gyur ro // bzhag ste / byams pa'i lta bas
T02D2512-2:283b-27: bsgrub par bya ba la bya bcing bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:283b-28: gtsug 'phyang gis kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i lus kun
T02D2512-2:283b-29: du gang la rims bcom bar gyur par bsam bar
T02D2512-2:283b-30: 'gyur ro // bzhag ste / bya ste / de
T02D2512-2:283b-31: lta bus ni rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-2:283b-33: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog
T02D2512-2:283b-34: gi phyag rgyas nad pa'i skra nas bzung la sbrug
T02D2512-2:283b-36: cing / bcom ldan 'das khro bo stobs po ches
T02D2512-2:283b-37: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus las gdon blangs te /
T02D2512-2:283b-38: gzhan du dor bar bsam bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:283b-39: de lta bus ni gdon 'jig go //
T02D2512-2:283b-40: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02D2512-2:283b-41: de'i steng na kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i tshul du
T02D2512-2:283b-42: gzhag cing bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams la
T02D2512-2:283b-43: bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:283b-44: dang bcas pas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab
T02D2512-2:283b-45: nas mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya rnams thal bar mdzad
T02D2512-2:284a-1: bus ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:284a-2: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog
T02D2512-2:284a-3: bcings te rang gi khyim du bskor la rdo rje
T02D2512-2:284a-4: rigs kyis kyang yams kun du 'byin par bsam par
T02D2512-2:284a-5: bya ste / de lta bus ni yams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:284a-6: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02D2512-2:284a-7: rang gi khyim du bzhag la bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-2:284a-8: rje h'um mdzad kyi khyim der rdo rje rigs 'byin
T02D2512-2:284a-9: pa'i tshul gyis gdug pa thams cad nges par skrod
T02D2512-2:284a-10: par mdzad pa la brtson par bsams na de lta
T02D2512-2:284a-11: bus ni nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad 'jig go
T02D2512-2:284a-12: // de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02D2512-2:284a-13: rang gi khyim du zhugs la bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2512-2:284a-14: par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar bos khang ba thams
T02D2512-2:284a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus na bzhugs par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:284a-17: de lta bus ni glo bur ba'i nyes pa sel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:284a-18: de bzhin du thams cad byas la byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02D2512-2:284a-19: rang gi snying ga nas bton te /
T02D2512-2:284a-20: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bsgrub par
T02D2512-2:284a-21: bya ba'i lus la khyab par byas par bsams na
T02D2512-2:284a-22: de lta bus ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jig
T02D2512-2:284a-23: par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du thams cad byas
T02D2512-2:284a-24: la byang chub mchog bcings te lus la bskor bas
T02D2512-2:284a-25: lus thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin
T02D2512-2:284a-27: de lta bus ni lus kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:284a-28: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02D2512-2:284a-29: des tshig 'byin pa'i tshul du bya zhing bdag nyid
T02D2512-2:284a-30: rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal gyi ngo bor bsam
T02D2512-2:284a-31: par bya ste / de lta bus ni ngag gi sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig go //
T02D2512-2:284a-32: de bzhin du thams cad byas nas byang chub mchog bcings te /
T02D2512-2:284a-33: snying ga'i phyogs su btsir zhing snying gar sems dpa'
T02D2512-2:284a-34: rdo rje bsgoms na de lta bus ni sems kyi
T02D2512-2:284a-35: sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:284a-36: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub mchog gi
T02D2512-2:284a-37: phyag rgya las nyi shu rtsa lnga bsgrub par gsungs
T02D2512-2:284a-38: nas / da ni de nyid kyi dam tshig gi
T02D2512-2:284a-39: phyag rgya las nyi shu rtsa lnga pos gzhan bya
T02D2512-2:284b-0: bar @284b gsungs pa ni tshe chen po zhes bya
T02D2512-2:284b-1: ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:284b-2: 'dis kyang 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:284b-3: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2512-2:284b-4: ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnam par snang
T02D2512-2:284b-5: mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-2:284b-6: pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog bcings la rang gi
T02D2512-2:284b-7: snying gar brtan par bya zhing rang gi snying gar
T02D2512-2:284b-8: rnam par snang mdzad zla ba'i mdog can bsam par
T02D2512-2:284b-9: bya ste / de lta bus ni tshe chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro //

T02D2512-2:289b-34: ltar 'bar ba yang yin zhing de lta bus ni

T02D2512-2:293b-21: thams cad de bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha
T02D2512-2:293b-22: tshig go // khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang //
T02D2512-2:293b-24: de nas me tog blangs nas ni //
T02D2512-2:293b-25: khros pas bdag po che la gtor //
T02D2512-2:293b-26: zhes bya bar sbyar te rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:293b-27: 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho gas zhugs pa bdag
T02D2512-2:293b-29: me tog dor la rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:293b-30: khros par gyur pas khro gnyer bsdus pa dang /
T02D2512-2:293b-31: 'dzum pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la bdud cing phyag bya'o //
T02D2512-2:293b-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:293b-33: rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches //
T02D2512-2:293b-34: yang dag par ni dgug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:293b-35: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi
T02D2512-2:293b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta
T02D2512-2:293b-38: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo legs par phye ste /
T02D2512-2:293b-39: bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom
T02D2512-2:293b-40: ldan 'das la yang dag par bstod nas rdo rje
T02D2512-2:293b-41: 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po spyan 'dren pa'i sngags
T02D2512-2:293b-42: dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar
T02D2512-2:294a-1: dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du spyan drangs shing dgug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:294a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:294a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyang de kho na nyid kyi snying
T02D2512-2:294a-4: pos gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni hi zhes
T02D2512-2:294a-5: bya bas de kho na nyid kyi snying po bstan
T02D2512-2:294a-8: ham zhes bya bzlos shing bcom ldan 'das me ltar
T02D2512-2:294a-9: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o
T02D2512-2:294a-10: // de nas dam tshig brjod par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-2:294a-11: ba ni de ltar slob ma la bstan pa'i rjes
T02D2512-2:294a-12: // thogs nyid la / de sems can mang la bde phyir dang //
T02D2512-2:294a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:294a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:294a-15: dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-2:294a-16: ba ni de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ji skad
T02D2512-2:294a-17: du bshad pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang
T02D2512-2:294a-18: bcas pa spyan drangs te bcug nas rdo rje h'um
T02D2512-2:294a-19: mdzad yi ge h'um dang bcas pas sdigs mdzub bya'o
T02D2512-2:294a-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sdigs mdzub kyi phan yon gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:294a-22: de nas cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:294a-23: de ltar slob ma zhugs par byas nas /
T02D2512-2:294a-25: de nas me tog dor du gzhug go //
T02D2512-2:294a-26: de nas de blangs la mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:294a-27: de nas dkyil 'khor bstan pa la snying gar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol bar bya ste /
T02D2512-2:294a-28: 'di ni cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin no //
T02D2512-2:294a-29: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa de bzhin du bya'o
T02D2512-2:294a-30: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:294a-31: chen po bshad pa'i cho gas slob ma rnams la
T02D2512-2:294a-33: dngos grub ni rdo rje brtul zhugs dang /
T02D2512-2:294a-34: rdo rje rigs bdag po'i de kho na nyid bstan pa dang /
T02D2512-2:294a-35: dam tshig gsum sbyin pa dang lung bstan pa dang
T02D2512-2:294a-36: snying po sbyin pa dang phyag rgya bslab pa dang
T02D2512-2:294a-38: gzengs bstod pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu bshad pa dang /
T02D2512-2:294a-39: dam tshig bstan pa rnams bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:294a-40: rdo rje khro bo ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02D2512-2:294b-0: de'i las kyi dbye ba bzhi po gang yin @294b
T02D2512-2:294b-1: bde de rnams la bslab par bya zhing bstan par
T02D2512-2:294b-2: bya'o // de dag gang zhe na /
T02D2512-2:294b-3: rgyas gdab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:294b-4: smos pa yin te de la rgyas gdab pa bsgrub
T02D2512-2:294b-5: par bya ba'i snying po la rdo rje mda' bskyed
T02D2512-2:294b-6: pa'o // phyag rgya gzhig pa ni gdon gyis zin
T02D2512-2:294b-7: pa'i rgyud la yod pa'i kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i
T02D2512-2:294b-8: phyag rgyas gdon gyi phyag rgya gzhig pa'o //
T02D2512-2:294b-9: 'khor lo 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon gyis bzung ba'i
T02D2512-2:294b-10: rgyud la yod pa'i gdon gsad pa ni gsad pa'o
T02D2512-2:294b-11: // ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas gdon
T02D2512-2:294b-12: gyis zin pa'i sems can rnams la yang srog 'byin
T02D2512-2:294b-13: pa ni sems can rnams la slar 'tsho bar bya
T02D2512-2:294b-14: // ba'o // rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi po
T02D2512-2:294b-15: 'di dag gdon gyis bzung ba la bya ba yin
T02D2512-2:294b-16: nam 'on te ma yin pa ji ltar shes par
T02D2512-2:294b-17: // ba'o // bya zhe na // gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T02D2512-2:294b-18: sems can gang la mda' 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-2:294b-19: phyag rgya sbyar ba na 'gyur bskyed par byed na
T02D2512-2:294b-20: / sems can de ni gdon gdug pas zin pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:294b-21: de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs
T02D2512-2:294b-22: ba dan 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas sems can de 'tsho
T02D2512-2:294b-23: bar byas la / shin tu bsrung ba'i phyag rgyas
T02D2512-2:294b-24: slar yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing sems can de
T02D2512-2:294b-25: la gdon gyis 'gyur ba yang byed par mi 'gyur
T02D2512-2:294b-26: bar bya ba'i phyir de la bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:294b-27: 'tsho ba'i phyag rgya gang yin pa 'dis srog byin
T02D2512-2:294b-28: te bsrung bar bya ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar
T02D2512-2:294b-29: du de bya'o // de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do//
T02D2512-2:294b-30: de nas 'dir bsgrub pa bshad bya ste zhes bya
T02D2512-2:294b-31: ba ni de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gnas
T02D2512-2:294b-32: skabs so // 'dir zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i rigs la'o //
T02D2512-2:294b-33: sgrub pa ni bsgrub pa'i thabs las so //
T02D2512-2:294b-34: bshad ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya ba'o //
T02D2512-2:294b-35: ji bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du //
T02D2512-2:294b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-2:294b-37: me ltar 'bar ba'i ras ris la sogs pa ji
T02D2512-2:294b-38: skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sku
T02D2512-2:294b-39: gzugs dge zhing sdig pa dang bral ba de'i mdun
T02D2512-2:294b-40: du ste / spyan sngar rdo rje gsor bas rdo
T02D2512-2:294b-41: rje gsor zhing dang po zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i
T02D2512-2:295a-0: du ste / @295a * // brjod 'bum bya'o // de nas cir 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:295a-1: 'bum tshang nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i 'bras bu gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:295a-2: de ltar yi ge h'um gi sgrub pa gsungs nas /
T02D2512-2:295a-3: da ni de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying
T02D2512-2:295a-4: po bsgrub pa ni zhes bya ba ni sogs pas
T02D2512-2:295a-5: yi ge h'um gi sgrub pa gsungs pa yin no
T02D2512-2:295a-7: de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya'i rang bzhin can gyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po gsungs nas /
T02D2512-2:295a-8: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2512-2:295a-9: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub pa gsungs
T02D2512-2:295a-10: pa yin no // de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:295a-11: phyag rgya rnams kyi dam pa bsgrub pa ni dam tshig sgrub pa ste /
T02D2512-2:295a-12: phyag rgya chen po thams cad mngon du byas pa'i thabs so //
T02D2512-2:295a-14: ji bzhin rab tu phyag rgya bcing //
T02D2512-2:295a-15: zhes bya ba yin te mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor
T02D2512-2:295a-16: ba la gnas pa'i skabs ni ji bzhin dus te
T02D2512-2:295a-17: / de'i dus su phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-2:295a-18: bdag nyid bsreg bar bya'o zhes bya ba rang nyid
T02D2512-2:295a-19: thal bar bya'o zhes bya ba sems bskyed la bzlas
T02D2512-2:295a-20: brjod kyi dong yis rang gi lha'i snying po zlos
T02D2512-2:295a-21: shing srid pa 'di nyid du zhes bya ba tshe
T02D2512-2:295a-22: 'di nyid la khro bo che zhes bya ba rdo
T02D2512-2:295a-23: rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:295a-24: chen po sgom par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D2512-2:295a-25: dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:295a-26: de ltar rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:295a-27: chen po bsgrub pa gsungs nas da ni de nas
T02D2512-2:295a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje'i rigs thams
T02D2512-2:295a-29: cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs
T02D2512-2:295a-30: pa yin no // dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub
T02D2512-2:295a-31: pa ni zhes bya ba ni rdo rje me ltar
T02D2512-2:295a-32: 'bar ba la rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dam
T02D2512-2:295a-33: tshig 'dzin par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni dam tshig
T02D2512-2:295a-35: de'i sgrub pa ni de bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:295a-36: de nyid bstan pa ni bdag ni thams cad mi
T02D2512-2:295a-37: snang bar bya zhes brjod cing phyag na rdo rje
T02D2512-2:295a-39: bdag ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2512-2:295a-40: stong pa nyid bcu drug gi ngo bo nyid yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:295a-41: gsad par bya'o zhes bya ba rdo rje 'chang la
T02D2512-2:295b-0: sogs pa'i rang @295b bzhin thams cad mi snang bar
T02D2512-2:295b-2: chos bdag med par bsgom pas bsgom pa'i dus kyi
T02D2512-2:295b-3: dang por de skad brjod la phyag na rdo rje
T02D2512-2:295b-4: ste / rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-2:295b-5: bzlas brjod byas na rnal 'byor pa rdo rje 'dzin pa 'grub bar 'gyur ba ste /
T02D2512-2:295b-7: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:295b-8: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa bstan nas /
T02D2512-2:295b-9: da ni de las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni
T02D2512-2:295b-10: zhes bya ba las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa gsungs
T02D2512-2:295b-11: pa yin no // sgrub pa de'i rang gi tshul gsungs pa ni /
T02D2512-2:295b-12: rnam pa bzhi po la zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:295b-13: pa gsungs pa yin te 'phags pa de kho na
T02D2512-2:295b-14: nyid bsdus pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum
T02D2512-2:295b-15: bu'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i mchod pa
T02D2512-2:295b-16: chen po dang / dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-2:295b-17: chos dang las kyi mchod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi
T02D2512-2:295b-18: las bzhi po gang yin pa de ni shin tu
T02D2512-2:295b-19: byed ces bya ba ni rab tu byed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:295b-20: nyid ces bya ba nges par gzung ste /
T02D2512-2:295b-21: de nyid bsgrub pa'i mchog gi las byed pas rdo rje las nyid thob pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:295b-23: thams cad bde ba'i phyir zlos na //
T02D2512-2:295b-25: sems can thams cad rdo rje'i rigs rtogs pa'i bar du bskyed pa ni thams cad bde ba'o //
T02D2512-2:295b-26: de'i don du bzlas na rdo rje'i las nyid de
T02D2512-2:295b-27: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2512-2:295b-28: // de thob pa ni rnyed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:295b-29: bskal ba chen po ni chos dang las dang /
T02D2512-2:295b-30: dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:295b-32: de'i rgyas pa ni de'i rgyun no //
T02D2512-2:295b-33: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
T02D2512-2:295b-34: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin par shes par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:295b-35: rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcings
T02D2512-2:295b-36: te rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o
T02D2512-2:295b-37: // de nas rdo rje dbab pa bskyed la /
T02D2512-2:295b-38: dbab pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:295b-39: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:295b-40: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje dbab pa la /
T02D2512-2:295b-41: yi ge h'um yid kyis bris la /
T02D2512-2:295b-42: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296a-1: yi ge h'um dang yi ge aa'i ye shes dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa la /
T02D2512-2:296a-2: rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296a-3: de'i steng du yi ge h'um nyid dang ka la
T02D2512-2:296a-4: sogs pa gsal bya'i yi ge dang bcas pa las
T02D2512-2:296a-6: gnyis pa yang de h'um dang bcas pa las rdo
T02D2512-2:296a-7: rje 'bar ba de'i dbus su yi ge h'um bsams
T02D2512-2:296a-8: la gnyis su med pa'i thugs rdo rje chen po'i
T02D2512-2:296a-9: mtshan nyid ltar rdo rje de bzhin no zhes rdo
T02D2512-2:296a-11: rdo rje de las rdo rje rigs rnams sbrul te /
T02D2512-2:296a-12: des gdug pa thams cad btul nas /
T02D2512-2:296a-13: de yang rdo rje der yid kyis zhugs par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296a-14: de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i
T02D2512-2:296a-15: sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la
T02D2512-2:296a-16: / yi ge h'um gis rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar bsam mo //
T02D2512-2:296a-17: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham /
T02D2512-2:296a-18: zhes zlos shing dam tshig chen po'i sems dpar bdag nyid bsgom mo //
T02D2512-2:296a-19: de nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dam tshig
T02D2512-2:296a-20: gi phyag rgya bcings la ma h'a sa ma yo&
T02D2512-2:296a-21: ham / zhes zlos shing rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sku dang gsung dang /
T02D2512-2:296a-22: thugs rdo rje'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsams la phyag rgya de nyid dang /
T02D2512-2:296a-23: sa ma ya sa tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes zlos shing ;
T02D2512-2:296a-24: snying ga dang dbral ba dang /
T02D2512-2:296a-25: lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:296a-27: h'um aa: zhes zlos shing sna tshogs padma'i steng du rdo rje 'bar ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296a-28: de nas rdo rje'i dbus su h'um bsams la /
T02D2512-2:296a-30: de nyid badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um zhes
T02D2512-2:296a-31: bya bas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba bdag nyid
T02D2512-2:296a-32: bsams la / de nas de nyid du rdo rje
T02D2512-2:296a-33: lcags kyu la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das me ltar
T02D2512-2:296a-35: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02D2512-2:296a-36: dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:296a-37: h'um dri shya zhes bya bas blta bar byas la
T02D2512-2:296a-38: rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po'i h'um gis
T02D2512-2:296a-39: rang gi lus la bcom ldan 'das gzhug par bya'o
T02D2512-2:296a-40: // de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:296a-41: sa ma ya stvam hi zhes zlos shing 'od kyi
T02D2512-2:296b-0: dkyil 'khor @296b bskyed la de zhugs pas bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:296b-1: 'das dang bdag nyid gcig tu gyur nas /
T02D2512-2:296b-2: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba bsgoms la /
T02D2512-2:296b-4: sa ma ya stvam ham ho zhes lan gsum bzla par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296b-5: de nas chos dang las dang /
T02D2512-2:296b-6: phyag rgya chen pos bcom ldan 'das rgyas btab la /
T02D2512-2:296b-7: dza: h'um bam ho: / zhes zlos shing yid kyis
T02D2512-2:296b-8: legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lus
T02D2512-2:296b-9: la sangs rgyas thams cad bcug la rdo rje dbyings
T02D2512-2:296b-10: kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i de bzhin
T02D2512-2:296b-11: gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis de
T02D2512-2:296b-12: bsgrub par bya'o // de nas de las bshad pa'i
T02D2512-2:296b-13: chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis
T02D2512-2:296b-14: de rnams la rgyas btab la /
T02D2512-2:296b-15: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02D2512-2:296b-16: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296b-17: de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la
T02D2512-2:296b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog gi
T02D2512-2:296b-19: phyag rgyas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang dang
T02D2512-2:296b-20: / rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas
T02D2512-2:296b-21: rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba'i phreng bas dbang
T02D2512-2:296b-22: bskur ba blangs la yi ge gnyis kyi go chas
T02D2512-2:296b-23: bdag nyid go bgo bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296b-24: de nas khro bo rdo rje rtse lnga pas bdag po dang /
T02D2512-2:296b-25: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296b-26: de nas khro bo'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma la
T02D2512-2:296b-27: sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa gnyis kyis rdo rje
T02D2512-2:296b-28: bzung zhing chos kyi dril bu dkrol la dam tshig
T02D2512-2:296b-29: gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas h'um
T02D2512-2:296b-31: de nas rdo rje gsor zhing khro gnyer dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pas sdud par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296b-32: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:296b-33: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02D2512-2:296b-34: dbang phyug che nyid bdag po mchog / rdo rje sems dpar bdag gyur cig /
T02D2512-2:296b-35: de skad ces brjod la rab tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:296b-36: lce la rdo rje dkar po de la h'um bsam mo //
T02D2512-2:296b-37: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje
T02D2512-2:296b-38: 'bar ba'i gnas su h'um mdzad sgrub par byed pa'i
T02D2512-2:296b-39: yi ge h'um bris la bdag nyid rdo rje me
T02D2512-2:297a-1: mtshungs par bsam zhing bzlas pa'i don la dmigs shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:297a-2: mdun du yang ras ris la sogs pa la bcom
T02D2512-2:297a-3: ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs la
T02D2512-2:297a-4: / mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod
T02D2512-2:297a-5: la phyag byas nas rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas
T02D2512-2:297a-6: yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-2:297a-7: de nas zla ba nya ba'i dus su mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
T02D2512-2:297a-8: nang par rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:297a-9: yang na hi zhes bya ba de bzhin du bsgrubs
T02D2512-2:297a-10: la zla ba gcig tsam bzlas la de'i rjes la
T02D2512-2:297a-11: ras ris kyi mdun du stong phrag brgya bzlas nas
T02D2512-2:297a-12: mthar yang zla ba nya ba la mtshan thog thag
T02D2512-2:297a-14: nyi ma 'chang ba'i dus su rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:297a-15: de nas phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02D2512-2:297a-16: zla ba gcig tsam du bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bzlas nas thams cad bya'o zhes bsgom mo //
T02D2512-2:297a-17: de nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2512-2:297a-18: spyan sngar gzhag / yang zla ba gcig tsam bsgoms
T02D2512-2:297a-19: la mthar de bzhin du mtshan thog thag bsgoms na
T02D2512-2:297a-20: rdo rje 'chang ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:297a-21: 'on te dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod
T02D2512-2:297a-22: na de bzhin du thams cad byas nas rang gi
T02D2512-2:297a-23: snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje la h'um yid kyis
T02D2512-2:297a-24: bri'o // de nas chos thams cad gzugs brnyan dang
T02D2512-2:297a-25: 'dra bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid bar
T02D2512-2:297a-26: bsgoms la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas zla
T02D2512-2:297a-27: ba gcig tsam du h'um bzlas la /
T02D2512-2:297a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mdun du
T02D2512-2:297a-29: bzhag la zla ba gzhan la bdag gis thams cad
T02D2512-2:297a-30: gsang par bya'o zhes brjod la dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-2:297a-31: rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-2:297a-32: mthar de bzhin du mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas
T02D2512-2:297a-33: na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-2:297a-34: // 'on te las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod
T02D2512-2:297a-35: na de bzhin du chog thams cad rjes su spyad
T02D2512-2:297a-36: la 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las
T02D2512-2:297a-37: gsungs pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i las kyi
T02D2512-2:297b-0: dkyil 'khor gyi mchod @297b pa rnam pa bcu drug
T02D2512-2:297b-2: phyag byas la bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag
T02D2512-2:297b-3: rgya bcings nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sna
T02D2512-2:297b-4: tshogs rdo rje la h'um bsams nas de nyid bzlas
T02D2512-2:297b-5: shing zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bsgom par
T02D2512-2:297b-6: bya'o // yang bcom ldan 'das mdun du bzhag la
T02D2512-2:297b-7: mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de
T02D2512-2:297b-8: bya'o // / yang zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas te /
T02D2512-2:297b-9: mtshan thog thag bzlas shing bsgoms nas de'i rjes la
T02D2512-2:297b-10: nyi ma 'char kar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang 'dra
T02D2512-2:297b-11: ba yas thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:297b-12: de ltar na de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po
T02D2512-2:297b-13: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te bsgrub pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-2:297b-14: rgyas pa'i rgyud do zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad
T02D2512-2:297b-15: pas ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang
T02D2512-2:297b-16: / slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:297b-17: yang 'di'i don brjod par byas te /
T02D2512-2:297b-18: bdag dang gnas bsrung ba byas la rdo rje 'khor
T02D2512-2:297b-19: lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:297b-20: 'khor mdun du bskyed nas mngon sum dang 'dra bar
T02D2512-2:297b-21: bltas la / gal te 'byor ba yod na me
T02D2512-2:297b-22: tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas dkyil
T02D2512-2:297b-23: 'khor lnga pas phyag bya pa dang /
T02D2512-2:297b-24: phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas snga ma bzhin du sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:297b-25: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal ma la
T02D2512-2:297b-26: sogs pa nas dam tshig gi khu tshur bcing ba'i
T02D2512-2:297b-27: bar gyis phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad byas la
T02D2512-2:297b-28: de nas yi ge h'um zlos shing rdo rje me
T02D2512-2:297b-29: ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa nas lha mo rdo
T02D2512-2:297b-30: rje dril bu ma'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-2:297b-31: rgyas bcings la de'i snying po lan gsum bzlas nas
T02D2512-2:297b-33: zhes bya bas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams rang gi snying gar gzhug go //
T02D2512-2:297b-34: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D2512-2:297b-35: kyang rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar
T02D2512-2:297b-36: bar yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:297b-37: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:297b-38: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje
T02D2512-2:297b-39: 'bar ba la h'um yid kyis bris la de nyid
T02D2512-2:297b-40: yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par
T02D2512-2:298a-1: de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad
T02D2512-2:298a-2: la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i
T02D2512-2:298a-3: phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298a-4: de nas nam mkha' rab 'byam gyi tshad tsam gyi
T02D2512-2:298a-5: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du nam
T02D2512-2:298a-6: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la rdo rje
T02D2512-2:298a-7: 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar rab tu
T02D2512-2:298a-9: de nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i bdag nyid
T02D2512-2:298a-10: bsams la 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings
T02D2512-2:298a-11: la de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs
T02D2512-2:298a-12: la / dkyil 'khor der yid kyis 'jug pa'i glu len cing 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298a-13: de nas me tog dor ba'i glu len cing rang
T02D2512-2:298a-14: gi mgor me tog gi phreng ba dor la de
T02D2512-2:298a-15: nas ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298a-16: de nas dngos grub kyi brtul zhugs bzung ba'i bar gyis chog rnams rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-2:298a-17: dkyil 'khor der rang gi snying ga'am zla bar yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298a-18: de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:298a-19: h'um gis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar
T02D2512-2:298a-20: ba snga ma bzhin du rang gi lus la bcug
T02D2512-2:298a-21: la de nas snga ma bzhin du 'od kyi dkyil
T02D2512-2:298a-23: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen por
T02D2512-2:298a-24: rgyas btab la 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus
T02D2512-2:298a-25: pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje rigs kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2512-2:298a-26: chen po byas la dang po'i rdo rje bcings te
T02D2512-2:298a-27: / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-2:298a-28: rdo rje h'um mdzad du yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298a-29: de nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la
T02D2512-2:298a-30: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur pa'i phyag
T02D2512-2:298a-31: rgya'am / rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag
T02D2512-2:298a-32: rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur la yi ge gnyis kyi
T02D2512-2:298a-33: go chas go bgo bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298a-34: de nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang /
T02D2512-2:298a-35: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs bzung nas //
T02D2512-2:298a-36: bro bo'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:298a-37: phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par
T02D2512-2:298a-38: mchod la bcom ldan 'das la khro gnyer 'dzum pa
T02D2512-2:298a-39: dang bcas pas btud par byas la phyag bzhi byas
T02D2512-2:298a-40: la / de'i rjes la de kho na nyid kyis
T02D2512-2:298b-0: rdo rje bzung @298b zhing chos kyi dril bu dkrol
T02D2512-2:298b-1: la dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis
T02D2512-2:298b-2: brlabs nas h'um lan gsum bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-3: de'i rjes la aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2512-2:298b-4: zhes bya bas lha thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-5: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes zlos shing gzugs
T02D2512-2:298b-6: brnyan dang 'dra zhing stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
T02D2512-2:298b-7: yin par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-8: de nas sarba sa mo& ham zhes zlos shing chos
T02D2512-2:298b-9: thams cad bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis thabs
T02D2512-2:298b-10: dang shes rab kyi 'thas bu lha thams cad kyi
T02D2512-2:298b-11: rang bzhin yin par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-12: de nas snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba
T02D2512-2:298b-13: la yid ge h'um yid kyis bris la sarbhodha ma
T02D2512-2:298b-14: ma h'a he shvarya dhi pa ram /
T02D2512-2:298b-15: sa ma yo& ham badzra sa tva stvam zhes brjod la /
T02D2512-2:298b-16: nyin re'i sbyor bas bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-17: dkyil 'khor gzhan rnams kyi sngags ni bzlas 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-18: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa bya bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:298b-19: yang na rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'khor lo'i
T02D2512-2:298b-20: phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:298b-21: bskyed la rang rang gi snying pos rdo rje me
T02D2512-2:298b-22: ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs
T02D2512-2:298b-23: pa'i bar du rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D2512-2:298b-24: rang rang gi gnas su yid kyis bkod la /
T02D2512-2:298b-28: zhes zlos shing snga ma bzhin du don gsum pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-29: de nas badzra dzva la aa na l'arka a'atma ma
T02D2512-2:298b-30: h'a mandala sva bha po& ham sva mam zhes bya
T02D2512-2:298b-31: bas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje me
T02D2512-2:298b-32: ltar 'bar ba'i nga rgyal gyis bdag nyid bsams la
T02D2512-2:298b-33: / lha thams cad kyi thugs na gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2512-2:298b-34: rje 'bar ba'i dbus su yi ge h'um yid kyis
T02D2512-2:298b-35: / bris la / de nyid rdo rje'i tshig gam
T02D2512-2:298b-36: khro bo'i tshig gis zlos shing ji srid dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:298b-37: de nyid nyin re bsgom pa'i dus su mngon sum
T02D2512-2:298b-38: du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du
T02D2512-2:298b-39: bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-40: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa legs par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:298b-41: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas zhag bdun
T02D2512-2:298b-42: gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas
T02D2512-2:298b-43: brtsams te dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:298b-44: de nas nyin re 'am zla re'am /
T02D2512-2:299a-0: @299a * // lo re zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:299a-1: de yang gtsug lag khang ngam /
T02D2512-2:299a-6: shar gyi mtshams kyi sa'i char bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:299a-7: de la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su bris na ;
T02D2512-2:299a-8: rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba dang /
T02D2512-2:299a-9: yul gyi skye po rnams dang 'tshe ba mang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-10: grong khyer gang gi lho phyogs su bris par gyur na de stong par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-11: gang la dmigs nas bris pa de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-16: der gang zhig zhugs pa de 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-17: me'i mtshams kyi sar bris na /
T02D2512-2:299a-20: bden bral du ni bris na /
T02D2512-2:299a-22: rlung gi char bris na chu chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-23: de bas na grong khyer gyi dbang ldan gyi phyogs char brten nas sa yongs su brtag par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:299a-24: mchod rten dang nye ba ma yin rlung gi gnas su yang ma yin /
T02D2512-2:299a-25: mchod rten gyi gnas su ni 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-26: shing gi gnas su ni 'chi ba'o //
T02D2512-2:299a-29: ji skad bshad pa'i gnas su ni /
T02D2512-2:299a-34: sol ba la sogs pa bsal la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:299a-35: gang gi phyir rdo ba dang bcas par ni rlung 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-36: rus pa dang bcas par ni gzer gyis 'debs so //
T02D2512-2:299a-37: gseg ma dang bcas pa'i gnas su lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-39: sol ba dang bcas pa'i gnas su rims 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:299a-40: ji skad du bshad pa'i phyogs kyi cha de'i sa de yang bram ze dang /
T02D2512-2:299a-43: dmangs rigs te rigs bzhir shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:299a-44: de la dkar po gang yin pa de ni bram ze'i rigs te /
T02D2512-2:299a-45: sa phyogs der gang rig pa sgrub par byed na bsang phye dang /
T02D2512-2:299b-2: spyi blugs la sogs pa'i rdzas dang /
T02D2512-2:299b-3: nges der dkyil 'khor bri par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:299b-4: dmar po gang yin pa de ni rgyal rigs te /
T02D2512-2:299b-5: gang de sgrub par byed pas na rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-2:299b-12: lcags mda' la sogs pa sgrub par byed de der des dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:299b-13: ser po gang yin pa de ni rje'u rigs te gang zhig der bsgrubs pas ni dgra sta dang /
T02D2512-2:299b-15: tog spyad la sogs pa bsgrub pa ste des dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o ;
T02D2512-2:299b-16: / nag po gang yin pa de ni dmangs rigs te /
T02D2512-2:299b-17: sa phyogs gang yin pa der ni cig shos kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:299b-18: tshon sna lnga'i srad bus thig btab la ri mo
T02D2512-2:299b-19: shin tu mi sbom pa shin tu mi phra ba
T02D2512-2:299b-22: de la ri mo phra bas ni za byed kyi las bskyed do //
T02D2512-2:299b-23: sbom pos ni klu'i gnas bskyed do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so //
T02D2512-2:299b-24: de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad
T02D2512-2:299b-25: dang ldan pas mngon par gang 'dod pa'i sa'i dbus
T02D2512-2:299b-26: su mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pas dkyil
T02D2512-2:299b-27: 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la bdag dang slob ma zhi
T02D2512-2:299b-29: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gdug pa rnams
T02D2512-2:299b-30: bskrad la gnas bsrung ba rnams byas nas yang nyungs
T02D2512-2:299b-32: thal ba la dkyil 'khor de nyid lan bdun bzlas pas gtor la /
T02D2512-2:299b-33: sa phyogs der khru gang tsam mam 'dom gang tsam
T02D2512-2:299b-34: du brkos te zlos la skra dang phub ma dang
T02D2512-2:299b-35: rus pa dang / gseg ma dang /
T02D2512-2:299b-37: sol ba la sogs pa bsal la sbyangs nas spos chu'i dri zhim pos spags pa'i sas bkang ste /
T02D2512-2:299b-38: rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i dri'i chus
T02D2512-2:299b-39: yang dang yang chag chag btab la kun du brdung
T02D2512-2:299b-40: bar bya'o // de nas shin tu mnyam par byas
T02D2512-2:299b-41: pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i
T02D2512-2:299b-43: rta babs bzhi sa mdzes par byas pa phyogs bzhir
T02D2512-2:299b-44: skar khung bzhes yongs su bskor ba der slob ma
T02D2512-2:300a-1: ba'i rnam lnga la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pas shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:300a-2: skyang nul byed du bcug cing de nyid yongs su
T02D2512-2:300a-3: bzlas pa'i dri chus bsang gtor byas la de nyid
T02D2512-2:300a-4: bzlas pa'i rin po che dang /
T02D2512-2:300a-5: sman dang 'bru thams cad sa'i dbus dang phyogs bzhir dgug par bya'o //

T02D2512-2:314b-17: kun du 'gro ba grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:314b-18: rdo rje shugs su yang dag bshad //
T02D2512-2:314b-19: de nas bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:314b-20: ma h'a ra ta su tridha su to shyo me //
T02D2512-2:314b-21: su su kho badzra satva a'adya si ddha m'am zhes smros shig / yang 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2512-2:314b-22: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
T02D2512-2:314b-23: su zhugs kyis ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis
T02D2512-2:314b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du grub pa yang
T02D2512-2:314b-25: thob na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos
T02D2512-2:314b-26: te / de lta bu'i ye shes skyed par bya //
T02D2512-2:314b-27: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams
T02D2512-2:314b-28: la smra bar ma byed cig / khyod dam tshig
T02D2512-2:314b-30: de nas slob dpon rang nyid kyis khro bo ti
T02D2512-2:314b-31: rinti ri'i phyag rgya kha thur du bstan pa dang
T02D2512-2:314b-32: / gyen du bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob
T02D2512-2:314b-33: ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad ces brjod par
T02D2512-2:314b-34: / bya'o // 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig yin
T02D2512-2:314b-35: gyis gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na glang pa
T02D2512-2:314b-37: de nas dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya de nyid
T02D2512-2:314b-38: mna'i snying po'i chu la lan cig bzlas nas slob
T02D2512-2:314b-39: ma 'thung du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par
T02D2512-2:314b-40: bya'o // de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te /
T02D2512-2:314b-41: rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D2512-2:314b-42: snying la yang dag gzhug par mdzad //
T02D2512-2:314b-43: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2512-2:314b-44: de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs //
T02D2512-2:314b-46: de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:315a-1: nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga
T02D2512-2:315a-2: yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang
T02D2512-2:315a-4: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D2512-2:315a-5: mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas
T02D2512-2:315a-6: sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02D2512-2:315a-7: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par byas te /
T02D2512-2:315a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la /
T02D2512-2:315a-9: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig
T02D2512-2:315a-10: ces smros shig / de nas rdo rje slob dpon
T02D2512-2:315a-11: gyis myur du khro bo ti ri nti ri'i phyag
T02D2512-2:315a-12: rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod du gzhug go
T02D2512-2:315a-13: // 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste //
T02D2512-2:315a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02D2512-2:315a-15: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //
T02D2512-2:315a-16: de ring nyid du dbab par shog / aom badzra
T02D2512-2:315a-17: a'a we sha aa zhes lan brgya'i bar du zlos
T02D2512-2:315a-18: su gzhug go // yang khro bo'i khu tshur bcings
T02D2512-2:315a-19: la sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas dral bar
T02D2512-2:315a-20: su gzhug go // byas te / h'um aa aa aa aa zhes lan brgya zlos su gzhug go //
T02D2512-2:315a-21: yang na rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bsgrubs zin
T02D2512-2:315a-22: pa'i rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa bcings la
T02D2512-2:315a-23: rkang pa g-yon pas slob ma'i rkang pa g-yas pa
T02D2512-2:315a-24: mnan la / badzra a'a be sha aa zhes lan brgya zlos shing dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315a-25: de nas sra t'i tstsha badzra ho zhes bya bas
T02D2512-2:315a-26: me tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por
T02D2512-2:315a-27: dor bar bya'o // de nas phreng ba blangs la /
T02D2512-2:315a-28: aom badzra pra ti gri hna sva mi m'am sa
T02D2512-2:315a-29: tva ma h'a ba la zhes bya ba 'di nyid
T02D2512-2:315a-30: kyis mgo la bcing bar bya'o /
T02D2512-2:315a-31: de nas snying po 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315a-32: de nas pra t'itstsha badzra ho zhes bya bas me
T02D2512-2:315a-33: tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por nutta
T02D2512-2:315a-35: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:315a-36: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315a-37: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba la sogs pa'i snying po slob ma la bstan par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315a-38: de ni 'di dag yin te h'um h'um badzra pra ha ra ni mat /
T02D2512-2:315a-39: aom badzra sh'u la gri bindha mat /
T02D2512-2:315a-40: aom badzra kro she tstshenda mat /
T02D2512-2:315a-41: h'um badzra aa ma la padme mat ces bya ba ni rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang /
T02D2512-2:315a-43: rdo rje ral gri ma dang //
T02D2512-2:315a-45: de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya don yod pa thogs pa med pa /
T02D2512-2:315a-46: stobs dang pha rol gnon pa shin tu grub pa
T02D2512-2:315b-0: sems can @315b thams cad mngon par rgyas 'debs par
T02D2512-2:315b-2: h'um badzra gu hya siddhya pa ra ma yo g'i shva ri /
T02D2512-2:315b-3: h'um badzra tsande shva ri kha tv'am gi /
T02D2512-2:315b-4: ma h'a badzra ka p'a la m'a la ma ku te /
T02D2512-2:315b-5: ru lu ru lu le hi /
T02D2512-2:315b-6: aom badzra na ra ya ni badzi /
T02D2512-2:315b-8: aom badzra kro dha ma h'a yo ga d'a ki n+ya: lan cig bzlas la dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315b-9: bcom ldan 'das ni de kho na nyid kyi snying pos dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315b-10: de ltar 'dis dngos grub rnams la don yod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:315b-11: de nas 'dis 'jug pa'i phyag rgyas slob ma'i snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315b-12: tishtha badzra dri dho me bha ba sha'a shva to
T02D2512-2:315b-13: me bha ba hri da yam me aa dhi tishtha
T02D2512-2:315b-14: sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha h'um ha ha ha ha
T02D2512-2:315b-15: ho / de nas yon gyi mchog blangs nas slob
T02D2512-2:315b-16: ma sna tshogs padma'i steng du rdo rje me ltar
T02D2512-2:315b-17: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya chen pos bzhag la /
T02D2512-2:315b-18: mchod yon byin nas me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2512-2:315b-19: slob dpon gyis dbang bskur ba'i cho gas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2512-2:315b-20: 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:315b-21: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D2512-2:315b-22: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D2512-2:315b-23: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ster //
T02D2512-2:315b-24: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag /
T02D2512-2:315b-25: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02D2512-2:315b-27: dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur //
T02D2512-2:315b-28: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang /
T02D2512-2:315b-29: rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya gnyis kyis de la dbang bskur la lugs ma'am //
T02D2512-2:315b-31: bris pa'i phyi'i sangs rgyas lnga'i rdo rje dang ldan pa'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-2:315b-32: yi ge gnyis kyis go cha bkon par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315b-33: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i sngags kyis rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-2:315b-34: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-2:315b-35: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs dag sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:315b-36: slob mas kyang rdo rje thal mo bskor bas btud
T02D2512-2:315b-37: cing phyag byas la me tog la sogs pa'i dbang
T02D2512-2:315b-38: bskur ba blangs bar bya zhing yon yang dbul bar
T02D2512-2:315b-39: bya'o // de ltar yon ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-2:315b-40: mi chen yon du phul nas ni //
T02D2512-2:315b-41: slar yang rin gyis blu par bya //
T02D2512-2:315b-42: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2512-2:316a-2: de nas de la mchog pa lnga dang /
T02D2512-2:316a-3: khro bo'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis mchod la /
T02D2512-2:316a-4: de nas de'i rdo rje de kho na nyid kyis sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:316a-5: de nas chos kyi dril bu dkrol du gzhug go //
T02D2512-2:316a-6: de nas dam tshig gis phyag rgya chen por byin gyis rlobs shig ces bstan par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:316a-7: tshigs su bcad pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang
T02D2512-2:316a-8: snying po yang byin la phyag rgya'i ye shes ji
T02D2512-2:316a-9: lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:316a-10: de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:316a-11: sems can kun la phan 'dogs dang //
T02D2512-2:316a-12: bstan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:316a-13: gdug pa btul nas bsod nams dag / thob ces rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs //
T02D2512-2:316a-14: dkyil 'khor du zhugs la bcom ldan 'das h'um mdzad kyi sdigs mdzub sbyar bar byas te /
T02D2512-2:316a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang /
T02D2512-2:316a-16: bdud thams cad dang khams gsum thams cad 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis brlab pa mdzad de /
T02D2512-2:316a-17: de nas khro bo'i las bzhi po rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D2512-2:316a-21: khro bo'i las bzhi bslab par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:316a-22: phyag rgya gang zhig ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:316a-24: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:316a-25: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba la sogs pa dbugs 'byin par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:316a-26: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-2:316a-28: // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga
T02D2512-2:316a-29: dang slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-2:316a-31: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2512-2:316a-32: rnams la slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes
T02D2512-2:316a-33: bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par
T02D2512-2:316a-34: bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:316a-35: pa las kyi rgyun sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:316a-37: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag tu don ston par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
T02D2512-2:316a-38: sgrub pa chen po byas nas gang gi tshe grub par ma gyur na de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-2:316a-39: dngos grub ma grub ces bya ba ni chos kyi
T02D2512-2:316b-0: phyag rgyal sogs pa phyag @316b rgya bzhis sngar bshad
T02D2512-2:316b-1: pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho gas bsgrubs pas na dbang du
T02D2512-2:316b-2: byas par ma gyur pa de ni ma grub pa'o
T02D2512-2:316b-3: // des dngos grub bsgrub pa na 'grub pa yin la ma bsgrubs pas na ma grub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:316b-4: las kyi rgyun zhes bya ba ni las rnams kyi rgyun te /
T02D2512-2:316b-5: thams cad bsreg pa la sogs pa'i las kyi rgyun rnams so //
T02D2512-2:316b-6: las kyi rgyun de'i dam pa ni mchog go //
T02D2512-2:316b-7: su zhig gi zhe na rdo rje khro mchog rgyal
T02D2512-2:316b-8: po zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje khro bo
T02D2512-2:316b-9: ni rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:316b-10: de rnams kyi mchog ni dam pa'o //
T02D2512-2:316b-11: rdo rje khro bo mchog kyang yin rgyal po yang
T02D2512-2:316b-12: yin pas na rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po ste
T02D2512-2:316b-13: / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'o //
T02D2512-2:316b-14: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02D2512-2:316b-15: rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po nyid do //
T02D2512-2:316b-16: go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho gas so //
T02D2512-2:316b-17: rab bshad ces bya ba ni rab tu phye ste bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-2:316b-18: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te gang gi
T02D2512-2:316b-19: tshe sngar bshad pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas
T02D2512-2:316b-20: / zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod
T02D2512-2:316b-21: byas te chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub
T02D2512-2:316b-22: pa na 'grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe 'og
T02D2512-2:316b-23: nas rjes thogs nyid la 'chad pa'i sgrub pa'i las
T02D2512-2:316b-24: brgya po bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-2:316b-25: / // thams cad bsreg pa la ni zhes bya
T02D2512-2:316b-26: ba ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad
T02D2512-2:316b-27: bsreg pa ni thams cad bsreg pa'o //
T02D2512-2:316b-28: bskrad pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-2:316b-29: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:316b-30: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung bas so //
T02D2512-2:316b-31: de yang ske tshe dang bcas pa'i nyungs mar gyi
T02D2512-2:316b-32: sbyin sreg g-yas pas bya ba dang de nyid kyis
T02D2512-2:316b-33: thams cad bcing ba dang mi 'gul ba nyid dang
T02D2512-2:316b-34: gnyid log par ston pa dang /
T02D2512-2:316b-35: khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas bsdigs pa dang /
T02D2512-2:316b-36: phyag rgya lhod par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:316b-37: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar bar bya ba'i mtshams dbye ba dang /
T02D2512-2:316b-38: de dag nyid kyis gdu bur bcing ba dang /
T02D2512-2:316b-42: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-4: mdzub mo gnyis kyis sen mo bcer te bcing ba dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-5: lag pa gnyis mnye ba dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-6: sor mo thams cad du gtor ba dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-7: mod la phyag rgya dgrol ba dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-8: grang bas 'dar ba la sdigs mdzub bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-9: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gdengs kar byas nas sdigs mdzub bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-10: g-yas pa sos bzung ba dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-13: rgyug pa la sogs par ston pa dang /
T02D2512-2:317a-14: mdzub mo gnyis su se gol gtogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:317a-16: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2512-2:317a-17: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
T02D2512-2:317a-18: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2512-2:317a-19: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2512-2:317a-20: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02D2512-2:317a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das ji skad bshad pa'i sbyin
T02D2512-2:317a-22: sreg gi thab khung gi gnas su legs par bzhugs
T02D2512-2:317a-23: su gsol te cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad
T02D2512-2:317a-24: pa hi h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2512-2:317a-25: kyi phyag rgya bcings la g-yas pas blugs gzar blangs
T02D2512-2:317a-26: te / yungs mar skye tshe dang bcas pa'i sbyin
T02D2512-2:317a-27: sreg bya zhing bsgrub par bya ba yang bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:317a-28: 'das bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i phung po 'dra
T02D2512-2:317a-29: ba'i zhal du yid kyis gzhug par byas te /
T02D2512-2:317a-30: de lta bus ni thams cad bsreg par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:317a-31: de bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor
T02D2512-2:317a-32: ba byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te bsgrub
T02D2512-2:317a-33: par bya ba bskrad pa'i bsam pas mdzub mo gnyis
T02D2512-2:317a-34: kyis gtong ba ltar byas te bsgrub par bya ba
T02D2512-2:317a-35: yang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis rtsa bzhin
T02D2512-2:317a-36: du khyer bar bsam par byas te /
T02D2512-2:317a-37: de lta bus ni thams cad skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:317a-38: de bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor
T02D2512-2:317a-39: ba byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas
T02D2512-2:317a-40: bcings te bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yid kyis
T02D2512-2:317a-41: zhugs te bsgrub par bya ba'i tshig tu smra mi
T02D2512-2:317a-42: nus par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2512-2:317a-43: phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis kyis bdag nyid kha bcing
T02D2512-2:317a-45: de lta bus ni thams cad gzhig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:317a-46: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya
T02D2512-2:317b-0: ba'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor @317b la
T02D2512-2:317b-1: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mnan par bsam par bya
T02D2512-2:317b-2: ste / de lta bus ni thams cad rengs so //
T02D2512-2:317b-3: de bzhin du thams cad byas la rdo rje h'um
T02D2512-2:317b-4: mdzad bcings te yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang
T02D2512-2:317b-5: lhan cig tu byas la bsgrub par bya ba gnyid
T02D2512-2:317b-6: log tu gzhug pa'i bsam pas mig 'dzums pa byas
T02D2512-2:317b-7: te de lta bus thams cad gnyid log par 'gyur
T02D2512-2:317b-8: ro // de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings
T02D2512-2:317b-9: la khro bo'i lta bas bsgrub par bya ba la
T02D2512-2:317b-10: blta zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub byas la
T02D2512-2:317b-11: mig las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar bas kyang /
T02D2512-2:317b-12: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la bar mtshams med par
T02D2512-2:317b-13: khyab par bsam par byas te de lta bus ni
T02D2512-2:317b-15: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la bsgrub
T02D2512-2:317b-16: par bya ba dang lhan cig tu byas te bsgrub
T02D2512-2:317b-17: par bya ba rmongs par bya ba'i bsam pas phyag
T02D2512-2:317b-18: rgya lhod par byas te de lta bus ni thams
