T02D2512-2:329b-14: ces bsgrub pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog 'jig rten dbang phyug 'grub par mdzad pa'o ;
T02D2512-2:329b-15: / de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams //
T02D2512-2:329b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ji ltar slob
T02D2512-2:329b-17: dpon gyis 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad ma thag pa
T02D2512-2:329b-18: nyid kyis slob dpon zhugs la /
T02D2512-2:329b-19: de bzhin du slob dpon gyis slob ma bcug la /
T02D2512-2:329b-20: de rnams kyi cho ga rgyas par byas nas slob
T02D2512-2:329b-21: dpon gyis de rnams la dngos grub kyi ye shes
T02D2512-2:329b-22: bslab par bya ba yin pas na /
T02D2512-2:329b-23: dngos grub thams cad sbyin byed pa'i //
T02D2512-2:329b-24: ye shes dag ni bslab par bya //
T02D2512-2:329b-26: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa sgrub par byed
T02D2512-2:329b-27: pa'i ye shes slob ma rnams la bslab par bya'o
T02D2512-2:329b-29: sgrub pa chen po gdod nas byung //
T02D2512-2:329b-30: zhes bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi ting nge
T02D2512-2:329b-31: 'dzin sgrub par byed pa'i bzlas pa'i snying po ni
T02D2512-2:329b-33: ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po de'i bsgrub par bya
T02D2512-2:329b-34: ba chen po ni 'di'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub
T02D2512-2:329b-36: bskal pa bzang po la sogs pa'i sngon du yang
T02D2512-2:329b-37: de ltar byung ba'i tshul gyis gnas pas na gdod
T02D2512-2:329b-38: nas byung ba'i sgrub pa chen po yin no //
T02D2512-2:329b-39: 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid //
T02D2512-2:329b-41: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad ni 'jig rten kun te padma'i rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02D2512-2:330a-0: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na 'jig @330a * //
T02D2512-2:330a-2: 'dis ni rgyu las 'bras bu nye bar btags pa'i sgo nas bsgrubs la /
T02D2512-2:330a-3: 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid //
T02D2512-2:330a-4: ces bya ba'i sgras bshad do //
T02D2512-2:330a-5: bshad par bya zhes bya ba ni bstan par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330a-7: go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:330a-8: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pas sngon du bsnyen pa
T02D2512-2:330a-9: bya ba yin kyi dang po nyid ni ma yin
T02D2512-2:330a-10: no // bud med rnams kyi nang du zhugs //
T02D2512-2:330a-11: zhes bya ba ni mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis
T02D2512-2:330a-12: kyis lha mo dang khro gnyer ma la sogs ni
T02D2512-2:330a-13: bud med do // padma'i zhi ba dang /
T02D2512-2:330a-14: padma'i sred med kyi bu dang /
T02D2512-2:330a-16: padma'i 'dod pa'i gzugs ni 'jig rten gdug pa zhes
T02D2512-2:330a-17: bya bar grags te de rnams kyi nang du tshud
T02D2512-2:330a-18: pa'o // gang yang rung bar 'dug nas ni //
T02D2512-2:330a-19: zhes bya ba ni yid dang rjes su mthun zhing 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas su 'dug pa'o //
T02D2512-2:330a-20: padma chen po yongs bzung ste //
T02D2512-2:330a-21: zhes bya ba ni padma'i 'dab ma chen po lce la rdo rje dkar po bsam ste /
T02D2512-2:330a-22: bzla bar bya ba'i sngags yid kyis bri ba dang /
T02D2512-2:330a-23: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje padma la
T02D2512-2:330a-24: yang bris nas bzlas par bya ba zlos shing chos
T02D2512-2:330a-25: thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes
T02D2512-2:330a-26: bsgom par bya'o // nyin re ci nus bsgrub par bya //
T02D2512-2:330a-27: zhes bya ba ni sgom pa'i rim pa 'dis nyin
T02D2512-2:330a-28: re zhing rang gi nus pa dang rjes su mthun
T02D2512-2:330a-29: pas ji srid sko bar ma gyur pa de srid
T02D2512-2:330a-30: kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330a-31: de bzhin dus dang zhes bya ba ni snga dro dang /
T02D2512-2:330a-33: phyi dro dang mtshan phyed la'o //
T02D2512-2:330a-34: stobs ji bzhin zhes bya ba ni rang gi nus pa dang rjes su mthun pas so //
T02D2512-2:330a-35: cho ga 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:330a-36: de nas phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2512-2:330a-37: zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:330a-38: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang chos kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:330a-39: dang las kyi phyag rgya la ni phyag rgya zhes
T02D2512-2:330a-40: bya ste / de'i sgrub pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba don gyis sbyar ro //
T02D2512-2:330a-41: phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2512-2:330a-42: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i lha'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-2:330a-43: po bcings nas de'i rang bzhin ni bsgom par bya'o
T02D2512-2:330a-44: // dngos grub chen po nyid thob par //
T02D2512-2:330b-0: phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dngos grub tshan po nyid @330b do ;
T02D2512-2:330b-1: / de thob par ni de'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330b-2: dam tshig dam tshig mchog gis te //
T02D2512-2:330b-3: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig go //
T02D2512-2:330b-4: dam tshig ni dam tshig gis zhes bya ba dam
T02D2512-2:330b-5: tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pas bdag nyid thob par
T02D2512-2:330b-6: 'gyur ba'o // las ni las mchog phyag rgyas so //
T02D2512-2:330b-7: zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgya ni las te /
T02D2512-2:330b-8: las de las mchog gis zhes bya ba rang gi
T02D2512-2:330b-9: lha'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas bdag nyid kyis
T02D2512-2:330b-10: thob par 'gyur / chos kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2512-2:330b-11: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-2:330b-12: las kyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa ni sgrub pa chen po ste bshad ma thag pa 'di nyid do //
T02D2512-2:330b-13: de ston par byed pa sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud ces bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330b-16: gnas bsrung ba byas la rang gi lha mdun du bzhag ste /
T02D2512-2:330b-17: padma'i dril bu thogs nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o ;
T02D2512-2:330b-18: / de la 'dir re zhig dang por phyag bya
T02D2512-2:330b-19: ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas rdo rje
T02D2512-2:330b-20: thal mo dang / rdo rje bsdams pa bcing par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330b-21: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa rang gi snying gar dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330b-22: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab par byas la /
T02D2512-2:330b-23: phyag rgya de nyid snying gar ji lta ba bzhin du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330b-24: de nas dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du bcing ngo //
T02D2512-2:330b-25: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje padma la bzlas par bya ba'i sngags bsam la /
T02D2512-2:330b-26: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330b-27: de nas rang gi sems bzlas par bya ba'i sngags
T02D2512-2:330b-28: kyi ngo bor bsams la de dbyangs kyi yi ge
T02D2512-2:330b-29: bcu drug dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:330b-30: du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:330b-31: de'i steng du yang bzla bar bya ba'i sngags bsams la /
T02D2512-2:330b-32: ka la sogs pa gsal bar bya ba'i yi ge
T02D2512-2:330b-33: dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa
T02D2512-2:330b-34: de yang bzlas pa'i snying po dang bcas pa las
T02D2512-2:330b-35: dang po'i rdo rje de nyid 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
T02D2512-2:330b-36: rnal 'byor pas rdo rje padmar bsam mo //
T02D2512-2:330b-37: gzhan dag gis rang gi lha'i mtshan ma dang /
T02D2512-2:330b-38: de'i dbus su bzlas par bya ba'i sngags yid kyis bsams la /
T02D2512-2:331a-1: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i ngo bor bsam shing phyag rgya'i tshul las padma'i rigs thams cad spros la /
T02D2512-2:331a-2: des gdul bar bya ba thams cad gdul bar byas nas /
T02D2512-2:331a-3: de rnams phyag rgya'i gzugs der yid kyis bcug la /
T02D2512-2:331a-4: sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor bas phyag rgya'i
T02D2512-2:331a-5: gzugs de rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la
T02D2512-2:331a-6: / rdo rje sems dpa' de rang gi sngags zlos
T02D2512-2:331a-7: shing rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsam par bya ste
T02D2512-2:331a-8: / // de nas ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham zhes brjod de /
T02D2512-2:331a-9: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas
T02D2512-2:331a-10: sam yo& ham zhes brjod la dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-2:331a-12: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya bas snying ga dang /
T02D2512-2:331a-13: dpral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2512-2:331a-14: de nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-2:331a-15: mdun du sna tshogs padma'i steng du rang gi lha'i
T02D2512-2:331a-16: sngags kyi mthar yi ge aa dang bcas pa las
T02D2512-2:331a-17: lha'i mtshan ma bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:331a-18: de nas rang gi lha'i sngags zlos shing rang gi
T02D2512-2:331a-19: lha'i mtshan ma phyag rgya'i ngo bor bdag nyid bsam
T02D2512-2:331a-20: par bya'o // des yang rang gi lha'i sngags zlos
T02D2512-2:331a-21: shing phyag rgya des rang gi lha'i skur bdag nyid
T02D2512-2:331a-22: par bya'o // bsam par bya'o // de nas rdo
T02D2512-2:331a-23: rje padma'i lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i las kyi
T02D2512-2:331a-24: phyag rgya rnams kyis de nyid du rang gi lha
T02D2512-2:331a-25: par bya'o // bsam par bya'o // dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang /
T02D2512-2:331a-26: bcing ba dang dbang du byas la /
T02D2512-2:331a-27: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang rang gi lha'i sngags dang /
T02D2512-2:331a-28: dri shya zhes kyang brjod la blta bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:331a-29: de nas rta mgrin gyi lcags kyu dang bzlas par
T02D2512-2:331a-30: bya ba'i sngags kyis rang gi lus la bcug la
T02D2512-2:331a-31: / rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:331a-32: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-2:331a-33: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2512-2:331a-34: aa ham dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:331a-35: rang gi sngags lan gsum brjod la rang gi lus
T02D2512-2:331a-36: kyi nang du gtogs pa dang lhan cig tu gyur
T02D2512-2:331a-37: par bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:331a-38: de nas yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor
T02D2512-2:331a-39: bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang gi lus
T02D2512-2:331a-40: la bcug la dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis
T02D2512-2:331a-41: rab tu bsgrubs nas rang gi lha dang de bzhin
T02D2512-2:331a-42: gshegs pa thams cad chos dang las dang phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:331b-0: dang po'i @331b rdo rje bcings las bdag nyid de
T02D2512-2:331b-1: bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la yi ge brgya pas
T02D2512-2:331b-2: brtan par bya'o // de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur la rdo rje padma dang /
T02D2512-2:331b-3: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la
T02D2512-2:331b-4: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o
T02D2512-2:331b-5: // de nas padma'i rdo rje mtshon cha ma la
T02D2512-2:331b-6: sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid mchod
T02D2512-2:331b-7: la padma chen po'i me tog dang bcas pa bcings
T02D2512-2:331b-8: te yid bsdus te phyag bya'o //
T02D2512-2:331b-9: de nas de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2512-2:331b-10: chos dang dam tshig gsum blangs la rang gi sngags lan gsum bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:331b-11: de nas dngos grub chen po kun kyi mchog /
T02D2512-2:331b-12: dbang phyug chen po bdag po'i mchog /'jig rten mgon
T02D2512-2:331b-13: khyod bdag gyur cig / de skad ces brjod nas
T02D2512-2:331b-14: rab tu bsgrubs te de bzhin du lce dang /
T02D2512-2:331b-15: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje padma la rang gi sngags rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-2:331b-16: chos kyi tshig zlos shing yid kyis sems can gyi
T02D2512-2:331b-17: khams thams cad padma'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du byas
T02D2512-2:331b-18: la 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i lha'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:331b-20: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag par nyin re
T02D2512-2:331b-21: zhing bya ba'i sbyor ba zla ba gcig tsam gyi
T02D2512-2:331b-23: de nas yang bzlas brjod 'bum byas la mthar mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:331b-24: de lta bus ni 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:331b-25: chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-2:331b-26: de nas phyag rgya chen po bsgrubs na snga ma
T02D2512-2:331b-27: bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas
T02D2512-2:331b-28: phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-2:331b-29: zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bdag nyid 'jig rten
T02D2512-2:331b-30: dbang phyug tu bsgom la mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms
T02D2512-2:331b-31: na nang par 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar
T02D2512-2:331b-32: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-2:331b-33: rgya bsgrubs na dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2512-2:331b-34: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad nas mthar mtshan
T02D2512-2:331b-35: thog thag bsgoms nas de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang
T02D2512-2:331b-37: de nas las kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:331b-38: de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-2:331b-39: rang gi snying gar hri las sna tshogs padma bsams la /
T02D2512-2:331b-40: las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-2:331b-41: zla ba gnyis kyi bar du bsgoms la /
T02D2512-2:331b-42: mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na /
T02D2512-2:332a-1: 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:332a-2: da ni yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-3: bdag dang gnas bsrung bar byas la /
T02D2512-2:332a-4: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
T02D2512-2:332a-5: dkyil 'khor sprul la gal te 'byor pa yod na
T02D2512-2:332a-6: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod do
T02D2512-2:332a-7: // sgo bzhi nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas
T02D2512-2:332a-8: la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D2512-2:332a-9: snga ma bzhin du sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-10: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo la
T02D2512-2:332a-11: sogs pa nas dam tshig gi khu tshur bcing ba'i
T02D2512-2:332a-12: bar gyi phyag rgya bcings la thams cad bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-13: de nas sarba shuddha: zhes brjod cing 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa nas /
T02D2512-2:332a-14: lha mo padma'i dril bu ma'i bar gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-2:332a-15: de'i snying po yang lan gsum gyi bar du brjod
T02D2512-2:332a-16: cing aom badzra mu: zhes bya ba yang brjod nas
T02D2512-2:332a-17: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams rang gi snying gar
T02D2512-2:332a-18: dgrol zhing lha rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D2512-2:332a-19: rdo rje rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje
T02D2512-2:332a-20: padma la yid kyis gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-21: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa thams cad dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-22: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje padma la bzlas par bya ba'i sngags bsams la /
T02D2512-2:332a-23: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-24: de nas sngar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad
T02D2512-2:332a-25: la bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag
T02D2512-2:332a-26: rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-27: de nas nam mkha' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i rang
T02D2512-2:332a-28: gi snying ga'i zla bar yid kyis nam mkha' dang
T02D2512-2:332a-29: mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la rdo rje 'khor lo'i
T02D2512-2:332a-30: phyag rgyas rang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas 'jug pa'i
T02D2512-2:332a-31: phyag rgya bcings te 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-32: de nas rang gi spyi bor me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-33: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang
T02D2512-2:332a-34: ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la
T02D2512-2:332a-35: dkyil 'khor de / rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i nang du tshud par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332a-36: de nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'phags
T02D2512-2:332a-37: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus la
T02D2512-2:332a-38: bcug la dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rab tu bsgrubs
T02D2512-2:332a-39: nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas
T02D2512-2:332b-0: btab @332b la ; 'phags pa de kho na nyid
T02D2512-2:332b-1: bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rnal
T02D2512-2:332b-3: snga ma bzhin du dang po'i rdo rjes bdag nyid
T02D2512-2:332b-4: byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par
T02D2512-2:332b-5: byas la / snga ma bzhin du dngos grub kyi
T02D2512-2:332b-6: rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs pa'i bar gyi cho ga
T02D2512-2:332b-7: rnams rjes su spyad bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332b-8: de nas padma'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag
T02D2512-2:332b-9: rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid mchod la
T02D2512-2:332b-11: bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du phyag byas nas phyag bzhi bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332b-12: de nas de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam
T02D2512-2:332b-13: tshig bzung nas bzlas pa bya ba'i sngags lan gsum
T02D2512-2:332b-14: brjod par bya'o // de nas aom badzra a'atma ko&
T02D2512-2:332b-15: ham zhes brjod de lha thams cad kyi sku dang
T02D2512-2:332b-16: gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bdag nyid
T02D2512-2:332b-17: brjod par bya'o // bsam par bya'o // aom sva bh'a wa shuddho & ham zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-2:332b-18: gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs shing stong pa'i rang bzhin can du bsam par bya'o ;
T02D2512-2:332b-19: / aom sarba sa mo & ham zhes brjod de
T02D2512-2:332b-20: chos bdag med pa'i ye shes las byung ba'i lha
T02D2512-2:332b-21: thams cad kyi rang bzhin bdag yin bar bsgom par
T02D2512-2:332b-22: bya'o // de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje padma'i dbus su /
T02D2512-2:332b-23: ya th'a rakta mi dam padma r'a ga to she n'a li pya te /
T02D2512-2:332b-24: b'a sha do she sha bi ba'i dhe ta th'a
T02D2512-2:332b-25: shuddham tri dh'a tu k'am zhes bya ba yid kyis
T02D2512-2:332b-26: bris la / chos kyi dam tshig gis bzlas shing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332b-27: de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi //
T02D2512-2:332b-28: sngags re re zhing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-2:332b-29: de ltar byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:332b-30: yang na rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'khor los dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02D2512-2:332b-31: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa nas
T02D2512-2:332b-32: padma'i dril bu ma'i bar du rang gi snying po
T02D2512-2:332b-33: bkod la / snga ma bzhin du snying po gsum
T02D2512-2:332b-34: brjod cing don gsum bsgoms la bdag ni rang nyid
T02D2512-2:332b-35: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i ngo bo
T02D2512-2:332b-36: nyid yin no zhes rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-2:332b-37: ya th'a rakta mi dam padma zhes bya ba'i sngags
T02D2512-2:332b-38: lha thams cad kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2512-2:332b-40: chos kyi tshig gis zlos shing ji srid bsgom pa'i
T02D2512-2:332b-41: dus su nyin re zhing mngon sum du mthong bar
T02D2512-2:332b-42: gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o
T02D2512-2:333a-1: sngon du bsnyen pa shin tu yang byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:333a-2: de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du dkyil 'khor 'di'i
T02D2512-2:333a-3: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te bsgom
T02D2512-2:333a-4: par bya'o // de nas dkyil 'khor 'di kun du bri'o //
T02D2512-2:333a-5: de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad
T02D2512-2:333a-6: dang ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2512-2:333a-7: sa'i dbus su rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba
T02D2512-2:333a-8: byas la / rdo rje gtsug tor la sogs pa rang gi lus la bkod de /
T02D2512-2:333a-9: mi rus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:333a-10: gyi bgegs bzlog la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho
T02D2512-2:333a-11: gas bdag dang slob ma rnams zhi bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:333a-12: de nas snga ma bzhin du sa yang dag par
T02D2512-2:333a-13: sbyong ba'i cho ga dang sa yongs su bzung ba'i
T02D2512-2:333a-14: cho ga rjes su spyad la dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i
T02D2512-2:333a-16: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i khor bor snyoms par
T02D2512-2:333a-17: zhugs pa las langs nas bgegs bsal ba la sogs
T02D2512-2:333a-18: pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02D2512-2:333a-19: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang mchod yon dang /
T02D2512-2:333a-20: las thams cad pa'i chu snod la sngags yongs su
T02D2512-2:333a-21: bzlas te rdo rje 'khor los 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
T02D2512-2:333a-22: dkyil 'khor mdun du sprul la phyag btsal ba la
T02D2512-2:333a-23: sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung ba
T02D2512-2:333a-24: byas la snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po
T02D2512-2:333a-25: byas la / de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2512-2:333a-26: chos dang dam tshig gzung ba snga ma bzhin du ri rab bskyed la /
T02D2512-2:333a-27: ri rab kyi steng du rdo rje 'khor los dkyil
T02D2512-2:333a-28: 'khor bskyed la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sems dpa'i
T02D2512-2:333a-29: skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste bdag nyid spro ba
T02D2512-2:333a-30: bskyed pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-2:333a-31: thams cad byas nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas
T02D2512-2:333a-32: la ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:333a-33: de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la de'i snying po bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:333a-34: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:333a-35: rdo rje padma'i rigs chen po //
T02D2512-2:333a-36: sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol //
T02D2512-2:333a-37: zhes bya bas bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:333a-38: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-2:333a-39: ya th'a rakta mi dam padmam r'a ga to she n'a li bya te /
T02D2512-2:333a-40: b'a sa do she sh'a bi b'i dhe ta th'a shuddham tri dh'a tu k'am /
T02D2512-2:333a-41: badzrod tishtha mandala au tha pa ya zhes brjod la
T02D2512-2:333b-0: dkyil 'khor bteg ste bar @333b snang gi phyogs su
T02D2512-2:333b-1: bzhag la rang gi sngags dang /
T02D2512-2:333b-2: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas snying ga dang
T02D2512-2:333b-3: dbral ba dang lkog mar bdag nyid byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-2:333b-4: la yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-2:333b-5: badzra drishti ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su
T02D2512-2:333b-6: bkod la aa zhes bya bas rang gi rkang mthil
T02D2512-2:333b-7: gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-2:333b-8: rkang mthil gnyis gnon pa'i ri rab nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:333b-9: sa gzhi gtan pa la thug pa'i bar gyi sa
T02D2512-2:333b-10: phyogs thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byas
T02D2512-2:333b-11: te / phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02D2512-2:333b-12: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02D2512-2:333b-13: snying bo kun du zlos byed cing //
T02D2512-2:333b-14: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor ;
T02D2512-2:333b-15: / rdo rje lta bas kyang phyogs dang mtshams dang
T02D2512-2:333b-16: nam mkha' dang sa 'og dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba
T02D2512-2:333b-17: dang rab dang dra ba bya'o //
T02D2512-2:333b-18: yang rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i snyoms par zhugs
T02D2512-2:333b-19: pas langs la bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o
T02D2512-2:333b-20: // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye la
T02D2512-2:333b-21: gsang ba'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor ji lta ba
T02D2512-2:333b-22: bzhin du spyan drangs nas snga ma bzhin du phur
T02D2512-2:333b-24: de nas snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas la slob ma lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D2512-2:333b-25: lha lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:333b-26: de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la mal nas langs
T02D2512-2:333b-27: la snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas
T02D2512-2:333b-28: nas yang dkyil 'khor thams cad snga ma bzhin du
T02D2512-2:333b-29: bteg ste / bar snang gi phyogs su bzhag ste snga ma bzhin du thig gdab pa'i sngags dang /
T02D2512-2:333b-30: tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la bdag po lnga yongs
T02D2512-2:333b-31: su blangs la nyi ma 'chang ba'i dus su dkyil
T02D2512-2:333b-32: 'khor dris byug cing me tog sil ma bkram pa
T02D2512-2:333b-33: byas la ; dza las mig g-yon dang g-yas su
T02D2512-2:333b-34: zla ba dang nyi ma ser po snang ba bskyed
T02D2512-2:333b-35: byas la ; nas / aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa
T02D2512-2:333b-36: zhes zlos shing rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2512-2:333b-37: rje padma las sgrub pa'i grogs mchog padma'i gar gyi
T02D2512-2:333b-38: dbang phyug gi gzugs su yid kyis phyung la /
T02D2512-2:333b-39: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon sna lnga'i skud ba blangs la /
T02D2512-2:333b-40: dang por sngags kyis sbyangs shing dri dang bcas pa'i tshon dkar po'i nang du spangs la /
T02D2512-2:333b-41: dza:zhes bya bas srad bu grogs po'i lag tu btang
T02D2512-2:333b-42: la snga ma bzhin du phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab
T02D2512-2:333b-43: par bya'o // de'i dbus su snga ma bzhin du
T02D2512-2:334a-0: ka ba brgyad kyi tshul gyis padma 'dab @334a *
T02D2512-2:334a-1: par bya'o // // ma brgyad pa padma'i phreng bas
T02D2512-2:334a-2: bskor bas thig btab la tshon sna lnga'i phye mas
T02D2512-2:334a-3: phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad snga ma
T02D2512-2:334a-5: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs padma la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku lugs ma'am /
T02D2512-2:334a-6: brkos pa'am bris pa sku mdog gser btso ma 'dra
T02D2512-2:334a-7: ba phyag g-yon pa padma'i khu tshur gyis padma bsnams
T02D2512-2:334a-8: shing dkur bsten nas de la gzigs pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2512-2:334a-9: phyag g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang de'i mdzub mo sa
T02D2512-2:334a-10: de'i 'dab ma phye ba mdzad pa /
T02D2512-2:334a-11: rgyan thams cad kyis spras pa /
T02D2512-2:334a-13: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa dang ldan
T02D2512-2:334a-14: pa'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas
T02D2512-2:334a-15: dbang bskur bar 'dzum par gzigs pa sems dpa'i skyil
T02D2512-2:334a-16: krung gis bzhugs pa rang gi snying pos dgod par
T02D2512-2:334a-17: bya'o // de'i mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i
T02D2512-2:334a-18: gnas su shar gyi padma'i dkyil 'khor du ting nge
T02D2512-2:334a-19: 'dzin bzang po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi sku
T02D2512-2:334a-20: gzugs can sna tshogs padma la rdo rje skyil mo
T02D2512-2:334a-22: phyag g-yon pas rdo rje padma bsnams shing ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa /
T02D2512-2:334a-23: de'i g-yas logs su k'i li k'i la'i gnas su
T02D2512-2:334a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa padma chen po zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:334a-25: thugs ka'i phyogs su padma'i khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo
T02D2512-2:334a-26: rje padma gnyis bsnams nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:334a-27: de'i rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma'i gnas su de
T02D2512-2:334a-28: bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba phyag
T02D2512-2:334a-29: g-yon pas rdo rje padma bsnams shing ting nge 'dzin
T02D2512-2:334a-31: de'i g-yon logs su rdo rje bsnyems ma'i gnas su
T02D2512-2:334a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa zhes bya
T02D2512-2:334a-33: ba sangs rgyas kyi tshul can padma'i khu tshur gnyis
T02D2512-2:334a-34: kyis rin po che'i padma gnyis pa bsnams nas rin
T02D2512-2:334a-35: po che'i padma stsol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad
T02D2512-2:334a-36: kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad
T02D2512-2:334a-38: sna tshogs padma la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:334a-39: 'di dag thams cad kyang 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs 'dzin par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:334a-41: yongs su 'jig rten dbang phyug gzugs //
T02D2512-2:334a-42: sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha //
T02D2512-2:334b-1: de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni /
T02D2512-2:334b-2: sarba ta th'a ga ta padma dza: h'um badzra padma
T02D2512-2:334b-3: ma he padma ma he padma padma bam ho: padma
T02D2512-2:334b-4: ma no ra dza zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:334b-5: yang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sbrang rtsi
T02D2512-2:334b-6: ma'i gnas su 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa
T02D2512-2:334b-7: lha chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po
T02D2512-2:334b-8: phyag bzhi pa / phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyi sa rtse gsum 'chang zhing mchog stsol pa /
T02D2512-2:334b-9: g-yon gnyis kyis zhags pa dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:334b-10: bden bral gyi mtshams su khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin
T02D2512-2:334b-11: pa sku mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas
T02D2512-2:334b-12: gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyug pa bsnams pa ;
T02D2512-2:334b-13: g-yon gnyis na padma dang dung bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:334b-14: rlung gi mtshams su 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i
T02D2512-2:334b-15: gzugs can sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi dang phyag
T02D2512-2:334b-16: bzhi mnga' ba g-yas gnyis na phreng ba dang dbyug
T02D2512-2:334b-17: ba bsnams pa / g-yon gnyis na padma dang spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-2:334b-18: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dod
T02D2512-2:334b-19: pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa zhal gnyis pa phyag bzhi pa
T02D2512-2:334b-20: / de la phyag g-yas gnyis kyis mda' dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D2512-2:334b-21: g-yon gnyis kyis gzhu dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-2:334b-22: zhal dang po ni 'dod pa'i lha'i gdong 'dra ba /
T02D2512-2:334b-23: spyi bo na rta mgo ljang gu'i mgrin pa bteg ste mtsher bar byed pa'i tshul can no //
T02D2512-2:334b-24: de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni /
T02D2512-2:334b-25: h'um padma na rte shva ra h'um phat /
T02D2512-2:334b-26: he ma h'a padme bi shva mu rte siddhya h'um phat /
T02D2512-2:334b-27: hri: padma padma h'um aa: ho padma aa sv'a gra ma h'um dza zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:334b-28: sgeg mo la sogs pa nas padma'i dril bu ma'i
T02D2512-2:334b-29: bar ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2512-2:334b-30: po las bshad pa'i snying po nyid kyis dgod par
T02D2512-2:334b-31: bya'o // 'dir khyad par ni 'di yin te 'di lta ste /
T02D2512-2:334b-32: phyag mtshan rnams padmas mtshan pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:334b-33: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas phyi rol du snga
T02D2512-2:334b-34: ma bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas
T02D2512-2:334b-35: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo phye la de bzhin du thams
T02D2512-2:334b-36: cad byas nas bsdu ba bya'o //
T02D2512-2:334b-37: de nas mtshan pa rgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag
T02D2512-2:334b-38: par bstod la spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya'i dril bu
T02D2512-2:334b-39: dang bcas pa'i sngags 'dis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang
T02D2512-2:334b-40: bcas pa thams cad spyan drangs la dkyil 'khor du
T02D2512-2:335a-1: sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te
T02D2512-2:335a-2: shva ra padma ha sta aa ya ti sh'i gh'am
T02D2512-2:335a-3: / ai me badzra mu dra pa tri dh'a kri
T02D2512-2:335a-4: shu sa ma ye ba dha ba shi ka ro
T02D2512-2:335a-5: / mi ta / dza: h'um bam ho: sho dha
T02D2512-2:335a-6: ya sarba siddhya ya padmam ma h'a badzra dha ra
T02D2512-2:335a-7: / mi ta / stvam / de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:335a-8: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te ;
T02D2512-2:335a-9: lcags kyur byas la mthe'u chung gnyis shin tu brkyang
T02D2512-2:335a-10: ba ni rgod ma'i kha gdangs pa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:335a-11: yin te / kha bskyod pa'i tshul du bya ba 'di ni padma lcags kyur zhes bya ste /
T02D2512-2:335a-12: 'di mdzub mo gnyis kyis spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:335a-13: de nas padma'i gnod sbyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-2:335a-14: rgyas bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas la rdo
T02D2512-2:335a-15: rje khu tshur gyis sgo rnams bcad de /
T02D2512-2:335a-16: rdo rje bsrungs bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs la tshigs su bcad pa dang /
T02D2512-2:335a-17: sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la
T02D2512-2:335a-18: mchod yon phul nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams
T02D2512-2:335a-19: kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub par
T02D2512-2:335a-20: bya'o // de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:335a-21: chen pos rgyas btab la aom badzra dharma aa bhi
T02D2512-2:335a-23: de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi sku'i dam tshig gi
T02D2512-2:335a-24: phyag rgya dang 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang bskur
T02D2512-2:335a-26: de nas mchod yon phul la bum pa la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams dang /
T02D2512-2:335a-27: padma'i mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa
T02D2512-2:335a-28: bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la padma chen
T02D2512-2:335a-29: po me tog dang bcas pa bcings la yid ma
T02D2512-2:335a-30: yengs par aom padma su kham zhes bya bzlos shing
T02D2512-2:335a-31: phyag bya'o // de nas phyag bzhi byas nas phyi rol tu gtor ma la sogs sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:335a-32: de nas padma'i gnod sbyin dang rdo rje me tog
T02D2512-2:335a-33: dang na bza' dkar mos sbyin sreg gi cho gas
T02D2512-2:335a-35: bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbus
T02D2512-2:335a-36: su bcom ldan 'das me tog gis mchod la bzhugs
T02D2512-2:335a-37: su gsol te / bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyis
T02D2512-2:335a-38: mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o
T02D2512-2:335a-39: su gsol te / // ting nge 'dzin bzang po
T02D2512-2:335a-40: la sogs pa la ni rang gi snying pos sbyin
T02D2512-2:335a-41: sreg bdun bdun dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:335a-42: de nas yang lha thams cad kyi snying po zlos

T02D2512-2:338b-7: de bzhin du gtsug tor dang gtsug phud dang /

T02D2512-2:338b-9: mkha' dang rdo rje'i gdan dang khang ba chen po
T02D2512-2:338b-14: ri bo don yod pa la sogs pa dang ;
T02D2512-2:338b-15: srad bus yongs su bskor ba dang /
T02D2512-2:338b-17: zas dang btung ba dang gos dang rgyan dang phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-2:338b-18: bsrung ba bskyed pa'i bsam pas de dag tu 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:338b-19: de ltar padma chen po thams cad srung bas las thams cad 'grub par gsungs nas /
T02D2512-2:338b-20: da ni tshe dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-2:338b-21: padma chen po mchog grub pas las sgrub pa gsungs
T02D2512-2:338b-22: pa yin no // de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-2:338b-23: rnam par spyang bar bya'o zhes bya bas bsgrub po
T02D2512-2:338b-24: zhes bya ba 'dis don 'di skad ston pa yin
T02D2512-2:338b-25: te / snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug
T02D2512-2:338b-26: gi sbyor ba byas la de kho na nyid dang
T02D2512-2:338b-27: te / / chos dang dam tshig bzung nas padma chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-2:338b-28: bdag nyid kyi bcing ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs rnam
T02D2512-2:338b-29: par spyang bar bya'o zhes bya bas bsam pa skyed
T02D2512-2:338b-30: la sgom pa'i snying po zlos shing bdag nyid 'phags
T02D2512-2:338b-31: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i tshe
T02D2512-2:338b-32: dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
T02D2512-2:338b-33: tu bsams te / de lta bus ni tshe 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-2:338b-34: de bzhin du bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu
T02D2512-2:338b-35: gyur pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi kha dog dang
T02D2512-2:338b-36: ldan par bsams na de lta bus ni kha dog
T02D2512-2:338b-37: 'grub bo // de bzhin du 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur cing //
T02D2512-2:338b-38: de'i stobs dang ldan pas bsams na /
T02D2512-2:338b-39: de lta bus ni bden pa'i stobs 'grub bo //
T02D2512-2:338b-40: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02D2512-2:338b-41: bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu gyur cing 'jig
T02D2512-2:338b-42: rten dbang phyug gi gzi brjid dang ldan par bsams
T02D2512-2:339a-21: shes rab dam pa 'grub pa la yang ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:339a-22: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na
T02D2512-2:339a-23: thams cad de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2512-2:339a-24: pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung
T02D2512-2:339a-26: de rnams kyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ni
T02D2512-2:339a-27: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o
T02D2512-2:339a-29: de las byung ba'i padma'i rigs ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje dang 'dra bas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-2:339a-30: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rtag pa'o //
T02D2512-2:339a-31: de nyid bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-2:339a-32: ston par byed pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2512-2:339a-33: de'i rgyas pa ni rgyun no //
T02D2512-2:339a-34: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab
T02D2512-2:339a-35: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ba zhes bya
T02D2512-2:339a-36: ba dum bu gnyis pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi
T02D2512-2:339a-37: phyi ma'i rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i
T02D2512-2:339a-38: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so
T02D2512-2:339a-40: / // / de ltar log par lta ba'i gnyen por gyur par 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
T02D2512-2:339a-42: de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2512-2:339a-43: thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che //
T02D2512-2:339a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ser sna'i gnyen por gyur pa nor bu'i rigs gsungs pa yin no//
T02D2512-2:339a-45: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig yin te /
T02D2512-2:339a-46: dang por sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-2:339a-47: 'dir dang po'i sbyor pa ni dpal rdo rje sems
T02D2512-2:339a-48: dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa nyid yin
T02D2512-2:339a-49: no // thams cad nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:339a-50: thams cad kyang yin la nam mkha' yang yin pas
T02D2512-2:339a-51: na thams cad nam mkha' ste /
T02D2512-2:339a-52: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin
T02D2512-2:339a-53: can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba dang nor
T02D2512-2:339a-54: bu'i rigs so // de 'di la mnga' bas na thams cad nam mkha'o //
T02D2512-2:339b-0: nam mkha' thams cad yin pa nyid kyis na mi 'gyur che ste brtan @339b zhing rtag pa'o //
T02D2512-2:339b-1: thams cad dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni de bzhin
T02D2512-2:339b-2: gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thams cad
T02D2512-2:339b-3: ni nor bu'i rigs yin te /
T02D2512-2:339b-4: de ltar na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-2:339b-5: cad dang gdul bya rnams kyi don du gnyer bar
T02D2512-2:339b-6: bya ba yin pas na kun gyi don te nor
T02D2512-2:339b-7: bu'i rigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi don nyid
T02D2512-2:339b-8: kyi rang bzhin du gyur pas kyang kun gyi don
T02D2512-2:339b-9: to // kun dbang zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'
T02D2512-2:339b-10: mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus 'jig rten dang
T02D2512-2:339b-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams
T02D2512-2:339b-12: cad la dbang thob pas na kun dbang ngo //
T02D2512-2:339b-13: rin po che thams cad 'dzin zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-2:339b-14: rin po che thams cad ni rin po che'i rigs
T02D2512-2:339b-15: te de thugs su chud pa'i tshul gyis de'i bdag
T02D2512-2:339b-16: nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis 'dzin par mdzad pas na
T02D2512-2:339b-18: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'chang dbang ba nam
T02D2512-2:339b-19: mkha' nyid du gyur to zhes bya bar sbyar ro
T02D2512-2:339b-20: // ci zhig mdzad nas she na ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:339b-22: 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
T02D2512-2:339b-23: de bzhin khams gsum dag pa ni //
T02D2512-2:339b-24: gnas kyi nyes pas mi gos so //
T02D2512-2:339b-25: zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i snying po 'di'i don
T02D2512-2:339b-26: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2512-2:339b-27: ting nge 'dzin gyis shin tu lhag par yang byin
T02D2512-2:339b-29: rang byin rlabs zhes bya ba ste brtan par bya ba'o //
T02D2512-2:339b-30: dag pa chen pos rab sad mdzad //
T02D2512-2:339b-31: ces bya ba ni padma'i 'dab ma dbye ba sgom
T02D2512-2:339b-32: pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag po chen pos rab tu
T02D2512-2:339b-34: chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas //
T02D2512-2:339b-35: zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi rang bzhin dang
T02D2512-2:339b-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2512-2:339b-37: can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams
T02D2512-2:339b-38: la rnam par gzigs shing so sor rtog par mdzad
T02D2512-2:339b-39: pas so // ci'i phyir nam mkha' nyid du gyur
T02D2512-2:339b-40: pa yin zhe na kun gyi dbang don zhes bya
T02D2512-2:339b-41: pas so // ba gsungs te / sems can gyi
T02D2512-2:339b-42: khams thams cad dang bdag nyid dang 'jig rten dang
T02D2512-2:339b-43: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
T02D2512-2:339b-44: rab tu grub pa'i don ni kun don dbang phyug
T02D2512-2:339b-45: pas so // ba gsungs te / go // nam
T02D2512-2:339b-46: mkha' nyid du gyur pa de yang khyab pa ji
T02D2512-2:340a-0: gdod nas byung zhes bya ba gsungs te sngar sgra @340a * //
T02D2512-2:340a-1: bshad pa'i tshul gyis da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo bzhugs pas na gdod nas byung ba'o //
T02D2512-2:340a-2: nam mkha' nyid du gyur pa yin zhe na zhes
T02D2512-2:340a-3: bya ba ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid ni nam
T02D2512-2:340a-4: mkha' nyid de / 'jig rten na grags pa'i tshul
T02D2512-2:340a-5: gyis nam mkha'i 'od zer gyi rang bzhin nyid du
T02D2512-2:340a-6: mkha' nyid de / gyur pa'o // nam mkha' nyid de khyab par ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2512-2:340a-7: nyi zla dang ni gza' skar can //
T02D2512-2:340a-8: zhes bya ba smos te nam mkha' gang la nyi
T02D2512-2:340a-9: ma dang zla ba dang gza' dang skar ma yod
T02D2512-2:340a-10: par 'jig rten na grags pa'i nam mkha' nyid du
T02D2512-2:340a-11: gyur pas na nyi zla dang gza' skar dang bcas
T02D2512-2:340a-12: pa'i nam mkhar gyur pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:340a-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2512-2:340a-14: ltar bshad ma thag pa'i sgom pa'i stobs kyis rdo
T02D2512-2:340a-15: rje 'chang chen po nyi ma dang zla ba dang
T02D2512-2:340a-16: skar ma can gyi nam mkha' dang gcig tu gyur
T02D2512-2:340a-17: pa'i rjes thogs nyid la sgom pa'i rang bzhin can
T02D2512-2:340a-18: gyi shes rab kyi mthar thug pa las byung ba'i
T02D2512-2:340a-19: nges pa'i mchog gis rdo rje rin chen gyi rnam
T02D2512-2:340a-20: par thugs rtse gcig pa nyid kyis rdo rje mdzad
T02D2512-2:340a-21: cing mi phyed pa nyid du mdzad nas de nas
T02D2512-2:340a-22: yang nam mkha'i rdo rje de las rin chen du
T02D2512-2:340a-23: gyur pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che
T02D2512-2:340a-24: las bee d'urya sngon po 'dra bas zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:340a-26: nam mkha'i snying po ni byang chub sems dpa' chen
T02D2512-2:340a-27: po'i sku'i yang dag 'byung ba ni de ltar 'byung
T02D2512-2:340a-28: ba'o // rdo rje rin chen bsnams pa ni nor bu rin po che bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-2:340a-29: dge ba ni nyon mongs pa bag chags dang bcas par byang ba'o //
T02D2512-2:340a-30: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2512-2:340a-31: bcom ldan 'das thog ma 'di zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:340a-32: bshad ma thag pa'i nam mkha'i snying po ni bdud
T02D2512-2:340a-33: bzhi bcom pas na bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2512-2:340a-34: da ltar byung ba'i tshul gyis rtag tu zhugs pas na thog ma'o //
T02D2512-2:340a-35: mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs //
T02D2512-2:340a-36: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D2512-2:340a-37: dpa' thams cad kyi skyes bu chen po'i mdzod spu
T02D2512-2:340a-39: de'i gnas ni thig le'i phyogs mdzod spu'i gnas su gyur pa'o ;
T02D2512-2:340a-40: / der yang dag par gnas pa ni de na gnas pa'o //
T02D2512-2:340a-41: gang gi stobs kyis na mdzod spu thams cad kyi gnas su yang dag par gnas she na /
T02D2512-2:340a-42: ting 'dzin la ni rnam gzigs pas //
T02D2512-2:340a-43: 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag po nyid //
T02D2512-2:340a-44: ces bya ba gsungs te chos thams cad rang bzhin
T02D2512-2:340b-0: gyis rnam @340b par dag pa'o zhes so sor rtog
T02D2512-2:340b-1: pa ni rnam par gzig pas so //
T02D2512-2:340b-2: rnam par gzigs pa de las ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin nges par bskyed pa'o //
T02D2512-2:340b-3: ting nge 'dzin de las ni gtso bo 'jig rten
T02D2512-2:340b-4: dbang phyug nyid de des bdag por gyur pa nyid
T02D2512-2:340b-5: ni rigs thams cad kyi rgyal po nyid do //
T02D2512-2:340b-6: de bas na 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid kyi bdag
T02D2512-2:340b-7: po nyid du gyur pas na bcom ldan 'das spyi
T02D2512-2:340b-8: gtsug kun gyi gnas na yang dag par zhugs pa
T02D2512-2:340b-9: yin no // der zhugs nas ci zhig mdzad ce na /
T02D2512-2:340b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:340b-11: sangs rgyas thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o ;
T02D2512-2:340b-12: / sras bcas ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:340b-13: rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-2:340b-14: de lta bu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'chang chen po ni mchog ste dam pa'o //
T02D2512-2:340b-15: rdo rje rin chen de yis ni phyag na gnas pa'i rdo rje rin chen des so //
T02D2512-2:340b-16: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges bar gzung ba ste /
T02D2512-2:340b-17: rdo rje rin chen de nyid kyis so //
T02D2512-2:340b-18: de tshe de la dbang bskur ro //
T02D2512-2:340b-19: zhes bya ba ni dus de'i tshe dbang bskur bar gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:340b-21: rigs kun gyis dbang bskur phyir dang //
T02D2512-2:340b-22: zhes bya ba gsungs te rigs kun ni nor bu'i rigs rnams so //
T02D2512-2:340b-23: de nas dbang bskur ba ni rigs kun gyis dbang bskur ba ste de'i 'og tu'o //
T02D2512-2:340b-24: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs
T02D2512-2:340b-25: pa rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bor skyed par
T02D2512-2:340b-26: mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:340b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rin po che'i rigs
T02D2512-2:340b-28: der skyes pa la dgos pa ci yod ce na
T02D2512-2:340b-29: / bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:340b-31: rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i dngos grub la sred pa
T02D2512-2:340b-32: skye ba ni gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa thams
T02D2512-2:340b-33: cad de de yongs su rdzogs pa ni rig 'dzin
T02D2512-2:340b-34: la sogs pa'i dngos grub thob bo //
T02D2512-2:340b-35: don de'i phyir dbang bskur ba des sangs rgyas sras
T02D2512-2:340b-36: dang bcas pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'chang chen
T02D2512-2:340b-37: po'i dbang bskur zhing rin po che'i rigs kyi rang
T02D2512-2:340b-39: kun mchog kun la dbang bskur nas //
T02D2512-2:340b-40: shi sa par brjod pa 'di gsungs so //
T02D2512-2:340b-42: aom sarba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i snying po gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:341a-2: legs bar shis brjod dbang bskur bas //
T02D2512-2:341a-3: zhes bya ba ni snying po 'di gsungs pa'i rjes
T02D2512-2:341a-4: thogs nyid la shis pa brjod pa'i rang bzhin can
T02D2512-2:341a-5: gyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud nas dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2512-2:341a-6: rdo rje rin chen de las zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:341a-7: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag na gnas
T02D2512-2:341a-10: zhes bya ba ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni chos so //
T02D2512-2:341a-11: de las byung ba dang de ston par byed pa dang /
T02D2512-2:341a-12: de thob par bya ba'i dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i sems dpa' ni chos kyi gtso bo ste /
T02D2512-2:341a-13: de dag snying po 'di gsungs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de las byung ba yin no //
T02D2512-2:341a-14: byung nas de rnams kyis ci zhig mdzad ce na
T02D2512-2:341a-15: byung nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te
T02D2512-2:341a-16: / chos kyi gtso bo de rnams ni rdo rje
T02D2512-2:341a-17: rin po che chen po de las byung nas 'gro
T02D2512-2:341a-18: ba sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad
T02D2512-2:341a-19: dang rin po che'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du bskyed
T02D2512-2:341a-21: ji ltar zhe na ci rigs par ni zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2512-2:341a-22: phyogs bcur rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02D2512-2:341a-23: de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug pa'i cho gas bcug ste zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:341a-24: 'gro ba thams cad dbang bskur ba ji tsam gyis dbang bskur zhe na /
T02D2512-2:341a-25: rdo rje kun gyi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2512-2:341a-27: rdo rje kun ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po
T02D2512-2:341a-28: la sogs pa'i nor bu'i rigs kyi lha rnams so
T02D2512-2:341a-29: // de rnams kyi dbang bskur ba ni dbang bskur ba thams cad de /
T02D2512-2:341a-30: de rnams rdzogs par bya ba nyid du gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:341a-31: slar yang dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs //
T02D2512-2:341a-32: zhes bya ba ni de ltar rdo rje rin po
T02D2512-2:341a-33: che de la sogs pa chos kyi gtso bo de
T02D2512-2:341a-34: rnams byung nas sems can gyi don mdzad de phyogs
T02D2512-2:341a-35: bcu nas slar byon te dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis
T02D2512-2:341a-36: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos bskor
T02D2512-2:341a-39: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' lha mo'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:341a-40: 'khor gyi tshul gyis 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spangs
T02D2512-2:341a-41: pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi don mdzad nas gti mug
T02D2512-2:341b-0: sems can gyi khams rnams la 'jig rten @341b dbang
T02D2512-2:341b-1: phyug tu gyur nas so sor rtog ba mdzad pa
T02D2512-2:341b-2: yin no // de nas ser sna'i gnyen por gyur
T02D2512-2:341b-3: pa nor bu'i rigs ni nyi ma dang zla ba
T02D2512-2:341b-4: yin no // dang / skar ma'i gzugs can gyi
T02D2512-2:341b-5: nam mkhar gyur pa rdo rje rin chen bskyed de
T02D2512-2:341b-6: de las byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
T02D2512-2:341b-7: snying po'i skur zhugs nas de thams cad mdzad de
T02D2512-2:341b-8: rang gi snying po gsungs nas nyid kyi phyag na
T02D2512-2:341b-9: gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che las rang gi
T02D2512-2:341b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i ngo bor gyur nas nges sems
T02D2512-2:341b-11: can gyi khams thams cad nor bu'i rigs su bcug
T02D2512-2:341b-12: yin no // dang / nas / nor bu'i rigs
T02D2512-2:341b-13: las nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin du mdzad nas
T02D2512-2:341b-14: yin no // dang / nas / slar byung ste
T02D2512-2:341b-15: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thig le'i
T02D2512-2:341b-16: gnas su bzhugs nas de thams cad mdzad do //
T02D2512-2:341b-17: yang nor bu'i rigs kyi lha'i tshul gyis phyogs bcu
T02D2512-2:341b-18: nas byon pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa
T02D2512-2:341b-19: yin no // de ltar de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-2:341b-20: dkyil 'khor gyis kyang bzhugs pa yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-2:341b-21: ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa
T02D2512-2:341b-23: de nas bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba ni gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:341b-24: de ltar nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs nas /
T02D2512-2:341b-25: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2512-2:341b-26: rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-2:341b-27: ba'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-2:341b-28: bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs pas //
T02D2512-2:341b-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2512-2:341b-30: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:341b-31: rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa dang /
T02D2512-2:341b-32: rdo rje rin chen gyis nye bar mtshan pa yin
T02D2512-2:341b-33: pa'i phyir rdo rje rin chen ni 'phags pa nam
T02D2512-2:341b-34: mkha'i snying po'o // 'di'i gong na mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med pas bla na med pa'o //
T02D2512-2:341b-35: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la
T02D2512-2:341b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
T02D2512-2:341b-37: te / rtog pa de gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:341b-38: rtog pa de gsungs pa gang yin na rtog pa 'di'i las ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2512-2:341b-39: shin tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2512-2:341b-40: shin tu zhes bya ba ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-0: dbang phyug kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na dbang phyug chen po ste khams @342a * //
T02D2512-2:342a-1: gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal po nor bu'i rigs kyi rang bzhin can gyi rdo rje 'chang ba'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-2: de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas na dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-3: shin tu yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na shin tu dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-4: de yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa ni dngos grub mchog ste /
T02D2512-2:342a-5: de stsol bar mdzad pas na shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub mchog stsol to //
T02D2512-2:342a-6: nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sgrub pa dang /
T02D2512-2:342a-7: bsgrub par bya ba'i rtog pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-8: de gsungs pa ni rtog pa de bka' stsal ba'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-9: dkyil 'khor chen po ni rdo rje sems dpa' phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-2:342a-10: gang gi phyi rol de dang 'dra ba de phyi'i dkyil 'khor chen po ste zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-11: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung pa ste /
T02D2512-2:342a-12: phyi rol ni dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'dra ba nyid yin no //
T02D2512-2:342a-13: nam mkha'i 'khor lor zhes bya ba nang gi dkyil
T02D2512-2:342a-14: 'khor chen po nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la nor
T02D2512-2:342a-15: bu'i dbyibs zur brgyad pa dang 'dra bar 'dug pa'o
T02D2512-2:342a-16: // de nyid kyi phyir nam mkha'i mdog can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-2:342a-17: nam mkha'i mdog ni bee d'urya'i mdog ste mdog sngon po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2512-2:342a-18: nyi ma dang zla ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2512-2:342a-20: skar ma dang gza' rnams kyis brgyan par bri zhes
T02D2512-2:342a-21: bya ba ni nam mkha'i ngos la shar zhing 'jig
T02D2512-2:342a-22: rten na grags pa'i skar ma dang gza' rnams kyis
T02D2512-2:342a-23: kyang brgyan cing mdzes par bya ba'i nam mkha'i dkyil
T02D2512-2:342a-24: 'khor de yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-25: de'i dbus zhes bya ba ni dbus ni dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i dbus su'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-26: nam mkha'i snying po ni zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa nam mkha' snying po'o //
T02D2512-2:342a-27: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste nam mkha'i snying po nyid do //
T02D2512-2:342a-28: bdag nyid thams cad dgyes par gzhag / ces bya
T02D2512-2:342a-29: ba ni bdag nyid kyang yin la thams cad kyang
T02D2512-2:342a-30: yin pas na bdag nyid thams cad de /
T02D2512-2:342a-31: bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sku thams cad do //
T02D2512-2:342a-32: de la dgyes pa ni yid bde ba dang ldan
T02D2512-2:342a-33: pa gang yin pa de la bdag nyid thams cad
T02D2512-2:342a-34: dgyes pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-2:342a-35: de gzhag cing dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:342b-0: dag pa'i bee d'urya'i mdog @342b 'dra ba //
T02D2512-2:342b-1: zhes bya ba ni rin po che bee d'urya nag
T02D2512-2:342b-2: nog gi dri ma thams cad dang bral ba ni
T02D2512-2:342b-4: de dang 'dra ba'i mdog 'di la mngal bas na /
T02D2512-2:342b-5: dag pa'i bee d'urya yi mdog 'dra ba //
T02D2512-2:342b-8: de yi 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khug / ces bya ste /
T02D2512-2:342b-9: gang gi 'od zer kha dog sna lnga pas sna
T02D2512-2:342b-10: tshogs de nyid kun du 'brug cing phan tshun khyab
T02D2512-2:342b-11: par byed pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2512-2:342b-13: g-yon pas rin chen thugs kar stod //
T02D2512-2:342b-14: ces bya ba phyag g-yon pas rdo rje rin chen
T02D2512-2:342b-15: gyi thugs ka'i phyogs su stod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams
T02D2512-2:342b-17: g-yon pas rin chen thugs kar stod //
T02D2512-2:342b-19: g-yas pas nor chen rab stsol ba //
T02D2512-2:342b-20: zhes bya ba de phyag g-yas pas yid bzhin gyi
T02D2512-2:342b-21: nor bu rin po che la sogs pa'i nor bu
T02D2512-2:342b-22: rin po la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa rnams la
T02D2512-2:342b-23: nam mkha'i khyab pa'i nor stsol ba 'di la mnga'
T02D2512-2:342b-24: bas na de skad ces bya'o ;
T02D2512-2:342b-25: / de'i zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-2:342b-26: ngos zhes bya ba ni phyogs thams cad du'o //
T02D2512-2:342b-27: sems can mchog ces bya ba ni sems dpa'i dam pa yin no //
T02D2512-2:342b-28: bzhi po gzungs bcas dam pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:342b-29: sems dpa' mchog bzhi po rang gi rig pa'i lha
T02D2512-2:342b-30: mo dang bcas pa dam par gyur cing phul du
T02D2512-2:342b-32: dbang bskur ba dang zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-2:342b-33: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2512-2:342b-34: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:342b-35: chen por bshad pa'i tshul gyi cho ga rgyas pa
T02D2512-2:342b-36: ji bzhin bya zhes shugs kyi spyang par bya ste
T02D2512-2:342b-37: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la sgo
T02D2512-2:342b-38: dbye ba byas nas bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:342b-39: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
T02D2512-2:342b-40: spyan drang pa'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs nas mchod pa
T02D2512-2:342b-41: thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas
T02D2512-2:342b-43: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas bdag nyid dbang bskur
T02D2512-2:342b-44: bar bya ba 'di ni 'dir cho ga rgyas pa
T02D2512-2:342b-45: yin no // nor bu'i khu tshur gyis zhugs zhes
T02D2512-2:342b-46: bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe
T02D2512-2:342b-47: bong gnyis mnyam por gzhi bas te mthe bong gnyis
T02D2512-2:342b-48: kyi rtse mo la mdzub mo gnyis kyi gdong gzhag
T02D2512-2:342b-49: pa 'di ni nor bu'i khu tshur te de lta
T02D2512-2:342b-50: bu'i nor bu'i khu tshur gyis zhugs pa'o//
T02D2512-2:343a-0: @343a * // nam mkha' las byung zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po ni nam mkha' ste /
T02D2512-2:343a-1: de las byung ba'i dam tshig ni nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
T02D2512-2:343a-2: nam mkha' las byung ba'i dam tshig de mchog yin pas na dam pa'o //
T02D2512-2:343a-3: zhugs nas dam tshig brjod par bya //
T02D2512-2:343a-4: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas bcom
T02D2512-2:343a-5: ldan 'das la phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod
T02D2512-2:343a-6: par bya'o // khyod ni nam mkha' las byung ba //
T02D2512-2:343a-7: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen nam mkha'
T02D2512-2:343a-8: ste de las khyod byung ba yin no zhes bya
T02D2512-2:343a-10: thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin //
T02D2512-2:343a-11: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2512-2:343a-12: rdo rje dang padma'i rigs ni thams cad de de'i
T02D2512-2:343a-13: lnga pa zhes bya ba lnga pa'i grangs bkod par
T02D2512-2:343a-14: byed pa'o // aom siddhi h'um bhu zhes bya ba
T02D2512-2:343a-15: ni sa'i 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gyi dngos grub
T02D2512-2:343a-16: byed pa'o // kyi bar ro // bhu ba zhes
T02D2512-2:343a-17: bya ba ni bar snang gi dngos grub kyi bar
T02D2512-2:343a-18: byed pa'o // kyi bar ro // du'o // sa
T02D2512-2:343a-19: zhes bya ba ni mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi
T02D2512-2:343a-20: ngo bo nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar ro //
T02D2512-2:343a-21: badzra ratna zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i
T02D2512-2:343a-22: snying po 'di dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i 'byor
T02D2512-2:343a-23: ba dang ldan pa'i lha mo'i rang bzhin grub pas
T02D2512-2:343a-24: so // b'a b'a zhes bya ba ni gter gyi rin chen dpal gyi lha mo grub pas so //
T02D2512-2:343a-25: da da zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po
T02D2512-2:343a-26: nor bu chen po'i phun sum tshogs pa'i lha mo
T02D2512-2:343a-27: grub bo // tam zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i
T02D2512-2:343a-28: rgyal po bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i mchod
T02D2512-2:343a-29: pa'i lha mo'i rang bzhin grub pas kyang grub par
T02D2512-2:343a-31: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad na thag pa'i dam tshig gi sngags so //
T02D2512-2:343a-32: bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa ste /
T02D2512-2:343a-33: mtshan thog thag bzlas pa ma yin pas so //
T02D2512-2:343a-34: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i
T02D2512-2:343a-35: snying po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni dngos
T02D2512-2:343a-36: grub thams cad de dngos grub de thams cad la'o
T02D2512-2:343a-37: // phun sum tshogs pa kun la'ang shin tu ni //
T02D2512-2:343a-38: zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i lha mo rnam pa
T02D2512-2:343a-39: sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum
T02D2512-2:343a-40: tshogs pa rnams ni phun sum tshogs pa kun te
T02D2512-2:343a-41: de rnams la shin tu zhes bya ba /
T02D2512-2:343a-42: mnyam par grub 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med //
T02D2512-2:343b-1: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po grub par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:343b-2: de nas nor bu'i khu tshur chen po g-yas pa'i
T02D2512-2:343b-3: lcags kyus dgug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-2:343b-4: bris nas sgo dbye ba byas la bsdu ba bya
T02D2512-2:343b-5: ba dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-2:343b-6: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ltar
T02D2512-2:343b-7: dgug par byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan
T02D2512-2:343b-8: 'das byon nas don zhes bya ba nor bu'i rigs
T02D2512-2:343b-9: chen po'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i snying po grub par
T02D2512-2:343b-10: gyur pa ni nor bu'i rigs chen po grub par
T02D2512-2:343b-11: gyur pa'i tshul gyis 'grub par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-2:343b-12: de kho na nyid mchog gi snying pos lan cig ces bya ba ni /
T02D2512-2:343b-13: khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba //
T02D2512-2:343b-14: thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin //
T02D2512-2:343b-16: bha ba da ha tram zhes bya ba'i bar ni
T02D2512-2:343b-17: de kho na nyid kyi mchog gi snying po ste
T02D2512-2:343b-18: / de slob dpon gyis slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa na lan cig zlos su gzhug go //
T02D2512-2:343b-19: de nas 'byor pa'i mchog ces bya ba ni lha mo'i 'byor ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:343b-20: rtag par brtan pa'i dpal ni lha mo dpal mo'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:343b-21: phun sum tshogs pa ni lha mo shin tu phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:343b-22: mchod pa chen po ni lha mo mchod pa'i rang bzhin no ;
T02D2512-2:343b-23: / dngos grub rnams ni nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2512-2:343b-25: thob ces bya ba ni slob ma rnams kyis 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-2:343b-26: bde bar gshegs pa shin tu zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-2:343b-27: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nor bu'i
T02D2512-2:343b-28: rigs chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa de bzhin du
T02D2512-2:343b-29: slob ma dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dam tshig gi
T02D2512-2:343b-31: yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste gnas dang bdag
T02D2512-2:343b-32: bsrung ba byas na rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas
T02D2512-2:343b-33: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum
T02D2512-2:343b-34: dang 'dra ba mdun du bskyed la /
T02D2512-2:343b-35: gal te 'byor na me tog la sogs pa dngos
T02D2512-2:343b-36: su mchod nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la
T02D2512-2:343b-37: phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom
T02D2512-2:343b-39: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo la
T02D2512-2:343b-40: sogs pa nas dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2512-2:344a-0: @344a * // bcings pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bya'o //
T02D2512-2:344a-1: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i bar gyi cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-2:344a-2: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2512-2:344a-3: rje rin po che la bzlas par bya ba'i sngags
T02D2512-2:344a-4: yid kyis bris nas de nyid yid la zlos shing
T02D2512-2:344a-5: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:344a-6: de nas rang gi lha'i snying po de dbyangs kyi
T02D2512-2:344a-7: yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa las rang gi
T02D2512-2:344a-8: sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur bsam par bya'o
T02D2512-2:344a-9: // de'i steng du yang rang gi snying po ka
T02D2512-2:344a-10: la sogs pa nas kasha'i bar gyi gsal ba'i yi
T02D2512-2:344a-11: ge dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis
T02D2512-2:344a-12: // pa'o // yang de rang gi snying po dang
T02D2512-2:344a-13: bcas pa la dang po'i rdo rje de nyid rang
T02D2512-2:344a-14: gi lha'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsam par
T02D2512-2:344a-15: // pa'o // bya'o // rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i
T02D2512-2:344a-16: phyag rgya'i nang du rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal
T02D2512-2:344a-17: // pa'o // bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // de
T02D2512-2:344a-18: nas sems dpar byin gyis rlob ba'i sbyor bas rang
T02D2512-2:344a-19: gi lha'i phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid
T02D2512-2:344a-20: bsams la yang rang gi lha'i snying po zlos shing
T02D2512-2:344a-21: rdo rje sems dpar rang gi lha'i skur bsgom par
T02D2512-2:344a-22: // pa'o // bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // bya'o
T02D2512-2:344a-23: // de nas sa ma ya ho ham zhes brjod
T02D2512-2:344a-24: // pa'o // bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // bya'o
T02D2512-2:344a-25: // do // de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig
T02D2512-2:344a-26: gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya ham zhes
T02D2512-2:344a-27: // pa'o // bya'o // bsgom par bya'o // bya'o
T02D2512-2:344a-28: // do // brjod do// yang sa ma yas tva
T02D2512-2:344a-29: aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes brjod cing snying ga
T02D2512-2:344a-30: dang dbral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin
T02D2512-2:344a-32: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-2:344a-33: bcings la rang gi lha'i snying po aa'i mtha' can
T02D2512-2:344a-34: brjod nas mdun du sna tshogs padma la rang gi
T02D2512-2:344a-35: lha'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bsams la snying po de
T02D2512-2:344a-36: zlos shing phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:344a-37: de nas rang gi snying po brjod de /
T02D2512-2:344a-38: phyag rgya de rang gi lha'i skur bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-2:344a-39: de nas der rin chen lcags kyu ma la sogs
T02D2512-2:344a-40: pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rang gi lha
T02D2512-2:344a-41: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang
T02D2512-2:344a-42: dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-2:344a-43: rgya dang rang gi snying po brjod cing dri shya
T02D2512-2:344a-44: zhes kyang brjod la blta bar bya'o //
T02D2512-2:344a-45: de nas dril bu dang spyan drang ba'i phyag rgyas
T02D2512-2:344a-46: spyan drangs la rang gi lha rang gi sngags kyis
T02D2512-2:344a-47: rang gi lus la bcug la rang gi dam tshig
T02D2512-2:344b-0: sa ma ya stvam @344b zhes brjod cing 'od kyi
T02D2512-2:344b-1: dkyil 'khor bskyed la sa ma ya stvam aa hi
T02D2512-2:344b-2: dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bya ba dang rang gi lha'i snying
T02D2512-2:344b-3: po'i mthar lan gsum brjod la rang gi lhar bsgrub
T02D2512-2:344b-4: par bya'o // de nas chos dang las dang phyag

T02D2512-2:347b-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi snying gar

T02D2512-2:347b-17: nas rang gi dngos grub thams cad stsal bar mdzad
